name: Aberration Kinship
summary: Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate.

name: Acrobatic Performer
summary: Use Acrobatics to Perform.

name: Acute Vision
summary: Your senses improve when you are raging.

name: Adapted Cantrip
summary: Through study of multiple magical traditions, you’ve altered a spell to suit your spellcasting style.

name: Adaptive Vision
summary: After years of using black powder weaponry in dimly lit spaces, you've become accustomed to dazzling flashes of light and sudden shifts in illumination.

name: Additional Lore
summary: Become trained in another Lore subcategory

name: Adhyabhau
summary: You descend from the rare psychic vampires known as vetalaranas.

name: Adopted Ancestry
summary: Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry

name: Adrenaline Rush
summary: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

name: Adroit Manipulation
summary: You’ve fiddled with knots, locks, and blacksmith’s puzzles since you were a child to give your hands something to do.

name: Advanced Weaponry
summary: Your eidolon's attack evolves.

name: Aerial Boomerang
summary: A blade of shearing wind races away from you in a 60-foot line.

name: Ageless Spirit
summary: You remember more about your previous incarnations than most leshys.

name: Agile Shield Grip
summary: You change your grip on the shield, allowing you to combine rapid attacks with your shield boss or shield spikes and your main weapon's Strikes in a series of swift motions.

name: Air Cushion
summary: Air currents flow upward to slow the target's fall to 60 feet per round.

name: Alabaster Eyes
summary: In place of the normal vishkanyan golden eyes, you were born with especially perceptive snow-white eyes.

name: Alchemical Crafting
summary: Craft alchemical items

name: Alchemical Familiar
summary: You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood.

name: Alchemical Savant
summary: You can identify alchemical items quickly.

name: Alchemical Scholar
summary: You learn formulas more easily.

name: Alghollthu Bound
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: Although you may not even be aware, the alghollthus your ancestors once served maintain a stranglehold on the deepest, tethered parts of your mind.

name: All of the Animal
summary: You know how to make the best and most efficient use of a hunted animal's carcass.

name: Ambersoul
summary: Your elemental heritage is reflected in the oils and fragrances of plants, in tree resin that fossilizes into amber, or in the gentle smell of a flower.

name: Ammunition Thaumaturgy
summary: You're so used to handling your implement, weapon, and esoterica in the heat of combat that adding a few bullets or arrows to the mix is no extra burden.

name: Anadi Lore
summary: You've learned how to provide for your community, be it through hard-earned sustenance or useful crafts.

name: Ancestral Blood Magic
summary: The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry.

name: Ancestral Insight
summary: You have extensive knowledge of your ancestors' ancient origins.

name: Ancestral Linguistics
summary: Over your extensive lifespan, you've studied many languages.

name: Ancestral Longevity
summary: You have accumulated a vast array of lived knowledge over the years.

name: Ancestral Mind
summary: By unraveling memories and connections passed down from your progenitors and buried within your unconscious mind, you learn to convert your inherent magic into psychic power.

name: Ancient Memories
summary: In the long years since Ghorus's day, you've done pretty much everything at one time or another.

name: Android Lore
summary: You have a keen interest in the origins of your people.

name: Angelkin
summary: You descend from an angel, a winged messenger from Nirvana or one of the other celestial realms.

name: Animal Accomplice
summary: You build a rapport with an animal, which becomes magically bonded to you.

name: Animal Companion
summary: You gain the service of a young animal companion (page 206) that travels with you on your adventures and obeys any simple commands you give it to the best of its abilities.

name: Animal Elocutionist
summary: You hear animal sounds as conversations instead of unintelligent noise, and you can respond in turn.

name: Animal Empathy (Druid)
summary: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Animal Senses
summary: You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: darkvision, low-light vision, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet.

name: Aquatic Eyes
summary: As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean.

name: Arcane Communication
summary: You can deliver silent messages.

name: Arcane Eye
summary: Your eye has been magically enhanced to pierce darkness.

name: Arcane Fists
summary: Your physical training encompasses unarmed combat forms.

name: Arcane Sense
summary: Cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate spell

name: Arcane Tattoos
summary: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic.

name: Armor Assist
prerequisite: Trained in Athletics or Trained in Warfare Lore
summary: Don armor more quickly.

name: Armor Proficiency
summary: Become trained in a type of armor

name: Armor in Earth
summary: Stone encases you like armor.

name: As in Life, So in Death
summary: Specific memories of your old life are hard to hold onto, but you know things without remembering why.

name: Assurance
prerequisite: trained in at least one skill
summary: Receive a fixed result on a skill check

name: Automaton Armament
summary: You've been provided a body part designed for combat.

name: Automaton Lore
summary: You have come to better understand the process that made your body and the magic that powers it.

name: Avenge in Glory
summary: You honor your ally’s life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

name: Axiomatic Lore
summary: You possess a strong understanding of process among mortals and lawful outsiders alike.

name: Azarketi Lore
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: You have learned the history and origins of your people and how to connect to both your land and sea heritage.

name: Azarketi Weapon Familiarity
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater.

name: Bardic Lore
summary: Your studies make you informed on every subject.

name: Bargain Hunter
summary: Earn Income by searching for deals

name: Battle Medicine
summary: Heal yourself or an ally in battle

name: Beast Trainer
summary: You have an impressive innate ability to tame and command ferocious beasts.

name: Beastbrood
summary: One of your ancestors was a rakshasa, the corrupt and aristocratic reincarnated souls that call Golarion home.

name: Bestial Manifestation
summary: Part of your body has an animalistic influence from a planar creature.

name: Blast Lock
summary: Sometimes taking the shortest distance between two points involves removing an obstacle or two.

name: Blessed Blood
prerequisite: bloodline that grants divine spells; you follow a deity
summary: Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

name: Bon Mot
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, General, Linguistic, Mental, Skill
summary: Distract a foe with a witty quip.

name: Bone Magic
summary: Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones.

name: Bouncy Goblin
summary: You have a particular elasticity that makes it easy for you to bounce and squish.

name: Breath Control
summary: Hold your breath longer and gain benefits against inhaled threats

name: Brightsoul
summary: The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light.

name: Brine May
summary: Your mother was a sea hag, granting you one sea-green or blue eye.

name: Brinesoul
summary: Your elemental ancestor's legacy asserts itself as brackish water, like the seawater of the ocean.

name: Buckler Expertise
summary: You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection.

name: Built-In Tools
summary: You've built tools into your innovation so you can access and use them easily.

name: Burn It!
summary: Fire fascinates you.

name: Burning Jet
summary: A condensed burst of flame shoots behind you, propelling you forward with its sheer force.

name: Burrow Elocutionist
summary: You recognize the chittering of ground creatures as its own peculiar language.

name: Cackle
summary: Your patron’s power fills you with confidence, letting you sustain a magical working even as a quick burst of laughter leaves your lips.

name: Callow May
summary: You are among the most common of changelings—those born to sweet hags—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage.

name: Canny Acumen
summary: Become an expert in a saving throw or Perception

name: Canopy Sight
summary: You can see equally well even in dense jungles where only a small amount of light shines through.

name: Cantorian Reinforcement
summary: The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies.

name: Cat Fall
summary: Treat falls as shorter than they are

name: Cat Nap
summary: You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly.

name: Cat's Luck
summary: You instinctively twist away from danger.

name: Catch the Details
summary: You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you.

name: Catfolk Dance
summary: You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move.

name: Catfolk Lore
summary: Growing up among catfolk has taught you the traditional values of freedom to travel, stewardship of the land, and quick reactions when your curiosity lands you in trouble.

name: Catfolk Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor weapons that you can use with quick, darting slashes like a cat's claws.

name: Cauldron
summary: You can brew magic in your cauldron, creating useful magical concoctions.

name: Cel Rau
summary: You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion.

name: Celestial Eyes
summary: You can see through darkness.

name: Celestial Lore
summary: You were raised with an aasimar or celestial relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the celestial realms.

name: Ceremony of Protection
summary: You manipulate your exoskeleton to overlap itself.

name: Ceremony of the Evened Hand
summary: You have cultivated your exoskeleton's form for close combat, using knots, whorls, and reinforced branches.

name: Chance Death
summary: Your previous life ended due to sheer poor luck, struck by lightning or choking on a fish bone.

name: Changeling Lore
summary: All too aware of your true nature, you’ve studied hags and their powers.

name: Charlatan
summary: You’ve learned to mimic the abilities of spellcasters by studying their flourishes and words

name: Charming Liar
summary: Improve a target’s attitude with your lies

name: Cheek Pouches
summary: Your cheeks are stretchy, and you can store up to four items of light Bulk or less in these cheek pouches.

name: Cindersoul
summary: The fire of your elemental ancestor manifests like dying embers of a blaze, and your inner charcoal helps staunch bleeding, purify simple poisons, and absorb acid.

name: City Scavenger
summary: You know that the greatest treasures often look like refuse.

name: Civil Service
summary: Citizens bolster vacant leadership roles

name: Clan Lore
summary: Your identity as a member of your clan is as central to your sense of self as your dwarven ancestry.

name: Clan Pistol
summary: Raised in the ancient halls of Dongun Hold or the surrounding region, you display your lineage with a clan pistol, rather than a clan dagger.

name: Clan's Edge
summary: By moving your clan dagger with rapid precision, you can protect yourself more effectively.

name: Cleansing Subroutine
summary: Your nanites help purge your body of harmful chemicals and toxins.

name: Climbing Tail
summary: Your tail makes it much easier for you to climb.

name: Clone-Risen
summary: You were formed from a clone ritual or alchemical experiment.

name: Cold Minded
summary: The subtle strands of beguiling magic leave little impression on your mind.

name: Collapse
summary: You collapse into a pile of bones, mitigating the worst of the damage you would have taken, and the triggering attack deals only the amount it would deal on a hit (typically full damage instead of double damage).

name: Combat Assessment
summary: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

name: Combat Climber
summary: Fight more effectively as you Climb

name: Community Knowledge
summary: You commune with the psychic echoes of your ancestors and community, channeling their experiences into yourself.

name: Concealing Legerdemain
summary: Conceal an Object using Thievery instead of Stealth.

name: Conrasu Lore
summary: You have learned about your history and your people from shapers.

name: Conrasu Weapon Familiarity
summary: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector.

name: Consult the Stars
summary: You find wisdom in the movements of the heavens.

name: Contract Negotiator
summary: Your experience with bargaining and deciding terms as part of Highhelm's guilds helps you make deals in other situations.

name: Cooperative Leadership
summary: Leaders gain increased bonuses to aid each other

name: Cooperative Nature
summary: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness.

name: Corgi Mount
summary: The smallest of fey have ridden corgis as mounts since time immemorial, leading to a pattern on corgis' backs called a “faerie saddle.

name: Counter Thought
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell that has the mental trait and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own mental magic to disrupt it.

name: Counterspell
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

name: Courteous Comeback
summary: You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit.

name: Courtly Graces
summary: Get along in noble society

name: Cover Fire
summary: You lay down suppressive fire to protect allies by forcing foes to take cover from your wild attacks.

name: Crafter's Appraisal
summary: Use Crafting to identify magic items.

name: Crane Stance
summary: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.

name: Creative Prodigy
summary: You have a powerful creative drive, useful for prevarication and performance.

name: Cringe
summary: With pitiful posturing, you cause your foe to pull back a deadly attack.

name: Critter Shape
summary: Once per hour, you can use Change Shape to enter a critter shape.

name: Crossbow Ace
summary: Your deep understanding of the crossbow allows you to reload efficiently while moving yourself out of the line of return fire.

name: Crossbow Crack Shot
summary: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow.

name: Crunch
summary: Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor.

name: Crush Dissent
summary: Quell Dissent more efficiently

name: Crystal Healing
summary: You know how to stimulate a body's natural healing abilities through the application of resonant crystals.

name: Crystal Luminescence
summary: Your horn glows with bioluminescent color, casting bright light in a 20-foot emanation (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

name: Cynical
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: You've been approached with suspicion and distrust throughout your life and return these sentiments back to the strangers you encounter.

name: Dangerous Sorcery
summary: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

name: Deadly Simplicity
prerequisite: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
summary: When you are wielding your deity’s favored weapon, increase the damage die size of that weapon by one step.

name: Deceptive Worship
summary: Pass yourself off as a member of a religion.

name: Deepvision
summary: Your vision is suited for night or the underground.

name: Deflecting Wave
summary: A cascade of water blunts or disperses the incoming attack.

name: Deity's Domain
summary: You embody an aspect of your deity.

name: Deliberate Death
summary: Once, you died because someone—murderer or monster, soldier or executioner— chose to strike you down.

name: Demonbane Warrior
summary: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against demons.

name: Desperate Prayer
summary: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

name: Devil's Advocate
summary: You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe.

name: Diehard
summary: Die at dying 5, rather than dying 4

name: Different Worlds
prerequisite: ability to select ancestry feats from multiple ancestries
summary: Create a second identity for yourself with a different name, history, and background.

name: Dig Quickly
summary: Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole.

name: Disarming Flair
summary: It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

name: Distracting Shadows
summary: You have learned to remain hidden by using larger folk as a distraction to avoid drawing attention to yourself.

name: Diverse Lore
summary: Your wandering studies mean you've heard rumors or theories about almost every topic...

name: Divine Castigation
summary: Your deity’s grace doesn’t extend to your sworn enemies.

name: Divine Disharmony
summary: From your collection of religious trinkets, you pull out opposing divine objects—such as the religious symbols of two deities that are hated enemies—and combine them in a display that causes discordant clashes of divine energy that are especially distracting to the faithful.

name: Domain Initiate
summary: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

name: Dongun Education
summary: You're knowledgeable in trades that are important to your people's survival and commercial interests.

name: Double Slice
summary: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

name: Draconic Arrogance
summary: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

name: Draconic Sycophant
summary: You have an affect that dragonkind find unusually pleasing—and when that fails, you know when to duck.

name: Dragon Spit
summary: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true—you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

name: Dragon Stance
summary: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.

name: Dragon's Presence
summary: As a member of dragonkind, you project unflappable confidence

name: Dream May
summary: You are the child of a cuckoo hag, making one of your eyes violet or even black.

name: Dual Studies
summary: You and your eidolon have some skills you practice on your own.

name: Dual-Weapon Reload (Gunslinger)
summary: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.

name: Dualborn
summary: Your suli heritage can be traced back to two geniekin ancestors of opposing elements, or to an elemental ancestor that embodied two combined elements.

name: Dubious Knowledge
prerequisite: trained in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action
summary: Learn true and erroneous knowledge on failed check

name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
summary: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.

name: Duskwalker Lore
summary: You either found another duskwalker who taught you the secrets of your kind, or you managed to research your unusual heritage.

name: Dustsoul
summary: Your earth elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as dust and dirt, like the soil of a field or the hot desert sands.

name: Dwarven Doughtiness
summary: You are naturally calm and collected in the face of imminent danger.

name: Dwarven Lore
summary: You eagerly absorbed the old stories and traditions of your ancestors, your gods, and your people.

name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
summary: Your kin have instilled in you an affinity for hard-hitting weapons, and you prefer these to more elegant arms.

name: Earned Glory
summary: Elves often struggle with underestimating aiuvarins, and you are experienced at telling stories of your accomplishments to gain their respect.

name: Eidetic Ear
summary: You have an amazing memory for sound.

name: Elemental Assault
summary: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic.

name: Elemental Embellish
summary: You can summon a harmless but impressive elemental display.

name: Elemental Eyes
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as an elemental.

name: Elemental Familiar (Kineticist)
summary: A small creature made of elemental matter springs forth from your kinetic gate.

name: Elemental Lore
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: You've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the Inner Sphere.

name: Elemental Trade
summary: You have a strong connection with stone and metal.

name: Elemental Wrath
summary: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elf Atavism
summary: Your elven blood runs particularly strong, granting you features far more elven than those of a typical aiuvarin.

name: Elven Aloofness
summary: As much as you might care for them, you've come to terms with the ephemeral nature of non-elves, and it makes their threats feel less troublesome.

name: Elven Lore
summary: You've studied traditional elven arts, learning about arcane magic and the world around you.

name: Elven Verve
summary: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds.

name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor bows and other elegant weapons.

name: Ember's Eyes
summary: Your eyes blaze with inner flame.

name: Emberkin
summary: A peri's roaring spirit burns in your soul.

name: Embodied Legionary Subjectivity
summary: Nex's Fleshforges shaped you not to achieve individual greatness at arms, but rather to become a part of a legion, a modular piece integral to the combined arms stratagems of Nexian battlemages.

name: Emotional Partitions
summary: You have created strong mental partitions in your mind to filter out negative emotional influences.

name: Emotionless
summary: Your malfunctioning emotional processors make it difficult for you to feel strong emotions.

name: Empathetic Plea
summary: The way you cringe or use those puppydog eyes you've been practicing elicits an empathetic response in the attacker.

name: Energy Beam
summary: You can channel your core's power through the magical gem that serves as your eye.

name: Energy Heart
summary: Your eidolon's heart beats with energy.

name: Eschew Materials
summary: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

name: Esteemed Visitor
summary: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust.

name: Eternal Torch
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Light, Manipulate, Primal
summary: You open a connection to your kinetic gate, large enough for a torch flame to flow.

name: Evanescent Wings
summary: You've manifested wings that can flutter for brief spurts.

name: Everstand Stance
summary: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

name: Exacting Strike
summary: You make a controlled follow-up attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

name: Expanded Senses
summary: Your eidolon evolves more acute senses.

name: Experienced Professional
summary: Prevent critical failures when Earning Income

name: Experienced Smuggler
summary: Conceal items from observers more effectively

name: Experienced Tracker
summary: Track at your full Speed at a –5 penalty

name: Explosive Leap
summary: You aim an explosion from your innovation downward to launch yourself into the air.

name: Explosive Savant
summary: A lifetime wielding firearms and explosive ordinance amid the chaos of battle has granted you great skill with volatile weapons.

name: Express Rider
summary: Increase your mount’s travel speed.

name: Extend Boost
summary: You can increase the duration of your eidolon's boosts.

name: Extended Kinesis
summary: You've refined the control you can exert over your elements.

name: Extra Squishy
summary: Your rubbery physique makes it easier for you to wedge yourself into tight spaces and more difficult for your enemies to dislodge you.

name: Eye for Numbers
summary: +2 to Decipher Writing about math and count items quickly.

name: Eye for Treasure
summary: You know good artisanship when you see it and can wax poetic about crafting techniques and forms.

name: Eyes of the Night
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire.

name: False Faith
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 63</row>
summary: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

name: Familiar
summary: You make a pact with a creature that serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Fang Sharpener
prerequisite: Irongut Goblin heritage or Razortooth Goblin heritage
summary: You have filed your teeth into jagged points and have an unusually powerful jaw, making your mouth a dangerous weapon.

name: Fangs
summary: Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood.

name: Far Lobber
summary: You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance.

name: Fascinating Performance
summary: Perform to fascinate observers

name: Fast Recovery
summary: Regain more HP from rest, recover faster from disease

name: Faultspawn
summary: You bear a grudge, inherited from a blasphemous asura forebear in your bloodline, against a particular deity and their works.

name: Feather Step
summary: Step into difficult terrain

name: Ferrousoul
summary: The elemental metal in your soul resonates strongly with iron, bronze, and other sturdy, practical metals suitable for weaponry.

name: Fetchling Lore
summary: You've learned obscure lessons about your fellow fetchlings.

name: Fey Cantrips
summary: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial.

name: Fey Fellowship
summary: Your enhanced fey connection (either through your blood or via prolonged contact with their kind) affords you a warmer reception from creatures of the First World as well as tools to foil their tricks or withstand their magic.

name: Fiendish Eyes
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as a fiend.

name: Fiendish Lore
summary: You were raised by a tiefling or a fiendish relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the fiendish realms.

name: Fire Lung
summary: A lifetime of proximity to flames has inured your lungs and eyes to smoke.

name: Fire Savvy
summary: You've grown up around a forge and are well-suited to dealing with smoke and flame.

name: First World Magic
summary: Your connection to the First World grants you a primal innate spell, much like those of the fey.

name: Flash Forge
summary: An artificial metal object forms in the hands of you or a willing ally within 30 feet.

name: Fleet
summary: Increase your Speed by 5 feet

name: Flexible Form
summary: Your body is as supple as a sapling, capable of bending without breaking.

name: Flexible Studies
summary: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks.

name: Flying Blade
summary: You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

name: Flying Flame
summary: A Tiny shape of flame appears, taking a form of your choice— such as a bird, an arrow, or a simple sphere.

name: Focused Fascination
summary: When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to fascinate your target.

name: Folksy Patter
summary: You are adept at disguising coded messages as folksy idioms.

name: Forager
summary: Forage for supplies to provide for multiple creatures

name: Forensic Acumen
summary: Rapidly examine a body and Recall Knowledge about it.

name: Forge-Day's Rest
summary: Your unusual rest cycle allows you to recover faster.

name: Forlorn
summary: Watching your friends age and die fills you with moroseness that protects you against harmful emotions.

name: Fortified Fiefs
summary: Gain bonuses to Fortify, and Construct or Rebuild certain buildings easier

name: Four Winds
summary: Mimicking the anemoi—monarchs of the four winds—you propel four creatures.

name: Foxfire
summary: A crack of your tail sparks wisps of blue energy.

name: Fresh Produce
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Vitality, Wood
summary: You grow a nourishing nut, vegetable, seed, or fruit.

name: Fumesoul
summary: The air inside you asserts itself as a toxic miasma, inuring you to most poisons.

name: Ganzi Gaze
summary: You have unusual sensory abilities passed down from your chaotic forebears.

name: Gemsoul
summary: The earth inside you asserts itself as crystallized gemstones or metals, like a cluster of quartz or veins of iron and gold.

name: General Training
summary: Your adaptability manifests in your mastery of a range of useful abilities.

name: Genie Weapon Familiarity
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: You've trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors.

name: Geologic Attunement
summary: You tune to the earth and stone around you, extending your senses through it in rippling waves.

name: Ghoran Lore
summary: The very first memories ghorans have are those of their creation, and even after thousands of years, those memories have never faded for you.

name: Ghoran Weapon Familiarity
summary: Over the course of your long, long existence, you've had a chance to practice with traditional ghoran weapons.

name: Ghost Hunter
summary: Your connection to the Boneyard ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings.

name: Gildedsoul
summary: Your elemental lineage manifests in the polished gleam of precious metals.

name: Glean Contents
summary: Decipher Writing even when you can’t see the document well.

name: Glean Lore
summary: You tap into the collected lore of the divine, accessing a variety of potentially useful information.

name: Glider Form
summary: Your eidolon evolves wings, a buoyant body, or some other means to control descent.

name: Gloomseer
summary: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light.

name: Gnoll Lore
summary: You paid attention to your senior hunters to learn their tricks.

name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
summary: You were taught to be a hunter and a raider.

name: Gnome Obsession
summary: You might have a flighty nature, but when a topic captures your attention, you dive into it headfirst.

name: Gnome Polyglot
summary: Your extensive travels, curiosity, and love of learning help you to learn languages quickly.

name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor unusual weapons tied to your people, such as blades with curved and peculiar shapes.

name: Goading Feint
summary: When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: Goblin Lore
summary: You've picked up skills and tales from your goblin community.

name: Goblin Scuttle
summary: You take advantage of your ally's movement to adjust your position.

name: Goblin Song
summary: You sing annoying goblin songs, distracting your foes with silly and repetitive lyrics.

name: Goblin Weapon Familiarity
summary: Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp.

name: Goloma Courage
summary: The most important thing you've learned living with fear is how to overcome it.

name: Goloma Lore
summary: You lived an insulated life focused on avoiding danger.

name: Gorilla Stance
summary: You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance.

name: Grasping Reach
summary: You can extend a tangle of vines or tendrils to support your arms and extend your reach.

name: Gravesight
summary: You can see in the darkness as easily as a psychopomp.

name: Gravity Weapon
summary: Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

name: Grim Insight
summary: Others’ attempts to scare you often grant you insights about your would-be bullies that you can then exploit.

name: Grimspawn
summary: Your lineage traces back to a daemon, one of the manifestations of horrific forms of death that devour souls within their foul home of Abaddon.

name: Grippli Lore
summary: You are well versed in grippli culture and tactics.

name: Grippli Weapon Familiarity
summary: You've trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests.

name: Group Coercion
summary: Coerce multiple targets simultaneously

name: Group Impression
summary: Make an Impression on multiple targets more easily

name: Grove-Harbored
summary: You are accustomed to exploring thick woodlands and defending yourself against the attacks of magical plants.

name: Hag Claws
summary: When you came of age, your fingernails grew long and sharp.

name: Hag's Sight
summary: You’ve nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight.

name: Hail of Splinters
summary: A fusillade of jagged splinters flies from you.

name: Halfling Lore
summary: You've dutifully learned how to keep your balance and how to stick to the shadows where it's safe, important skills passed down through generations of halfling tradition.

name: Halfling Luck
summary: Your happy-go-lucky nature makes it seem like misfortune avoids you, and to an extent, that might even be true.

name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor traditional halfling weapons, so you've learned how to use them more effectively.

name: Halo
summary: You have a halo of light and goodness that sheds light with the effects of a divine _light_ cantrip.

name: Handy with Your Paws
summary: You can easily craft objects.

name: Haphazard Repair
summary: You quickly fix your innovation, at the cost of its stability.

name: Hard Tail
summary: Your tail is much stronger than most, and you can lash out with it with the strength of a whip.

name: Hard to Fool
summary: You're accustomed to seeing through shifting darkness and bewildering magic.

name: Hardwood Armor
summary: Wood and bark grow over your body like armor.

name: Harming Hands
summary: The mordant power of your void energy grows.

name: Harmless Doll
summary: You look like nothing more than an ordinary toy, doll, or statuette, and you can fool others with your innocuous appearance.

name: Harmlessly Cute
summary: Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm.

name: Haughty Obstinacy
summary: Your powerful ego makes it harder for others to order you around.

name: Haunt Ingenuity
summary: Your cunning knowledge grants you the ability to notice the emotional echo of a soul that passed on, leaving a haunt in its wake.

name: Heal Companion
summary: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds.

name: Healing Hands
summary: Your vitality is even more vibrant and restorative.

name: Hefty Hauler
summary: Increase your Bulk limits by 2

name: Hellspawn
summary: Your lineage descends from devils, conniving schemers of Hell.

name: Helpful Poppet
summary: You're particularly skilled at helping others with a task.

name: Hidden Thorn
summary: Some flowers can hide their thorns, and yours happen to be hidden along your arms.

name: Hit the Dirt!
summary: You fling yourself out of harm's way.

name: Hobgoblin Lore
summary: You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent.

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity
summary: You are trained with composite longbows, composite shortbows, glaives, longbows, longswords, and shortbows.

name: Hobnobber
summary: Gather Information rapidly

name: Hold Mark
summary: You bear scars or tattoos enhanced by the mark of your community’s prowess.

name: Hunted Shot
summary: You take two quick shots against the one you hunt.

name: Hunter's Defense
summary: Your canny understanding of natural and primal creatures helps you predict and dodge their attacks.

name: Hydraulic Deflection
summary: Drawing moisture from the atmosphere, you create a disc of hovering water that deflects attacks.

name: Hyena Familiar
summary: Hyenas serve gnolls as pets, trackers, and in your case, vessels for spirits.

name: Hymn of Healing
summary: You learn the hymn of healing composition spell, which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.

name: Idyllkin
summary: Your wild, unique features betray your agathion birthright.

name: Illusion Sense
summary: Your ancestors spent their days cloaked and cradled in illusions, and as a result, sensing illusion magic is second nature to you.

name: Impressive Performance
summary: Make an Impression with Performance

name: Improvisational Defender
summary: You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times.

name: Improvise Tool
summary: Craft basic tools without a basic crafter’s book.

name: Incredible Initiative
summary: +2 to initiative rolls

name: Initiate Warden
summary: You’ve trained with one of the ranger sects known as wardens, who practice a specialized type of primal magic.

name: Inner Fire
summary: You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand.

name: Innocuous
summary: Halflings have been unobtrusive assistants of larger folk for untold ages, and your people count on this assumption of innocence.

name: Inoculation
summary: Grant patients +2 to saves against getting a disease again.

name: Insider Trading
summary: +1 to Work Camp, Establish Trade Agreement, and Trade Commodities activities

name: Internal Cohesion
summary: Axis's order suffuses your body and helps it maintain coherency.

name: Internal Compartment
summary: You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms.

name: Intimidating Glare
summary: Demoralize a creature without speaking

name: Intuitive Cooperation
summary: You are accustomed to working alongside others, relying on each other to get by.

name: Intuitive Crafting
summary: Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan.

name: Inventive Offensive
summary: You can jury-rig your weapons to perform in unexpected ways.

name: Iron Fists
summary: Your fists have been forged by battle, your naturally tough skin and dense bone further hardened by conflict.

name: Iron Repercussions
summary: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)
summary: Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice.

name: Jungle Strider
summary: You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles.

name: Junk Tinker
summary: You can make useful tools out of even twisted or rusted scraps.

name: Keep Up Appearances
summary: Taldan pride means you never show weakness.

name: Ki Rush
summary: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit.

name: Ki Strike
summary: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.

name: Kingdom Assurance
prerequisite: Trained in at least three skills
summary: Receive a fixed result on a skill check

name: Kitsune Lore
summary: You excel at navigating social situations and keeping secrets.

name: Kitsune Spell Familiarity
summary: You've picked up a few magical tricks.

name: Know Oneself
summary: You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge.

name: Know Your Own
summary: You've spent countless hours studying the history of elves on your world and beyond and are a studied expert in your people's ways.

name: Known Weaknesses
summary: Whenever you Devise a Stratagem, you can also attempt a check to Recall Knowledge as part of that action.

name: Kobold Breath
summary: You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy.

name: Kobold Lore
summary: You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies and mythology from your elders.

name: Kobold Weapon Familiarity
summary: You've trained with weapons ideal for subterranean efficiency.

name: Lavasoul
summary: Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes.

name: Lawbringer
summary: You trace your lineage to archons, guardians of the seventiered mountain of Heaven and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals.

name: Leech-Clipper
summary: You are trained to capture deserters, or “leeches”.

name: Lemma of Vision
summary: You've solved a tiny stepping stone in your self-discovery, awakening new depths in your sight.

name: Lengthy Diversion
summary: Remain hidden after you Create a Diversion

name: Leshy Familiar
summary: You call a minor spirit of nature into a plant body, creating a leshy companion to aid you in your spellcasting.

name: Leshy Lore
summary: You deeply understand your people’s cultural traditions and innate strengths.

name: Leshy Superstition
summary: You notice spirits that inhabit objects, learning which bring good fortune and which are unlucky.

name: Lesser Enhance Venom
summary: Your venom grows deadlier and more plentiful.

name: Lie to Me
summary: Use Deception to detect lies

name: Life-Giving Magic
summary: The upwelling of innate magic refreshes your body.

name: Lightning Tongue
summary: Your tongue darts out faster than the eye can see to retrieve loose objects.

name: Lingering Composition
summary: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

name: Living Weapon
summary: You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon.

name: Lizardfolk Lore
summary: You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community.

name: Magnetic Pinions
summary: Small pieces of metal fly from you, propelled with magnetism at great velocity.

name: Magus's Analysis
summary: You make an assessment informed by your knowledge of how a creature fights.

name: Maiden's Mending
summary: You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life.

name: Mariner's Fire
summary: You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface.

name: Marsh Runner
summary: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain.

name: Martial Performance
summary: Your muse has taught you how to handle a wider variety of weapons than most bards, empowering you to effortlessly blend your performance into combat tools.

name: Medical Researcher
summary: Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well.

name: Meld into Eidolon
summary: Your physical form can combine with that of your eidolon, granting benefits but limiting your capabilities.

name: Mental Buffer
summary: Your mind deflects some amount of harm from attacks that induce pain or manipulate your mind directly.

name: Mental Sustenance
summary: You can sustain yourself with the power of your mind.

name: Metal Carapace
summary: Sheets of bent and rusted metal cover you in an armored shell.

name: Miresoul
summary: You have a connection to the muddier denizens of the Plane of Earth from its border with the Plane of Water, and your elemental lineage manifests as clay or mud, reflecting that bond.

name: Mirror-Risen
summary: You were created from magic involving mirrors and still retain some ability to seek refuge in reflected illusions.

name: Mistsoul
summary: You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist.

name: Moldersoul
summary: Your connection to elemental wood asserts itself in the form of decay, like forgotten logs left to rot and the char that remains after a forest fire, cycles of devastation clearing away what was to make room for the next generation of life.

name: Molten Wit
summary: Your elemental soul has sparked not just your body but also your mind.

name: Moment of Clarity
summary: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

name: Monastic Archer Stance
summary: You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow.

name: Monastic Weaponry
summary: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school.

name: Monster Hunter
summary: You quickly assess your prey and apply what you know.

name: Monstrous Peacemaker
summary: Your dual human and orc nature has given you a unique perspective, allowing you to bridge the gap between humans and the many intelligent creatures in the world that humans consider monsters.

name: Moon May
summary: Your mother was a moon hag, a handmaiden of Groetus, and you have a single scarlet eye and a sliver of her supernal foresight.

name: Morph-Risen
summary: You were once a shapeshifter or spellcaster using polymorph magic, but something went wrong, and you became trapped in the form of the creature you were imitating.

name: Mountain Stance
summary: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.

name: Mountain Strategy
summary: Dwarves have a long history fighting common foes, and you've mastered the ancient tactics to better face these enemies.

name: Muddle Through
summary: Ruin accumulates more slowly

name: Multilingual
summary: Learn two new languages

name: Munitions Crafter
summary: Bullets and bombs can be scarce in some parts, so you've learned to make your own.

name: Musetouched
summary: Your blood sings with the liberating power of the azatas.

name: Nagaji Lore
summary: You're the vassal or apprentice of a learned naga, and you've studied the secrets of naga magic and concocting intricate poisons.

name: Nagaji Spell Familiarity
summary: Either through study, exposure, or familial devotion, you have the magic of nagas bubbling in your blood.

name: Nanite Surge
summary: You stimulate your nanites, forcing your body to temporarily increase its efficiency.

name: Native Waters
summary: You were born with or obtained a special connection to either fresh water or salt water.

name: Natural Ambition
summary: You were raised to be ambitious and always reach for the stars, leading you to progress quickly in your chosen field.

name: Natural Medicine
summary: Use Nature to Treat Wounds

name: Natural Performer
summary: Entertainment comes naturally to you.

name: Natural Skill
summary: Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills.

name: Nephilim Eyes
summary: Your eyes can see through darkness with visual acuity akin to that possessed by most extraplanar beings.

name: Nephilim Lore
summary: You know the secrets of the Multiverse.

name: Nestling Fall
summary: You trust the strength of your wings and can spread them to glide safely to the ground.

name: Nightvision Adaptation
summary: The nanites in your ocular processors have adapted to darkness, enhancing your ability to see in the dark.

name: Nimble Dodge
summary: You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

name: Nimble Elf
summary: Your muscles are tightly honed.

name: Nimble Hooves
summary: You possess hooves, ankle wings, or some other feature that hastens your movement.

name: No Cause for Alarm
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, General, Linguistic, Mental, Skill
summary: Reduce creatures’ frightened condition values

name: No! No! I Created You!
summary: You appeal to your construct companion's bond with its creator to have it break free of a controlling effect.

name: Nocturnal Charm
summary: The supernatural charm of your vampiric progenitor hangs about you, and you've learned to use it on mortals.

name: Nocturnal Grippli
summary: You tend to do most of your hunting and work at night and have adapted to the requirements of nocturnal life.

name: Nosoi's Mask
summary: Many psychopomps wear masks when dealing with the living, and many cultures believe that seeing an unmasked psychopomp's face invites death.

name: Ocean's Balm
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Primal, Vitality, Water
summary: A blessing of the living sea salves wounds and douses flames.

name: Oddity Identification
summary: Recognize magic involving minds, fortune, or secrets

name: Old Soul
summary: Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way.

name: One for All
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, Linguistic, Mental, Swashbuckler
summary: With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

name: Ongoing Selfishness
summary: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

name: Open Mind
summary: You have inherent psychic abilities that allow you to tap into the power of your mind.

name: Orc Ferocity
summary: Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries no matter how terrible they may be.

name: Orc Lore
summary: The hold elders taught you your people’s histories, told tales of great athletic feats, and shared with you the hardships your ancestors endured so that you can pass this wisdom down to future generations.

name: Orc Sight
summary: Your orc blood grants you the keen vision of your forebears.

name: Orc Superstition
summary: You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions.

name: Orc Warmask
summary: You paint your face to create a _warmask_.

name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
summary: In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors.

name: Otherworldly Magic
summary: Your elven magic manifests as a simple arcane spell, even if you aren't formally trained in magic.

name: Overextending Feint
summary: You goad a foe into overextending.

name: Overlooked Mastermind
summary: Many consider half-orcs little more than dumb brutes.

name: Pack Hunter
summary: You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack.

name: Pack Rat
summary: Years of packing for travel have taught you how to cram vast quantities into small spaces.

name: Parthenogenic Hatchling
summary: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother.

name: Pelagic Aptitude
summary: You've learned special tricks to survive underwater.

name: Perfect Dive
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall.

name: Pet
summary: You have a loyal pet

name: Pickpocket
summary: Steal or Palm an Object more effectively

name: Pierce the Darkness
summary: Your eyes have adapted to see in all circumstances, even without the assistance of light.

name: Pilgrim's Token
summary: A religious token lets you act ﬁrst on a tie for initiative.

name: Pitborn
summary: Your blood bears the mark of a demon.

name: Plant Empathy
summary: You have a connection to flora that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Plant Evidence
summary: You can put a single item you’re holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing by succeeding at a Thievery check against their Perception DC.

name: Play Dead
summary: You lie prone and pretend to be an ordinary skeleton.

name: Plumekith
summary: Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors.

name: Point Blank Stance
summary: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

name: Practical Magic
summary: +1 to Magic checks, use Magic instead of Engineering

name: Prairie Rider
summary: You grew up riding your clan's shaggy ponies and riding dogs.

name: Premonition of Avoidance
summary: Your deity grants you a moment’s foresight.

name: Progenitor Lore
summary: You didn't just inherit your physical form from your progenitor; you also retained some of their knowledge.

name: Prototype Companion
summary: You have created a construct companion, and while it might not be an innovation, it serves as a trustworthy minion.

name: Proximity Alert
summary: You're unnaturally in tune with your surroundings and react instinctively to danger.

name: Psychic Rapport
summary: Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures.

name: Pull Together
summary: Your citizens help mitigate failures

name: Puncturing Horn
summary: While many kashrishi never use their horns for more than cracking open hard-shelled fruits or amplifying their psychic powers, you've practiced using yours offensively.

name: Pyrophilic Recovery
summary: You rely on fire and extreme heat to sprout and regrow.

name: Quadruped
summary: You were crafted in a form with four legs rather than two.

name: Quah Bond
summary: You grew up among the Shoanti tribes, with the spirits watching over you, and they offer you guidance.

name: Quick Bomber
summary: You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking.

name: Quick Coercion
summary: Coerce a creature quickly

name: Quick Identification
prerequisite: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
summary: Identify Magic in 1 minute or less

name: Quick Jump
summary: High Jump or Long Jump as a single action

name: Quick Repair
summary: Repair items quickly

name: Quick Shape
summary: Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance.

name: Quick Squeeze
summary: Move swiftly as you Squeeze

name: Quicksoul
summary: The elemental metal in your bloodline literally courses through your veins.

name: Radiant Circuitry
summary: Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

name: Raging Intimidation
summary: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

name: Raging Thrower
summary: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

name: Rain of Embers Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">PFS Guide pg. 118, PFS Quest #2: Unforgiving Fire pg. 20</row>
summary: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames.

name: Raise a Tome
summary: You raise up the book you're holding and flip it open to defend yourself and expedite your studies.

name: Ranged Reprisal
summary: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

name: Rat Familiar
summary: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you.

name: Ratfolk Lore
summary: Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten.

name: Ratspeak
summary: To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense.

name: Ravening's Desperation
summary: Your study of the Beast of Gluttondark has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness.

name: Razor Claws
summary: Your have honed your claws to be deadly.

name: Razzle-Dazzle
summary: You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights.

name: Reach Spell
trait: Bard, Cleric, Concentrate, Druid, Oracle, Sorcerer, Spellshape, Witch, Wizard
summary: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Reactive Shield
summary: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

name: Read Lips
summary: Read the lips of people you can see

name: Read Psychometric Resonance
trait: Concentrate, Divination, Emotion, Exploration, General, Mental, Occult, Skill, Uncommon
summary: With a touch, you can read the psychic impressions left on objects by their previous owners.

name: Reassuring Presence
summary: You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress.

name: Recognize Spell
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: Identify a spell as a reaction as it’s being cast

name: Reflective Defense
summary: Your body's natural luster has been polished to a gleaming shine.

name: Reflective Ripple Stance
summary: You enter a stance of fluid grace as small amounts of water flow with your movements and attacks.

name: Reinforced Chassis
summary: Your body is designed to be particularly resilient.

name: Remorseless Lash
summary: You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking.

name: Reptile Rider
summary: To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters.

name: Reptile Speaker
summary: You hear the sounds of reptiles as language.

name: Retractable Claws
summary: You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage.

name: Reveal True Name
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, General, Mental, Rare, Skill, True Name
prerequisite: trained in Intimidation and at least one of Arcana, Nature, Occult, and Religion
summary: You attempt to get a creature to do as you wish by threatening them with your knowledge of their true name.

name: Ride
summary: Automatically succeed at commanding your mount to move

name: Riftmarked
summary: Long ago, qlippoth marked someone in your lineage, most likely through their ancient runestones that dot Golarion's surface.

name: Rimesoul
summary: The water inside you is cold and frozen, like sheets of ice and frigid glaciers.

name: Risky Surgery
summary: Deal damage to a patient to gain +2 to Treat Wounds.

name: Rivethun Disciple
summary: By studying with the dwarven shamans of Highhelm, you have become aware of the friction between your body and spirit.

name: Rock Runner
summary: Your innate connection to stone makes you adept at moving across uneven surfaces.

name: Root Magic
summary: Create a token that grants a bonus against a spell or haunt.

name: Root to Life
summary: Marigold, spider lily, pennyroyal—many primal traditions connect flowers and plants with the boundary between life and death, and you can leverage this association to keep an ally on this side of the line.

name: Rough Rider
summary: You are especially good at riding traditional goblin mounts.

name: Round Ears
summary: Your elven lineage is subtle enough that you look barely different from other humans, and you’ve learned to use that to your advantage.

name: Ru-Shi
summary: You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia.

name: Saberteeth
summary: You have long fangs, natural or augmented.

name: Saoc Astrology
summary: The ancient Saoc Brethren were the masters of astrology, and while your knowledge may be but a pale shadow of their wisdom, it still comes in handy.

name: Scamper
summary: You instinctively know how to flee danger.

name: Scamper Underfoot
summary: You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease.

name: Scavenger's Search
summary: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables.

name: Scholar's Inheritance
summary: Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy.

name: Schooled in Secrets
summary: Gather Information about and Impersonate members  of secret societies

name: Scorching Column
summary: With an upward gesture, you shape a vertical column of extreme heat.

name: Scroll Thaumaturgy
summary: Your multidisciplinary study of magic means you know how to activate the magic in scrolls with ease.

name: Scuttle Up
summary: Your environment requires you to climb cave walls or tree trunks with great regularity.

name: Seasoned
prerequisite: Trained in Alcohol Lore, Trained in Cooking Lore, or Trained in Crafting
summary: +1 to Craft food and drink, including elixirs and potions

name: Secret Speech
summary: Learn the secret language of a society.

name: Seedpod
summary: Your body produces a nearly endless supply of hard seedpods.

name: Sensitive Nose
summary: Your large black nose isn't just for show.

name: Serpent's Tongue
summary: You subconsciously flick your tongue through the air to taste the world around you.

name: Shackleborn
summary: Your lineage shows the signs of velstrac tampering, including some curious quirk bequeathed by those shadowy surgeons of flesh and souls.

name: Shadow Blending
summary: You draw shadows close to create a shroud.

name: Shadow of the Wilds
summary: It’s difficult to notice your passage through wild areas.

name: Shapechanger's Intuition
summary: A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises.

name: Shard Strike
summary: Jagged metal shards form in the air and lash out from you.

name: Share Thoughts
prerequisite: Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity
summary: You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers.

name: Sharp Fangs
summary: Your teeth are formidable weapons.

name: Shield Block
summary: Ward off a blow with your shield

name: Shiny Button Eyes
summary: You've polished your eyes to reflect the smallest details in dimmest light.

name: Shisk Lore
summary: You hoard knowledge like a dragon hoards gold.

name: Shoony Lore
summary: Growing up in shoony society, you learned the value of honesty, friendship, and hard work, even during trying times.

name: Shore Step
summary: The shallows and tide pools have always called to you and let you pass unhindered.

name: Shrouded Magic
summary: Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list.

name: Shrouded Mien
summary: You're used to dealing with dangerous situations and sinister creatures.

name: Sign Language
summary: Learn sign languages

name: Silent Stone
summary: You've lived in the shadow of the Shattered Range, and the patience of those ancient mountains expresses itself in your stillness.

name: Sinister Appearance
summary: You possess horns, a tail, or red eyes, or could otherwise be mistaken for a tiefling.

name: Skill Training
summary: Become trained in a skill

name: Skill Training (Kingdom)
summary: Become trained in a Kingdom skill

name: Skittertalk
summary: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with spiders and other arachnids.

name: Skull Creeper
summary: You wear skulls to demoralize foes.

name: Slag May
summary: Your mother was an iron hag known for physical prowess, and you have one violet or steel-gray eye.

name: Slink
summary: You can move through gloom with the speed of darkness.

name: Slither
summary: You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces.

name: Smashing Tail
summary: You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon.

name: Smokesoul
summary: You have a connection to smoke and haze.

name: Snagging Strike
summary: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

name: Snare Crafting
summary: Craft snares.

name: Snare Setter
summary: You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of trap making.

name: Sneaky
summary: Stealth is an important tool in your arsenal.

name: Snow May
summary: You're the child of a winter hag, with one blue-white eye and an affinity for rime and snow.

name: Sociable
summary: You’re extremely extroverted, and you often spend your time carousing or otherwise socializing.

name: Social Camouflage
summary: You have the uncanny ability to quickly blend into the lifestyle of whatever settlement in which you find yourself.

name: Speak with Bats
summary: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with bats.

name: Specialty Crafting
summary: Gain bonuses to Craft certain items

name: Spellbook Prodigy
summary: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

name: Spelunker
summary: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground.

name: Spine Stabber
summary: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy.

name: Splinter Faith
summary: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

name: Springsoul
summary: Your connection to elemental wood manifests as fresh blossoms, spring fruits, and the seeds of new life, and you harness this power to spread vitality and abundance.

name: Sprite's Spark
summary: You can fling a portion of your magic at foes.

name: Squawk!
summary: You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas.

name: Star Orb
summary: Your magic has crystallized into a spherical stone.

name: Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)
summary: Your appearance is enough to frighten without words.

name: Steady Balance
summary: Maintain your balance in adverse conditions

name: Steady on Stone
summary: Your connection to the earth makes natural uneven surfaces less of a hindrance for you.

name: Steadying Stone
summary: The earth has taught you how to remain unyielding and firm.

name: Stepping Stones
summary: Disks of rock fly to points that you designate to make a new path.

name: Stitch Flesh
summary: You can use Treat Wounds to restore Hit Points to undead creatures, not just living ones.

name: Stoked Flame Stance
summary: You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements.

name: Stone Face
summary: Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear.

name: Stonemason's Eye
summary: You understand the intricacies of stonework.

name: Storm Born
summary: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

name: Storm's Lash
summary: Wind and lightning have always been close friends to you.

name: Stormsoul
summary: Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning.

name: Story Crooner
summary: You're a talented story weaver and use your voice effectively.

name: Straveika
summary: You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth.

name: Streetwise
summary: Use Society to Gather Information and Recall Knowledge

name: Striking Retribution
summary: You have an appropriately intense hatred for alghollthus.

name: Strix Defender
summary: Your ancestral feud with humans gives you experience dealing with vicious foes, and your vengeance knows no bounds.

name: Strix Lore
summary: You're well connected to your tribe and perhaps even strix communities beyond your own, where you've learned about the land and techniques of graceful movement.

name: Student of the Canon
summary: More accurately recognize the tenets of your faith or philosophy

name: Studious Magic
summary: You've taken an interest in anadi arcane traditions.

name: Stumbling Stance
summary: You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

name: Subtle Delivery
summary: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.

name: Subtle Theft
summary: Your thefts are harder to notice

name: Sudden Charge
summary: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

name: Sudden Mindfulness
summary: Your mind retains full awareness despite the best attempts of others, and your focus throws others off-balance.

name: Suli-Jann
summary: Your elemental ancestor was a janni, genies that walk the mortal world and embody all four elements together.

name: Sunlit Vitality
summary: You gain nourishment through photosynthesis, like trees and other green plants.

name: Sure Feet
summary: Whether keeping your balance or climbing, your feet easily find purchase.

name: Surface Culture
summary: Your interactions with other cultures on the surface have not only taught you about many other ancestries, but have also helped you realize the value of your own.

name: Surface Skimmer
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 394</row>
summary: By sinking gently beneath the waves, you obscure your presence and utilize the water as a barrier between you and land combatants.

name: Survey Wildlife
summary: Identify nearby creatures through signs and clues

name: Svetocher
summary: You were born to one of the moroi, the most common vampires, and you share their supernatural fortitude and power of persuasion.

name: Swift
summary: You move with the wind always at your back.

name: Sword and Pistol
summary: You're comfortable wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand and a melee weapon in the other, combining melee attacks with shots from the firearm.

name: Syncretism
summary: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

name: Tail Whip
summary: By birth or through training, your tail is strong enough to make for a powerful melee weapon.

name: Takedown Expert
summary: You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

name: Tame Animal
summary: Animals born and raised far from humanoid settlements rarely get along with two-legged beings, whom they assume to be dangerous predators.

name: Tamper
summary: You tamper with a foe's weapon or armor, using a free hand.

name: Tengu Lore
summary: You learned skills for surviving in the place where your people were dispersed.

name: Tengu Weapon Familiarity
summary: You've trained with a blade and other tengu weapons ever since you hatched.

name: Terrain Expertise
summary: +1 to Survival checks in certain terrain

name: Terrain Stalker
summary: Sneak in certain terrain without attempting a check

name: That's Odd
summary: When you enter a new location, such as a room or corridor, you immediately notice one thing out of the ordinary.

name: Theoretical Acumen
summary: You study a creature’s form and behavior to hypothesize likely means of overcoming its strengths.

name: Tidal Hands
summary: With an emphatic gesture, you create waves that rush out from you in the shape of your hands.

name: Tide-Hardened
summary: You're at home in the unpredictable tides.

name: Tiger Stance
summary: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.

name: Timber Sentinel
summary: A slim, symmetrical tree travels from the Plane of Wood.

name: Tinkering Fingers
summary: You're good with your hands and can quickly improvise a fix for broken or damaged equipment.

name: Titan Slinger
summary: You have learned how to use your sling to fell enormous creatures.

name: Titan Wrestler
summary: Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip larger creatures

name: Tough Skin
summary: Your skin is medium armor in the plate armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, and has a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of –2, a Speed penalty of –5 feet, a Strength value of 16, and the comfort trait.

name: Toughness
summary: Increase your maximum HP and reduce the DCs of recovery checks

name: Train Animal
summary: Teach an animal a trick

name: Trap Finder
summary: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the presence of traps.

name: Tremor
summary: You unleash a small, localized tremor in a 10-foot burst within 30 feet.

name: Trick Magic Item
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: Activate a magic item you normally can’t activate

name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
summary: You tumble under and behind your foe, your rapid movement letting you catch them off guard.

name: Tupilaq Carver
prerequisite: You have a spellcasting class feature with the divine or primal tradition
summary: You know the truth behind old stories that tell of sending a fetish of bone and sinew to seek vengeance.

name: Tusks
source: <row gap="tiny">Advanced Player's Guide pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup>, Character Guide pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>
summary: You have particularly long, jagged tusks perfect for tearing meat from bone.

name: Tusks
summary: You have particularly long, jagged tusks perfect for tearing meat from bone.

name: Twin Feint
summary: You use an attack with one weapon to distract your foe from a second attack coming at a different angle.

name: Twin Takedown
summary: You swiftly attack your hunted prey with each of your weapons, potentially combining their damage into a single devastating attack.

name: Twitchy
summary: You are naturally suspicious and wary of danger, especially when you suspect someone might be leading you into an ambush.

name: Unassuming Dedication
summary: Your family instilled the values of care and patience into you from a young age.

name: Unburdened Iron
summary: You've learned techniques first devised by your ancestors during their ancient wars, allowing you to comfortably wear massive suits of armor.

name: Uncanny Agility
summary: You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces.

name: Unconventional Weaponry
summary: You’ve familiarized yourself with a particular weapon, potentially from another ancestry or culture.

name: Undaunted
summary: Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence.

name: Undead Empathy
summary: Your relationship with undeath gives you a stronger bond with other undead.

name: Undead Spotter
summary: Your studies of the undead have taught you tellale signs of a disguised undead creature.

name: Underwater Marauder
summary: Fight more effectively underwater

name: Underworld Investigator
summary: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element.

name: Unexpected Shift
summary: Your supernatural connection sometimes causes you to phase from reality when under threat, disappearing for split seconds before reappearing—often surprising you as much as your enemies.

name: Unfetter Eidolon
summary: You can allow your eidolon to travel far from your side.

name: Unfettered Halfling
summary: You were either pressed into indentured servitude or shackled in a prison, but you've since escaped and have trained to ensure you'll never be caught again.

name: Unimpeded Step
summary: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

name: Untamed Form
summary: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

name: Unwavering Mien
summary: Your mystic control and meditations allow you to resist external influences upon your consciousness.

name: Vampire Lore
summary: You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors.

name: Vanara Lore
summary: You attained the cultural training of a ba-sadhak, a seeker of treasures and rare delights.

name: Vanara Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor weapons steeped in vanaran tradition.

name: Vanth's Weapon Familiarity
summary: You seek to emulate vanth reapers' fighting styles.

name: Variable Core
summary: You adjust your innovation's core, changing the way it explodes.

name: Veil May
summary: Born of a blood hag, a fiery blood drinker hidden behind a false skin, you have one blood-red eye and the ability to slough off your appearance in an instant.

name: Verdant Weapon
summary: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

name: Versatile Blasts
summary: Accessing a wider realm of elemental manifestations, you can make blasts with rare forms of your elements.

name: Versatile Performance
summary: You can rely on the grandeur of your performances rather than ordinary social skills.

name: Very Sneaky
summary: Taller folk rarely pay attention to the shadows at their feet, and you take full advantage of this.

name: Vestigial Wings
summary: You possess small, weak wings that aid in balance.

name: Vibrant Display
summary: Whereas most gnomes’ coloration is static or changes slowly, you can cause your hair, eye, and skin color to scintillate in brief and disorienting bursts.

name: Vicious Critique
prerequisite: Trained in Crafting; Trained in Intimidation
summary: You have an eye for detail and a mouth for pointing out flaws, which makes it all the easier to convince the merchants and crafters of King's Heart to help you.

name: Vicious Incisors
summary: You've let your incisors grow long enough to serve as formidable weapons.

name: Vicious Swing
summary: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

name: Vicious Vengeance
summary: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

name: Vigorous Health
summary: Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well.

name: Viking Shieldbearer
summary: You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself.

name: Vile Desecration
summary: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

name: Virga May
summary: Born of a storm hag, you have one crystal-blue or rain-gray eye.

name: Virtuosic Performer
summary: +1 with a certain type of performance

name: Vishkanya Lore
summary: You deeply understand vishkanyan strengths and cultural traditions.

name: Vishkanya Weapon Familiarity
summary: You favor weapons historically used in subtle work and in ceremony.

name: Voice of the Night
summary: You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with.

name: Warped Reflection
trait: Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Mental, Reflection, Visual
summary: Due to your origins, your form is more flexible than most.

name: Warren Friend
summary: You're adept at making contact with other ysoki.

name: Warren Navigator
summary: You're particularly good at solving mazes and navigating twists and turns.

name: Wash Out
summary: Toxins seep out of your artificial body quickly.

name: Watchful Gaze
summary: You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time.

name: Watchful Halfling
summary: You pay close attention to the people around you, allowing you to more easily notice when they act out of character.

name: Water Nagaji
summary: Much like a water naga, you've formed a connection to a sacred or pristine body of water, either as a home or a place to protect.

name: Waxed Feathers
summary: Your feathers are coated in a waxy substance that repels water.

name: Weapon Infusion
summary: With a signature flair, you shape blasts of elemental power into the form of a weapon, such as a sword made of whirling wind or a bow that shoots flames.
