name: Weapon Proficiency
summary: Become trained in a weapon type

name: Web Walker
summary: You have plenty of practice navigating webs.

name: Web Weaver
summary: You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items.

name: Weight of Guilt
summary: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

name: Well-Met Traveler
summary: You have seen people from so many walks of life in your travels that you naturally adopt a pleasant and affable demeanor when meeting others.

name: Well-Versed
summary: You’re resilient to performative influences that aren’t your own.

name: Whisper on the Wind
trait: Air, Auditory, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Linguistic, Primal
summary: You speak in a whisper, a soft wind carrying your words far away.

name: Whitecape
summary: You're shorter and wider than many vanaras of your heritage, and the hair on your shoulders and your head is particularly thick and luxurious, like a majestic cape.

name: Widen Spell
trait: Druid, Manipulate, Oracle, Sorcerer, Spellshape, Witch, Wizard
summary: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Wildborn Magic
summary: You have learned to access the old magic of wild places.

name: Willing Death
summary: Once, you died because you valued someone else's life above your own; just as then, you protect an ally by suffering in their stead.

name: Wind Pillow
summary: The winds have whispered to you all your life, and the essence of air itself helps you at times, making you somewhat buoyant when you're suspended in space.

name: Wind Tempered
summary: You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds.

name: Winter Cat Senses
summary: Your eyes are keen and accustomed to winter conditions.

name: Winter's Clutch
summary: Gleaming flakes of chilling snow fall in a 10-foot burst within 60 feet.

name: Witch Warden
summary: You and your family have fought long and hard against witches, particularly the winter witches of Irrisen, and you’ve learned to be wary of their curses and the otherworldly powers their patrons grant.

name: Witch's Armaments
summary: Your patron’s power changes your body to ensure you are never defenseless.

name: Wolf Stance
summary: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.

name: Woodcraft
summary: You have a innate familiarity with forested areas.

name: Woodworker
summary: Denizens of the Plane of Wood take immense pride in the magnificent works of art they can craft from wood, and practicing your own woodcraft helps you feel a connection with your planar heritage.

name: Wortwitch
summary: You have a particular affinity for leafy plants.

name: You're Next
trait: Emotion, Fear, Mental, Rogue, Swashbuckler, Visual
summary: After downing a foe, you menace another.

name: Acrobat Dedication
summary: You become an expert in Acrobatics.

name: Acute Scent
summary: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

name: After You
summary: You allow your foes to make the first move in a show of incredible confidence.

name: Aggressive Block
summary: You push back as you block, knocking your foe away or off balance.

name: Alacritous Action
summary: Your eidolon moves more quickly.

name: Alchemist Dedication
summary: Become a multiclass alchemist.

name: Aldori Duelist Dedication
summary: Increase your dedication and training to the Aldori dueling sword.

name: Alkenstar Agent Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 78</row>
summary: You put on the persona of a rough and tumble outlaw, but your real goals are to report threats to Alkenstar back to the grand duchess.

name: Alter Ego Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Deception; Trained in Stealth
summary: You make yourself into a living mirror, becoming a double of someone unremarkable, and you slip into exactly the role that can get you past security or into a sensitive facility.

name: Amphibious Form
summary: Your eidolon adapts to life on land and underwater.

name: Ancestral Weaponry
prerequisite: Monastic Weaponry; a feat granting access to all weapons with an ancestry trait (such as elf or orc)
summary: You blend monastic techniques with the ancestral fighting styles of your people.

name: Animal Empathy (Ranger)
summary: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows you to communicate with them on a rudimentary level.

name: Animal Trainer Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
summary: You gain a young animal companion.

name: Anoint Ally
summary: You forge a mystical connection with an ally using your body as a focus, allowing them to benefit from your magic.

name: Antagonize
summary: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire.

name: Archaeologist Dedication
prerequisite: trained in Perception; Trained in Society; Trained in Thievery
summary: You are a student of peoples and their histories, and are in constant pursuit of knowledge and artifacts from the past.

name: Archer Dedication
summary: You become trained in all simple and martial weapons in the bow weapon group.

name: Armored Stealth
summary: Reduce the Stealth penalty of your armor.

name: Artillerist Dedication
summary: Artillery is a team sport, where every member of the crew has to rely on the other members.

name: Assassin Dedication
prerequisite: Alchemical Crafting; Trained in Crafting; Trained in Deception; Trained in Stealth
summary: You've trained to assassinate your foes, and you do so with tenacity and precision.

name: Assisting Shot
summary: Using your last shot to gauge your accuracy, you can fire off a quick shot to interfere with a foe in combat.

name: Assured Identification
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana, Expert in Nature, Expert in Occultism, or Expert in Religion
summary: Avoid misidentifying magic.

name: Athletic Strategist
summary: You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight.

name: Aura Sight
trait: Concentrate, Exploration, General, Secret, Skill, Uncommon
summary: You've learned how to read the natural auras of other living creatures.

name: Automatic Knowledge
prerequisite: expert in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Assurance in that skill
summary: Recall Knowledge as a free action once per round

name: Automatic Writing
trait: Concentrate, Exploration, General, Manipulate, Skill, Uncommon
summary: When confronted with the unknown, you can receive knowledge beyond your own experience via written messages delivered by your hand.

name: Backup Disguise
summary: You have a specific disguise that you keep at the ready, worn underneath your outer garment.

name: Barbarian Dedication
summary: Become a multiclass barbarian.

name: Bard Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a bard and gain the Cast a Spell activity.

name: Bashing Charge
summary: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

name: Basic Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature.

name: Bastion Dedication
summary: You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat.

name: Battle Planner
summary: Make a battle plan and roll Warfare Lore for initiative.

name: Beastmaster Dedication
summary: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys your commands.

name: Blade Brake
summary: You plow your weapon into a floor, wall, or another sturdy surface, anchoring yourself in place.

name: Blasting Beams
summary: A directed beam of heat or an arc of lightning is one of the simplest ways to project energy.

name: Blessed One Dedication
summary: You are touched by a deity and gifted with the ability to alleviate the suffering of others.

name: Bonded Animal
summary: An animal becomes permanently easier to command

name: Bone Spikes
summary: Sharp shards of bone tear forth from your elbows, wrists, or other parts of your body.

name: Bounty Hunter Dedication
summary: When focused on finding your quarry, you're relentless.

name: Brawling Focus
summary: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand.

name: Bright Lion Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 79</row>
prerequisite: member of the Bright Lions; not a worshipper of Walkena; Trained in Stealth
summary: You are one of the Bright Lions, part revolutionary warrior, part undercover spy.

name: Brutal Beating
summary: Your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

name: Brutish Shove
summary: Using the momentum of your last attack to throw your weight into another, you make your opponent stumble back.

name: Bullet Dancer Dedication
prerequisite: expert in unarmored defense and trained in unarmed attack
summary: You've learned how to synchronize traditional martial arts and guns.

name: Call Implement
summary: You can tug on the bonds of ownership between yourself and your implement, causing it to find its way back to you.

name: Call of the Wild
summary: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

name: Cantrip Casting
summary: You increase your ability to cast simple spells.

name: Cantrip Expansion
trait: Bard, Cleric, Magus, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Cathartic Mage Dedication
prerequisite: Charisma 14 or ability to cast spells from spell slots
summary: You've learned to harness a particular emotion and mix it into your magic.

name: Cavalier Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Nature or Trained in Society
summary: You gain a young animal companion that serves as your mount.

name: Celebrity Dedication
summary: The more people you have looking at you, the more content you are.

name: Champion Dedication
summary: You become a multiclass champion.

name: Charmed Life
summary: When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top.

name: Chromotherapy
summary: You firmly believe in the technique of strengthening one's life force, spiritual energies, and bodily fluids through the application of colored light.

name: Chronoskimmer Dedication
summary: You became partially unstuck from time and have learned how to manipulate your place in flow of time.

name: Cleric Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a cleric.

name: Clever Gambit
summary: Your battle tactics are aided by assessing your foe’s capabilities and range.

name: Clockwork Reanimator Dedication
summary: You can animate corpses through cunning engineering.

name: Collapse Armor
summary: You've modified your armor innovation to collapse into a more compact form so you can don or remove it in an instant.

name: Collapse Construct
summary: You've modified your construct companion and built it out of light materials, enabling you to collapse it into a carrying case or other compact and innocuous form.

name: Combat Grab
summary: Using your prior attack to shift your opponent’s guard, you take another swing and grab them.

name: Communal Crafting
summary: Other PCs can help you Craft

name: Communal Healing
summary: You’re an exceptional conduit for vitality and, as you channel it through you, you can divert some to heal yourself or another creature.

name: Conceal Spell
summary: Through sheer mental effort, you can simplify the incantations and gestures needed to spellcast, leaving them barely noticeable.

name: Conceited Mindset
summary: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

name: Confabulator
summary: Reduce the bonuses against your repeated lies

name: Connections
summary: Leverage your connections for favors and meetings.

name: Consume Energy
summary: Your connection to energy is so much stronger than the offending display in front of you, allowing you to claim it for yourself.

name: Continual Recovery
summary: Treat Wounds on a patient more often

name: Cooperative Crafting
summary: You've learned to make the most of working with others on your crafting projects, a must when working with the various guilds of Highhelm.

name: Corpse Tender Dedication
summary: You have a connection to mindless undead that allows you to communicate your intentions to them on a rudimentary level.

name: Criminal Connections
summary: Leverage your underworld connections for favors from criminals.

name: Crushing Grab
summary: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp.

name: Curse Maelstrom Dedication
prerequisite: You are cursed or have previously been cursed.
summary: A horrible curse has left a lingering stain on your soul, and its effects continue to plague you even if the curse's other effects have ended.

name: Dancing Leaf
summary: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze.

name: Dandy Dedication
summary: You are a consummate student of dignity, etiquette, and fashion.

name: Defensive Armaments
summary: You use bulky firearms or crossbows to shield your body from your foes' attacks.

name: Demolition Charge
summary: You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

name: Demolitionist Dedication
summary: You know how to set explosives to cause the maximum possible damage to buildings and other structures.

name: Devoted Guardian
summary: You adopt a wide stance, ready to defend both yourself and your chosen ward.

name: Directed Audience
summary: You can shape the area of your composition spells.

name: Discreet Inquiry
prerequisite: Expert in Deception or Expert in Diplomacy
summary: Gather Information without revealing your motive.

name: Distracting Feint
summary: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal.

name: Distracting Performance
summary: Create a Diversion for an ally.

name: Divine Aegis
summary: You summon divine energy to shield yourself, offering protection against other traditions but leaving you exposed to other divine effects.

name: Divine Grace
summary: You call upon your deity’s grace.

name: Domain Acumen
summary: Every oracle's mystery touches on a divine domain of the deities that fuel it; you can access that power.

name: Dragging Strike
summary: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

name: Dragon Disciple Dedication
summary: You choose to study or worship one type of dragon, and your focus grants you a measure of its power.

name: Dragonslayer Oath
summary: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

name: Drow Shootist Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 77</row>
summary: Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy.

name: Druid Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a druid.

name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
summary: You're exceptional in your use of two weapons.

name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
summary: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

name: Duelist Dedication
prerequisite: trained in light armor and simple weapons
summary: You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances.

name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 79</row>
summary: You're a specially trained detective for the Edgewatch guard precinct in Absalom.

name: Eerie Flicker
summary: Your body flickers momentarily into the Ethereal Plane

name: Eldritch Researcher Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana; Trained in Occultism
summary: An eager student of occult lore, you enjoy reading rare or forgotten tomes with ancient rituals and hidden secrets.

name: Elemental Evolution
summary: The elemental power within you is more mutable and versatile than most.

name: Elemental Fist
summary: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.

name: Elementalist Dedication
summary: Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice: air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Elementalist Dedication
summary: Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice from your elemental philosophy.

name: Embed Aeon Stone
summary: You discover the secrets to embedding _aeon stones_ into your flesh.

name: Emblazon Armament
summary: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

name: Emotional Push
summary: You prepare to take advantage of your enemy’s sudden change in emotions.

name: Encouraging Words
trait: Auditory, General, Linguistic, Mental, Skill, Stamina
summary: You give an ally a quick pep talk, helping them recover.

name: Energy Ablation
summary: As you direct destructive energy at a foe, you can divert some of its power into a protective barrier that shields you from harm.

name: Enhanced Familiar
trait: Druid, Magus, Sorcerer, Thaumaturge, Witch, Wizard
summary: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Entreat with Forebears
prerequisite: a bloodline that corresponds with a creature trait
summary: Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

name: Esoteric Oath
summary: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

name: Esoteric Polymath
summary: You keep a book of occult spells, similar to a wizard’s spellbook, and can use its spells to supplement your spell repertoire.

name: Esoteric Warden
summary: When you apply antithetical material against a creature successfully, you also ward yourself against its next attacks.

name: Exhort the Faithful
prerequisite: Expert in Religion; follower of a specific religion
summary: +2 to Request something of or Coerce members of your own faith.

name: Expansive Spellstrike
summary: You've adapted a wider array of spells to work with your attacks.

name: Express Driver
summary: You can optimize your vehicle's performance, coaxing extra speed and choosing paths to avoid slowdowns.

name: Eye of the Arclords
summary: The Arclords of Nex have achieved a unique mastery of magic.

name: Eyes of the City
prerequisite: Trained in Diplomacy or Trained in Society
summary: You can track down targets with the help of locals.

name: Fake Out
summary: With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat.

name: Familiar Master Dedication
summary: You have forged a mystical bond with a creature.

name: Familiar Oddities
prerequisite: Curse Maelstrom Dedication; Trained in Occultism or Trained in Curse Lore
summary: Perhaps due to the curse within you, curses occasionally perceive you as an extension of themselves and readily reveal themselves to you.

name: Familiar's Language
summary: You’ve learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

name: Fane's Fourberie
summary: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

name: Favored Terrain
summary: You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges.

name: Fiendsbane Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

name: Fighter Dedication
summary: You become trained in martial weapons.

name: Finishing Follow-Through
summary: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger.

name: Firework Technician Dedication
summary: You've learned the secrets of making fire and sound bloom using black powder, metals, and paper.

name: First Frost
summary: The _gelid shard_ within your heart may sap your ability to feel and experience emotion, but it also lets you create and manipulate cold.

name: Fleeing Diversion
summary: You are quick to capitalize on your distractions.

name: Flexible Spellcaster Dedication
summary: You now have four cantrips per day instead of three.

name: Folklorist Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 78</row>
summary: You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative.

name: Force Fang
summary: You can turn your attack into an unerring blur of force.

name: Fresh Ingredients
summary: When using Natural Medicine to Treat Wounds, you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness.

name: Furious Finish
summary: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

name: Game Hunter Dedication
summary: You are skilled at tracking big game animals and similar creatures.

name: Geomancer Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Nature; ability to cast spells from spell slots; at least one spell with the air, cold, earth, fire, plant, or water trait
summary: You feel a deep connection to the world no matter where you are, a phenomenon known as “terrain attunement.” When you expend a spell slot to cast a spell with a trait that corresponds to the type of terrain you are currently in (as listed below), you gain the terrain attunement effect for that type of terrain.

name: Ghost Dedication
prerequisite: You died and returned as a ghost.
summary: You have risen as a shell of your former self, a spirit of mist and anguish.

name: Ghost Eater Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 79</row>
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
summary: You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits.

name: Ghost Hunter Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
summary: You have focused your training on hunting and defeating ghosts, spirits, and all manner of haunts.

name: Ghostly Grasp (Deviant)
summary: An invisible arm extends from you to grab and manipulate objects.

name: Ghoul Dedication
prerequisite: You were killed by ghoul fever.
summary: You have succumbed to ghoul fever, dying and returning as a ghoul, an undead cursed with a never-ending hunger for dead flesh that slowly overrides your reason and willpower until you would do anything for the meal you crave.

name: Glad-Hand
summary: Make an Impression on a target you’ve just met

name: Gladiator Dedication
summary: You know how to turn combat into a form of entertainment.

name: Godless Healing
prerequisite: Battle Medicine; can't have a patron deity
summary: With limited access to divine healing magic, Rahadoumi often become adept at using ordinary medicine for when dangerous situations arise.

name: Gunslinger Dedication
summary: You become trained in simple and martial crossbows and simple and martial firearms.

name: Half-Truths
prerequisite: Expert in Deception; Expert in Diplomacy
summary: You are able to weave your words in such a way that you never use actual lies, but still mislead people to certain conclusions.

name: Hallowed Necromancer Dedication
summary: You've studied techniques allowing you to blend so-called hallowed necromancy into your own spellcasting to bolster the living and destroy the undead.

name: Harrower Dedication
summary: You become trained in Occultism; if you are already trained in this skill, you become trained in a different skill of your choice instead.

name: Hellknight Armiger Dedication
prerequisite: member of a Hellknight Order; trained in heavy armor as well as your order's favored weapon
summary: You have taken the first step to being a full Hellknight.

name: Herbalist Dedication
summary: You can create remedies and other herbal products.

name: Horizon Walker Dedication
summary: You've mastered travel within a specific type of terrain.

name: Hunter's Aim
summary: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate.

name: Intimidating Prowess
summary: Gain a bonus to physically Demoralize a target

name: Intimidating Strike
summary: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

name: Inventor
summary: Use Crafting to create item formulas

name: Inventor Dedication
summary: You become trained in Crafting and inventor class DC.

name: Investigator Dedication
summary: You gain the on the case class feature, which grants you both the Pursue a Lead activity and Clue In reaction.

name: Juggle
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 76</row>
summary: You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses.

name: Juggler Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: You become trained in Performance and gain the Juggle skill feat

name: Kinetic Activation
summary: Rather than incantations and gestures, you can use your kinetic gate to directly unlock the potential of elementally empowered magic items.

name: Kineticist Dedication
summary: You become trained in kineticist class DC and impulse attack rolls.

name: Lasting Coercion
summary: Coerce a target into helping you longer

name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
prerequisite: member of the Knights of Lastwall; Shield Block
summary: Swear yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall.

name: Lead Climber
summary: Make Climbing safer for allies who Follow the Expert.

name: Lightning Swap
summary: You have practiced quickly switching between combat styles and the equipment needed for them.

name: Lightslayer Oath
summary: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

name: Linguist Dedication
prerequisite: you speak at least three languages
summary: You have studied languages and their development.

name: Lion Blade Dedication
prerequisite: member of the Lion Blades; Trained in Performance
summary: You are a Lion Blade, an elite spy in the service of Taldor.

name: Living Hair
summary: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

name: Living Monolith Dedication
prerequisite: Ancient Osiriani and Sphinx languages; Trained in Crafting
summary: Begin to process to become a living monolith.

name: Living Vessel Dedication
summary: Whether willingly or not, you've become a vessel for a being of unimaginable power.

name: Loremaster Dedication
prerequisite: trained in at least one skill to Decipher Writing
summary: You've compiled a vast repository of information that touches on nearly every subject.

name: Loremaster's Etude
summary: You magically unlock memories, making them easier to recall.

name: Lunge
summary: You attack an enemy at the edge of your reach.

name: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana or Trained in Nature; member of the Magaambya of attendant rank
summary: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

name: Magic Hide
summary: You can defend your companion in battle.

name: Magic Warrior Dedication
summary: You have taken up a nameless mask and sworn the oath of the magic warriors.

name: Magical Crafting
summary: Craft magic items

name: Magical Shorthand
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana, Expert in Nature, Expert in Occultism, or Expert in Religion
summary: Learn spells quickly and at a reduced cost

name: Magical Understudy
summary: Your eidolon evolves to cast spells.

name: Magus Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a magus, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice.

name: Malleable Movement
summary: You shift the shape of your weapon to help you Leap farther and faster.

name: Marshal Dedication
prerequisite: trained in martial weapons; Trained in Diplomacy or Trained in Intimidation
summary: You've combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader.

name: Martial Artist Dedication
summary: You have trained to use your fists as deadly weapons.

name: Mauler Dedication
summary: You specialize in weapons that require two hands.

name: Medic Dedication
summary: You become an expert in Medicine.

name: Mental Balm
summary: Your spells release soothing mental waves.

name: Mind Smith Dedication
summary: You've learned to imagine a shape in your mind, to envision it so strongly it takes form in the material world.

name: Minor Magic
summary: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

name: Mobility
summary: You move without leaving an opening.

name: Monk Dedication
summary: You become a multiclass monk.

name: Monster Warden
summary: You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey.

name: Mortal Healing
prerequisite: Godless Healing, you follow the Laws of Mortality
summary: You grant greater healing when the gods don’t interfere

name: Multifarious Muse
summary: Your muse doesn’t fall into a single label.

name: Mummy Dedication
prerequisite: you are dead and were mummified (by natural or ritualistic means)
summary: Whether through natural processes or foul rituals, your body was mummified, and you've risen as an undead mummy.

name: Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 79</row>
prerequisite: Trained in Performance; Trained in Society
summary: You've studied the basics of harmony and resonance in magic, exemplified by the ringing of chimes.

name: Nimble Crawl
summary: Crawl at a faster rate

name: No Escape
summary: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Nonlethal Spell
summary: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

name: Oatia Skysage Dedication
summary: Your study of the stars unlocks supernatural insights and magic.

name: Oozemorph Dedication
summary: You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies.

name: Oracle Dedication
summary: Choose an oracle mystery.

name: Order Explorer
summary: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order, passing whatever rites of initiation that order requires and gaining access to its secrets.

name: Overwatch Dedication
summary: You have an innate knack for tactical observation, and you've innovated to apply that knack in a variety of ways that allow you to assist your allies.

name: Pactbinder Dedication
prerequisite: trained in Diplomacy as well as either Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
summary: The first step toward forming a successful pact is an understanding of the magic behind it, along with skill at negotiation.

name: Pactbound Dedication
summary: You befriended one of the last saumen kar and were infused with a fraction of their power, granting you the potential to become a guardian of their ancient pact.

name: Panic the Dead
summary: Vitality strikes terror in the undead.

name: Pathfinder Agent Dedication
summary: You're a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society.

name: Pirate Dedication
summary: As a pirate, you sail the seas in search of enemy ships to plunder.

name: Pistol Phenom Dedication
prerequisite: trained in at least one type of one-handed firearm; Trained in Deception; Trained in Performance
summary: You catch an opponent off-guard by spinning your weapon.

name: Pistol Twirl
summary: Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks.

name: Poison Resistance
summary: Your affinity for the natural world grants you protection against some of its dangers.

name: Poisoner Dedication
summary: You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful.

name: Powder Punch Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You infuse your handwraps with black powder.

name: Powerful Leap
summary: Jump farther and higher

name: Predict Weather
summary: By observing often subtle indicators in the environment, you may try to predict the day's weather.

name: Psi Burst
trait: Concentrate, Evocation, Mindshift, Occult, Psyche, Psychic
summary: With a passing thought, you direct violent psychic energies at a nearby creature.

name: Psychic Dedication
summary: You feel something awaken within your mind.

name: Quick Contacts
prerequisite: Expert in Society; Connections or Criminal Connections
summary: Spend only 1 day to use Connections or Criminal Connections.

name: Quick Disguise
summary: Set up a disguise in less time

name: Quick Draw
summary: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Quiet Allies
summary: Roll a single Stealth check when sneaking with allies

name: Ranged Combatant
summary: Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance.

name: Ranger Dedication
summary: You become trained in Survival; if you were already trained in Survival, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice.

name: Rapid Mantel
summary: Pull yourself onto ledges quickly

name: Rapid Response
summary: You work quickly in emergencies.

name: Reanimator Dedication
prerequisite: able to cast _animate dead_ with a spell slot
summary: You have dedicated your studies to the art of raising and commanding undead.

name: Rebounding Toss
summary: You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another.

name: Red Herring
summary: You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry.

name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
prerequisite: trained in sawtooth sabers; worshipper of Achaekek; lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins
summary: Dedicate yourself to the assassins of Achaekek.

name: Reinforce Eidolon
summary: You buffer your eidolon.

name: Relentless Stalker
summary: Stay adjacent to your prey when they attempt to move away.

name: Reliable Squire
summary: You know the path to victory isn't traveled alone, and you lend aid to your companions whenever you can.

name: Resilient Mind
summary: You're firm in your convictions and have girded your mind against outside influence.

name: Reverse Engineer
summary: You are incredibly skilled at reverse engineering items to learn their formulas, or disassembling them just to disable them.

name: Revivifying Mutagen
summary: While under the effect of a mutagen, you can metabolize that mutagen’s power to heal yourself.

name: Risky Reload
summary: You've practiced a technique for rapidly reloading your firearm, but attempting to use this technique is a dangerous gamble with your firearm's functionality.

name: Robust Recovery
summary: Greater benefits from Treat Disease and Treat Poison

name: Rogue Dedication
summary: You gain a skill feat and the rogue’s surprise attack class feature.

name: Rolling Landing
summary: You land with quick rolls that help you keep your momentum.

name: Runelord Dedication
summary: Your rune magic increases, and you practice with your school's associated weapon.

name: Runescarred Dedication
summary: Overwhelming magic has branded your body with powerful runes.

name: Sap Life
summary: You draw the life force out of your enemies.

name: Scout Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Stealth; Trained in Survival
summary: You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger.

name: Scroll Trickster Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: You've studied scrolls in depth.

name: Scrounger Dedication
summary: You can Craft items even without appropriate tools or a workshop, though you take a –2 item penalty to your Crafting check.

name: Searing Restoration
summary: They told you there was no way that explosions could heal people, but they were fools… Fools who didn't understand your brilliance! You create a minor explosion from your innovation, altering the combustion to cauterize wounds using vaporized medicinal herbs.

name: Second Wind
summary: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

name: Sentinel Dedication
summary: You have trained carefully to maximize the protective qualities of your armor.

name: Shadow Mark
summary: Targets you’re following take a penalty to notice you.

name: Shadowcaster Dedication
summary: You've sacrificed a piece of your spirit, allowing the powers of shadow into your being and changing the nature of your magic.

name: Shake it Off
summary: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

name: Shared Stratagem
summary: The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself.

name: Shieldmarshal Dedication
summary: Your elite shieldmarshal training makes you equally at home in the squalor of Smokeside and the splendor of Skyside.

name: Shining Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

name: Shooting Stars Stance
summary: You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

name: Sleek Reposition
summary: While your opponent is still recovering from your prior attack, you snag its armor, clothing, or flesh to move it as you please.

name: Slippery Prey
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics or Trained in Athletics
summary: You're able to escape bonds more easily than others.

name: Smoke Bomb
summary: You cause the bomb to create a cloud of thick smoke, in addition to its normal effects.

name: Snare Hopping
summary: You can magically move your snares around.

name: Snarecrafter Dedication
summary: You've learned to create a limited number of snares at no cost.

name: Sniping Duo Dedication
prerequisite: trained in at least one type of weapon in the bow or firearm groups; Trained in Stealth
summary: You can choose one willing, non-minion ally to act as your spotter.

name: Solid Lead
summary: Sometimes your case splinters into smaller mysteries, but you never lose sight of the big picture.

name: Song of Strength
summary: Your performances inspire strength in your allies to aid them at physical tasks.

name: Sorcerer Dedication
summary: You become a multiclass sorcerer.

name: Soul Warden Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion; worships Pharasma or a psychopomp usher
summary: You can take 10 minutes to emblazon Pharasma's holy sigil—a spiraling comet that represents the winding path a soul takes through its existence—upon a shield, tabard, banner, or other prominent object that your wear or wield.

name: Soulforger Dedication
prerequisite: Wisdom 14 or ability to cast divine spells
summary: You can manifest the power of your spirit in combat to realize your motivations.

name: Sow Rumor
summary: You spread rumors, which may or may not be true, about a specific subject.

name: Spell Parry
summary: You infuse magical power into your body or armaments to parry both physical and magical assaults.

name: Spell Trickster Dedication
prerequisite: Able to cast spells; Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: Your experience with magic and its traditions lets you specialize in the casting of certain spells, customizing familiar spells to create novel effects.

name: Spellshot Dedication
summary: You've steeped yourself in magic and gunplay to the extent that you can conjure bullets from thin air.

name: Spirit Sheath
summary: You've magically constructed an extradimensional sheath for your weapon that you access through your clothing, typically through a pocket, sleeve, or seam.

name: Spirit Speaker
summary: You know that when an animal dies, its spirit lingers briefly before moving on.

name: Staff Acrobat Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
prerequisite: Dexterity 16; Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)
summary: Gain bonuses when using your staff as an implement to aid Acrobatics and Athletics actions.

name: Stalwart Defender Dedication
summary: You have completed your initial training in the ways of a stalwart defender.

name: Steed Form
summary: Your eidolon changes to make it particularly effective as your mount.

name: Sterling Dynamo Dedication
summary: You obtain a sterling dynamo prosthetic, which allows you to replace or augment a limb, or even add a simple new non-prehensile limb, such as a tail.

name: Stone Brawler Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: You've learned to call the primal power of elemental stone to your aid.

name: Stonebound Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: You bind yourself to the very essence of stone.

name: Strong Arm
summary: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon’s range increment increases by 10 feet.

name: Student of Perfection Dedication
prerequisite: powerful fist or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection
summary: You have joined one of the Houses of Perfection.

name: Stunning Fist
summary: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent.

name: Summoner Dedication
summary: You've formed a bond with an eidolon, an entity that manifests in a physical body only through its link to your life force.

name: Swashbuckler Dedication
summary: Choose a swashbuckler style.

name: Talisman Dabbler Dedication
summary: You are trained in the use of talismans and similar magical paraphernalia.

name: Talisman Esoterica
summary: You know how to assemble the supernatural objects in your esoterica into a number of temporary talismans.

name: Tattoo Artist
summary: You can craft tattoos, including magical tattoos.

name: Terrifying Resistance
summary: +1 to spell saves from a creature you’ve Demoralized.

name: Thaumaturge Dedication
summary: You've uncovered basic thaumaturgy.

name: Titan Swing
summary: Your limbs tense as you deliver a mighty swing.

name: Trick Driver Dedication
summary: You are equally at home piloting any vehicle, adapting yourself instantly to varied controls, movements, and handling.

name: Triumphant Boast
summary: You relate a loud and impressive tale of your triumph over a formidable foe.

name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
summary: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard.

name: Turn Away Misfortune
trait: Abjuration, Esoterica, Fortune, Manipulate, Occult, Thaumaturge
summary: You perform a superstition, such as casting salt over your shoulder to ward off bad luck.

name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication
summary: Your logging training has made you intimately familiar with all aspects of forestry.

name: Tweak Appearances
summary: You can alter a creature's clothing to improve their social impact.

name: Twilight Speaker Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 78</row>
summary: You have carefully studied the histories, customs, and etiquette of many of the younger peoples of Golarion.

name: Unbalancing Blow
summary: Interweaving attacks, you unbalance your foes.

name: Unbalancing Finisher
summary: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance.

name: Undead Master Dedication
summary: You gain the services of an undead companion that travels with you and obeys your commands.

name: Undead Slayer Dedication
summary: Your training has prepared you to recognize most undead on sight.

name: Underground Network
summary: Gather Information without drawing attention and gain a bonus to Recall Knowledge about that subject.

name: Underhanded Assault
summary: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

name: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication
summary: Who needs skill when you've got dumb luck?

name: United Assault
summary: Through countless battles, you've learned you're stronger when working alongside your allies.

name: Unmistakable Lore
summary: Recall Knowledge about your Lore more effectively

name: Unusual Treatment
summary: Treat Wounds tends to additional conditions

name: Uplifting Overture
summary: You learn the uplifting overture composition cantrip (page 372), which aids your allies’ skills with the inspiring nature of your performance.

name: Ursine Avenger Form
summary: You draw the _Ursine Avenger Hood_ over your head and its fur over your arms, assuming an ursine form that has traits of your original form as well as that of a bear.

name: Vampire Dedication
prerequisite: You were a killed by a vampire drinking your blood.
summary: You're a newly risen vampire.

name: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication
summary: You are adept at designing and maintaining mechanical vehicles, and you lavish your attention and ingenuity on one vehicle in particular.

name: Vengeful Oath
summary: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

name: Versatile Font
prerequisite: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
summary: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

name: Vigilante Dedication
summary: You have two identities, each with its own name, alignment, and abilities.

name: Viking Dedication
summary: Vikings spend long periods of time at sea, only to leap from their boats at a moment's notice, charge through the surf, and take their enemies by storm.

name: Voice of the Elements
summary: You can speak with the secret tones of elements you channel, finding words in the crackle of flame, the grinding of stone.

name: Ward Medic
summary: Treat several patients at once

name: Warning Shot
summary: Who needs words when the roar of a gun is so much more succinct?

name: Warp Space
summary: You use your magic to bend space, causing your spell to strike from a strange vector.

name: Warpriest’s Armor
summary: Your training has helped you adapt to ever-heavier armor.

name: Wary Disarmament
summary: +2 to AC or saves against devices or traps while disarming

name: Weapon Improviser Dedication
summary: You don't take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls with improvised weapons.

name: Wellspring Mage Dedication
summary: There's no longer a limit on how many temporary spell slots you can gain per day from wellspring magic.

name: Whats That up Your Sleeve?
summary: Whether as a dealer or player, you've learned to spot cheaters.

name: Wilderness Spotter
summary: Use Survival for your Initiative when in a specific terrain.

name: Witch Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a witch.

name: Wizard Dedication
summary: You cast spells like a wizard, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice.

name: Worm Caller Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 80</row>
summary: You pledge yourself to understanding and emulating one of the most powerful creatures of the Darklands: the mighty cave worm.

name: Wrestler Dedication
summary: Your training in the wrestling arts has made you particularly adept at moving, striking, and grappling while unencumbered.

name: Zephyr Guard Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 81</row>
summary: As a Zephyr Guard, you’re always vigilant against crime and threats to the city’s safety.

name: Zombie Dedication
prerequisite: You died and were animated as a husk zombie.
summary: Despite your death and subsequent reanimation as a rotting corpse, you retain most of your mind and identity.

name: Additional Circus Trick
source: <row gap="tiny">Come One, Come All, to the Extinction Curse Player’s Guide! pg. 0</row>
prerequisite: You must have a signature trick
summary: You gain an additional signature trick.

name: Ancestral Paragon
summary: Gain a 1st-level ancestry feat

name: Endure Anarchy
summary: Recover from Unrest more quickly and lessen its effects

name: Folk Dowsing
summary: You can find what you're looking for using a dowsing rod or pendulum.

name: Hireling Manager
summary: Hirelings gain +2 to skill checks.

name: Improvised Repair
summary: Quickly patch a broken item.

name: Inspiring Entertainment
summary: Use Culture on checks to determine Unrest

name: Keen Follower
summary: Improve bonuses when you Follow the Expert.

name: Know the Beat
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 81</row>
summary: You have been trained to investigate crimes.

name: Liquidate Resources
summary: Draw upon reserve funds to avoid Ruin

name: Pick up the Pace
summary: Your group can Hustle for up to 20 minutes longer.

name: Prescient Planner
summary: Procure a piece of adventuring gear

name: Quick Recovery
summary: +2 to checks to end ongoing harmful events

name: Skitter
summary: Crawl up to half your Speed.

name: Steel Your Resolve
summary: Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.

name: Thorough Search
summary: +2 to Perception when you spend twice as long Searching.

name: Untrained Improvisation
summary: Become more adept at using untrained skills

name: We're on the List
prerequisite: Alter Ego Dedication or Archaeologist Dedication; Trained in Society
summary: Emulating Shensen whenever she arrives at a show, you share your knowledge of the region and drop a few important local names to make a good impression and help your allies do the same.

name: Accelerating Touch
summary: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

name: Acclimatization
summary: Your time spent in the hostile parts of the world has inured you to extreme climates.

name: Additional Companion
summary: Another animal joins you in your travels.

name: Advanced Construct Companion
summary: You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability.

name: Advanced Reanimated Companion
summary: Your corpselike construct companion becomes much more powerful and can act with limited autonomy to follow your greater directives.

name: Advanced Warden
summary: You unlock more powerful primal spells.

name: Aeon Resonance
summary: You gain the resonant power of one embedded _aeon stone_ as if it were placed in a _wayfinder_.

name: Agile Hand
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _mage hand_
summary: When you cast _mage hand_, you can modify it to control a set of thieves' tools.

name: Air Shroud
summary: Turbulent air suffuses your kinetic aura.

name: Alchemical Discoveries
summary: You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy.

name: Alchemical Shot
summary: You've practiced a technique for mixing alchemical bombs with your loaded shot.

name: Aldori Parry
summary: Increase your AC while wielding an Aldori dueling sword.

name: Always Ready
summary: Extensive training against undead has taught you to cover your weak points, even when you think that you're alone.

name: Ambush Bladderwort
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Water, Wood
summary: You plant the seed of a giant bladderwort in an unoccupied square of ground or water within 30 feet.

name: Ambush Tactics
prerequisite: trained in Lore about a specific terrain
summary: You've made a study of the best practices for laying ambushes in terrains you've spent time learning about, be it the best way to ambush foes or the best methods of reacting to surprise attacks in those terrains.

name: Angel of Vindication
summary: To aid with your mission of destroying undead, you've specialized in techniques to destroy them, much as other assassins learn to kill the living.

name: Animal Feature
summary: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities.

name: Ankle Biter
summary: You fight just as well on the ground as you do standing up.

name: Anthropomorphic Shape
summary: Humanoids’ supposed place apart from animals is folly—taking on their forms just requires some extra practice.

name: Arcane Evolution
summary: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

name: Arcane School Spell
summary: You gain your school’s initial school spell.

name: Ardent Armiger
summary: You have been trained to resist the manipulations of fiends.

name: Astral Tether
summary: You spin out a thread of psychic energy that connects you to an ally, using it as a conduit for your abilities.

name: Attunement Shift
summary: The magic of your spell floods into you, overriding your connection to the land around you.

name: Aura of Courage
summary: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

name: Aura of Despair
summary: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

name: Awakened Power
summary: Your power spontaneously evolves or reconfigures itself.

name: Axe Climber
summary: You can climb wooden surfaces using axes.

name: Barbarian Resiliency
prerequisite: Barbarian Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 10 + your Constitution modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each barbarian archetype class feat you have.

name: Barreling Charge
summary: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

name: Barrier Shield
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _shield_
summary: When you cast _shield_, you can modify the spell to create a solid barrier you can use for cover, but not for blocking.

name: Base Kinesis
summary: You gain the Base Kinesis impulse.

name: Basic Arcana
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level wizard feat of your choice.

name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Blood Potency
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

name: Basic Bloodline Spell
summary: You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell.

name: Basic Breakthrough
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level inventor feat of your choice.

name: Basic Captivator Spellcasting
summary: Your innate ability to fascinate others develops into full-fledged spellcasting.

name: Basic Cathartic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Concoction
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level alchemist feat.

name: Basic Deduction
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level investigator feat of your choice.

name: Basic Devotion
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level champion feat.

name: Basic Dogma
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Flair
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level swashbuckler feat of your choice.

name: Basic Fury
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level barbarian feat.

name: Basic Hunter's Trick
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level ranger feat.

name: Basic Kata
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat.

name: Basic Maneuver
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level fighter feat.

name: Basic Martial Magic
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level magus feat of your choice.

name: Basic Muse's Whispers
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level bard feat.

name: Basic Mysteries
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level oracle feat of your choice.

name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Psychic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Red Mantis Magic
prerequisite: Trained in Religion; Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
summary: You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training.

name: Basic Shooting
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level gunslinger feat of your choice.

name: Basic Skysage Divination
summary: The stars move, granting you a sliver of their magic.

name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Basic Spellcasting
summary: You increase your ability to cast spells.

name: Basic Synergy
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level summoner feat of your choice.

name: Basic Thaumaturgy
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level thaumaturge feat of your choice.

name: Basic Thoughtform
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level psychic feat of your choice.

name: Basic Trickery
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level rogue feat.

name: Basic Wilding
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level druid feat.

name: Basic Witch Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Witchcraft
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level witch feat of your choice.

name: Basic Wizard Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Battle Assessment
summary: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

name: Beast Speaker
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
summary: You can speak with animals.

name: Bespell Strikes
summary: You siphon spell energy into one weapon you’re wielding, or into one of your unarmed attacks, such as a fist.

name: Big Game Trapper
summary: You can set snares specifically for big prey, leaving smaller creatures unscathed.

name: Black Powder Boost
summary: You fire your weapon as you jump, using the kickback to go farther.

name: Blazing Wave
summary: Flames flow out of you in a cascade, engulfing everyone in a 30-foot cone.

name: Bless Shield
summary: Your uttered prayers become an aegis, drawing the blessing of your deity across the surface of your shield.

name: Blessed Medicine
summary: Your experience battling undead has uniquely prepared you to fight the diseases they inflict on the survivors, and you know that leaving these maladies untreated for long will eventually lead to more undead.

name: Blessed Sacrifice
summary: You gain the _protector's sacrifice_ domain spell as a devotion spell.

name: Blessing of the Sun Gods
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 79</row>
summary: The Old Sun Gods share their power with you.

name: Bloodletting Claws
summary: Your eidolon inflicts bleeding wounds on a telling blow.

name: Breached Defenses
summary: You can find the one weak point in a creature's scales, wards, or armor to get past its resistances.

name: Brilliant Crafter
summary: Your skill at crafting is unparalleled.

name: Broadside Buckos
summary: Shimali Manux trains every Salt Breaker to fight in the cramped quarters below deck, and you've learned how to use these techniques with your crew.

name: Bullying Staff
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
summary: You can Shove and Trip larger creatures.

name: Butterfly Blade Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: You've trained in one of Goka's oldest traditions of espionage, intimidation, and combat mastery.

name: Calcifying Sand
trait: Earth, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: Your flesh gives way as you're struck, becoming coarse sand that can magically turn your enemy to stone.

name: Calculated Splash
summary: You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash.

name: Call Bonded Item
summary: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

name: Call Wizardly Tools
summary: You’re mystically connected to your wizardly tools, ensuring you can always find them when you’ve misplaced them.

name: Captivator Dedication
prerequisite: Charisma 14; Trained in Deception or Trained in Diplomacy
summary: Your ability to captivate others borders on the preternatural.

name: Careful Explorer
summary: You gain a sixth sense for traps, noticing them even when you're not trying to.

name: Cathartic Focus Spell
summary: You learn the focus spell listed under your emotion's entry.

name: Cavalier's Banner
summary: You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits.

name: Cavalier's Charge
summary: You Command an Animal to order your mount to Stride twice.

name: Champion Resiliency
prerequisite: Champion Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each champion archetype class feat you have.

name: Change of Face
summary: You know that for the best disguise to work, one requires not only the right skills but also the right look—luckily you can copy both using special magical techniques.

name: Channel Smite
summary: You siphon the energies of life and death through a melee attack and into your foe.

name: Chemical Purification
summary: You developed a method to chemically purify and consecrate your bombs on the fly.

name: Claws of the Dragon
summary: Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists.

name: Clinging Climber
summary: You climb like a spider.

name: Cobra Stance
summary: You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs.

name: Combat Reading
summary: You use a performer’s cold reading techniques, aura reading, and other tricks to discover your foe’s strengths and weaknesses.

name: Command Corpse
summary: You gain the Command Undead feat, but you can use it only to transform the effects of _harm_ spells you cast on mindless undead.

name: Command Elemental
summary: You grasp the animating force within an elemental creature and bend it to your will.

name: Command Undead
summary: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

name: Companion's Cry
summary: You can urge your companion to do its utmost.

name: Consolidated Overlay Panopticon
summary: You volunteered for a controversial experimental procedure to install clockwork prosthetic eyes.

name: Contortionist
summary: You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down.

name: Corpse Tender's Font
summary: You easily tend to the wounds of the dead.

name: Coughing Dragon Display
summary: This display emits a cascade of loud bangs or glittering trails.

name: Courageous Advance
summary: With a rousing call, you exhort an ally to advance.

name: Cruelty
summary: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

name: Cryptic Spell
summary: You hide your magic in the croak of a frog, in the sway of the trees, in the howl of the wind, and the flicker of the will-o'-wisp.

name: Crystal Keeper Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 74</row>
prerequisite: Trained in Elven Lore or Trained in Society
summary: You can use Arcana, Occultism, Religion, or Society to Decipher Writing by meditating before a crystal, regardless of the type of writing.

name: Crystal Ward Spells
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 74</row>
summary: Your study of crystals and the energies held within a gem’s facets grants you special arcane crystal ward spells.

name: Cycle Spell
summary: Your devotion to the cycle of souls grants you an additional divine spell.

name: Dead Reckoning
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Trained in Survival
summary: You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above.

name: Decry Thief
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 81</row>
prerequisite: Zephyr Guard Dedication; Trained in Intimidation
summary: When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects.

name: Defend Summoner
summary: Your eidolon blocks attacks against you.

name: Deflect Arrow
summary: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.

name: Deft Cooperation
summary: You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.

name: Detective's Readiness
summary: When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

name: Devastating Spellstrike
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study, Spellstrike
summary: Your Spellstrike sweeps are so wide and devastating, they splash onto nearby foes.

name: Devil's Eye
prerequisite: You made a bargain with a devil or won a legal case or other similar duel of wits against a devil.
summary: Your experience in the finer points of bargaining with a devil has awakened a sinister power that now inhabits your left eye.

name: Devrin's Cunning Stance
summary: You've learned Devrin Arlos's guileful ways, and his sly teachings help you remind your allies to keep their wits about them.

name: Devrin's Dazzling Diversion
summary: Devrin Arlos has a habit of using whatever is at hand to temporarily blind others in combat.

name: Diabolic Certitude
summary: Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell’s denizens deep into your mind.

name: Directed Channel
summary: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction.

name: Disarming Block
summary: You attempt to Disarm the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with.

name: Disengaging Twist
summary: Your ability to twist your opponents' bodies into painful locks and holds makes you particularly adept at escaping such predicaments.

name: Disrupt Prey
summary: Make a melee Strike against your prey.

name: Distracting Flattery
summary: You know how to maintain a good impression and manage your image, even while keeping uncouth company.

name: Distracting Spellstrike
summary: You weave distracting magic with one hand to enhance your Spellstrike.

name: Disturbing Defense
summary: Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are.

name: Divine Access
summary: Your ability to tap into divine magic surpasses the spells traditionally available to you (the divine spell list).

name: Divine Evolution
summary: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

name: Divine Health
summary: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

name: Divine Infusion
summary: You pour energy into the subject of your healing to empower its attacks.

name: Diving Armor
summary: You've modified your armor with fins, rotors, and other devices to make it easy for you to move through the water, plus mechanical gills that can help you extract breathable air from water.

name: Doctor's Visitation
summary: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it.

name: Double Shot
summary: You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession.

name: Dousing Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental water, soaking the target.

name: Dousing Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental water, soaking the target.

name: Draconic Scent
summary: Your sense of smell is uncanny, much like a dragon's.

name: Dragon Arcana
prerequisite: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Dragon Disciple Dedication
summary: You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

name: Dread Marshal Stance
summary: Putting on a grim face for the battle ahead, you encourage your allies to strike fear into their foes with vicious attacks.

name: Dread Striker
summary: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

name: Dual Energy Heart
summary: A second energy dwells in your eidolon.

name: Dual Thrower
summary: You know how to throw two weapons as easily as strike with them.

name: Dual-Form Weapon
summary: You've built your innovation with replaceable interlocking pieces that you can use to transform it into another type of weapon entirely.

name: Dual-Handed Assault
summary: You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

name: Dual-Weapon Reload
summary: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.

name: Duelist's Challenge
summary: Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge.

name: Duelist's Edge
summary: Increase your initiative with the dueling sword.

name: Echo of the Fallen
prerequisite: You helped to lay a haunt, ghost, or spirit to rest.
summary: With the utmost gratitude for your help in releasing them from their unearthly coil, a tiny sliver of a ghostly entity has remained attached to you.

name: Eclipsed Vitality
prerequisite: Assassin Dedication or Scout Dedication; Master in Stealth
summary: You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
summary: Thanks to the time you’ve spent studying and experimenting, you know how to scale your formulas into larger batches that don’t require any additional attention.

name: Efficient Explorer
prerequisite: trained in Lore about a specific terrain
summary: You are more efficient at exploring uncharted territories.

name: Elaborate Flourish
summary: You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

name: Elbow Breaker
summary: You bend your opponent's body or limbs into agonizing positions that make it difficult for them to maintain their grip.

name: Eldritch Nails
summary: Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

name: Elemental Existence
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: Your body becomes infused with elemental earth.

name: Elemental Familiar
summary: Your familiar becomes an elemental spirit capable of taking on aspects of the four elements: air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Elemental Familiar
summary: Your familiar becomes an elemental spirit capable of taking on aspects of the elements.

name: Elemental Summons
summary: You can call the elements to you.

name: Emergency Targe
summary: You immediately Raise a Shield or cast _shield_.

name: Empathetic Envoy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 78</row>
summary: You believe that treating others with respect is the fastest way into their hearts, and in turn others are more likely to believe in your good intentions and write off bad first impressions as flukes.

name: Enduring Alchemy
summary: You’ve learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions.

name: Engine Bay
prerequisite: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication; Expert in Crafting
summary: You are practiced at working in vast garages of vehicles and can work on many machines at a time.

name: Entity's Strike
summary: The more you try to force your body to stay yours, the more it warps to channel the energy flowing through you.

name: Environmental Explorer
summary: You've traversed enough untamed wilderness to gain an intuitive understanding of the dangers that exist in such places.

name: Everstand Strike
summary: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

name: Executioner Weapon Training
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 64</row>
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck.

name: Exorcist Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
summary: You've learned to attract, quell, and purify spirits, housing them in a special receptacle called a _spirit dwelling_ until they're ready to move on.

name: Expanded Domain Initiate
summary: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

name: Experienced Harrower
summary: When you perform the _harrowing_ ritual, the DC for the Primary Check is never more than the standard DC by level, and the cost for the ritual is halved.

name: Expert Backstabber
summary: When you Strike a flat-footed foe with a weapon that has the backstabber weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1.

name: Eye of Ozem
prerequisite: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; expert in Perception
summary: Learn how to better spot danger at a distance.

name: Fake It Till You Make it
summary: When you take on a role, you become more capable with all sorts of tasks involving that role.

name: Familiar Conduit
prerequisite: Familiar Master Dedication; able to cast spells
summary: Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic.

name: Familiar Foe
prerequisite: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; Expert in Religion or Expert in Undead Lore
summary: You regularly face off against undead and can identify many with a glance.

name: Familiar Mascot
summary: Your familiar is the heart and soul of your adventuring team.

name: Fancy Moves
summary: You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes.

name: Fane's Escape
summary: A good getaway requires a good distraction.

name: Far Shot
summary: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance, increasing your accuracy.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; trained in medium armor
summary: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Fast Movement
summary: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

name: Favored Prey
summary: You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily.

name: Feast
summary: You feast upon an adjacent restrained or unconscious creature, or a deceased creature that died in the past hour.

name: Fighter Resiliency
prerequisite: Fighter Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter archetype class feat you have.

name: Final Rest
summary: As stubborn in death as you are in life, you vow you'll never aid your hated enemies.

name: Finishing Precision
summary: You've learned how to land daring blows when you have panache.

name: Fire Resistance
summary: Your connection to heat and flame means that fire is reluctant to bring its full force to bear against you.

name: Firebrand Braggart Dedication
prerequisite: Charisma 14; second mark member of the Firebrands
summary: Your Firebrand training has taught you that achieving something is more satisfying if you boast about it first.

name: First Revelation
summary: You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell.

name: Flamboyant Athlete
summary: Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity.

name: Fleet Tempo
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 79</row>
summary: To rush after a criminal or reach someone in need, you ring a sprightly tone.

name: Flurry of Maneuvers
summary: You flurry is a combination of maneuvers.

name: Flying Kick
summary: You launch yourself at a foe.

name: Focused Juggler
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn.

name: Folktales Lore
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 78</row>
summary: You can pull bits of wisdom from any tale.

name: Forceful Push
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _mage hand_
summary: When you cast _mage hand_, you can modify it to shove a creature.

name: Forest Passage
summary: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

name: Form Control
summary: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate shape for a longer period of time.

name: Frightful Moan
trait: Archetype, Auditory, Divine, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental
summary: You lament your fate, realeasing a ghastly moan that frightens the living.

name: Gadget Specialist
summary: Rather than just using your gadgets for various boosts and tweaks, you also craft a few specific temporary consumable gadgets each day.

name: Gear Gnash
summary: Snares you create have complicated inner workings that are quite difficult to disable.

name: Ghost Blade
summary: You alter your weapon's phase so it can more easily strike incorporeal creatures.

name: Ghost Wrangler
summary: Spirits around you coalesce upon your fists, enabling you to seize and harm other ghosts and spirits.

name: Ghostly Resistance
summary: Your ghostly form becomes innately weaker but also gains resistance to many forms of damage.

name: Giant Hunter
summary: You have studied giants and hunt them with efficiency.

name: Gossip Lore
summary: Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic.

name: Grave's Voice
summary: You can influence spirits and haunts

name: Gravelands Herbalist
summary: Your time with the Knights of Lastwall has taught you the secrets of creating and improving upon Lastwall soup.

name: Greenwatch Initiate
summary: You've received the basic training developed for all Greenwatch recruits.

name: Guarded Movement
summary: Your guard is up, even while moving.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
summary: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.

name: Gunpowder Gauntlet
summary: Your flair keeps foes' attention, as your motions with your gun draw your foes into a deadly game.

name: Hallowed Initiate
summary: You've expanded your focus spellcasting to techniques used by clerics and wizards.

name: Harrow Casting
summary: You draw a card from your harrow deck just before you cast a spell to infuse your magic with its destined potential.

name: Harsh Judgment
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 64</row>
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: You loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment

name: Head Stomp
summary: Make an unarmed melee Strike against a prone target.

name: Heal Animal
summary: You can heal your animal companion's wounds.

name: Healing Bomb
summary: By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile.

name: Healing Touch
summary: You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your cause.

name: Hidden Magic
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana, Expert in Nature, Expert in Occultism, or Expert in Religion; Vigilante Dedication
summary: You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear.

name: Hideous Ululation
summary: Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo.

name: Hijack Undead
summary: Your clockwork devices can commandeer the bodies of undead, bending them to your will.

name: Homing Beacon
summary: As your spell strikes a target, you plant a beacon in the target's mind that announces its presence to those nearby.

name: Hunter's Luck
summary: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck.

name: Hunter's Sanctum
summary: You establish a safe house where you can prepare for your hunt.

name: Hurling Charge
summary: You make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then Interact to draw another weapon.

name: Hybrid Study Spell
summary: Gain the conflux spell from a hybrid study of your choice.

name: Ice Crafter
summary: The ancient ice-crafting techniques of the saumen kar awaken within you.

name: Igneogenesis
summary: You can create a permanent stone object, either sculpting stone pulled directly from your kinetic gate or manipulating earth and stone around you.

name: Impaling Finisher
summary: You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

name: Impressive Mount
summary: You've trained your mount to become a powerful force on the battlefield.

name: Improved Communal Healing
summary: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.
