name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
summary: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Improvised Pummel
summary: You make a Strike with your wielded improvised weapon.

name: In Plain Sight
summary: People often only see what they want to see, a weakness you know how to take full advantage of.

name: In Tune
summary: You attune your great skill in performing to another, granting them a small measure of your skill as though anyone could do it.

name: Initial Eidolon Ability
summary: Your link to your eidolon becomes stronger, granting it a new ability.

name: Inspiring Marshal Stance
summary: You become a brilliant example of dedication and poise in battle, encouraging your allies to follow suit.

name: Inspiring Resilience
summary: You show defiance in times of hardship and inspire your companions to persevere.

name: Instant Backup
summary: Even as your firearm misfires, you quickly draw a backup weapon.

name: Instructive Strike
summary: You attack your foe and analyze how it reacts.

name: Inured to Alchemy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You've developed control over how your body processes alchemical poisons and drugs.

name: Investigate Haunting
summary: You are skilled at noticing the telltale signs of ghosts and hauntings.

name: Investigator's Stratagem
summary: You play out battles in your head, allowing you to strike when the time is right.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 185</row>
trait: Bard, Champion, Cleric, Druid, Magus, Monk, Oracle, Psychic, Ranger, Sorcerer, Summoner, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication
prerequisite: Student of Perfection Dedication, or you've trained with a champion of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven
summary: Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists.

name: Just the Tool
summary: You temporarily change your weapon's shape to assist you in the field.

name: Ka Stone Ritual
prerequisite: Living Monolith Dedication; a sphinx or living monolith with this feat performs a ritual with you
summary: You enchant your _ka stone_ and can use it to wield magic.

name: Knock Sense
summary: You attack carefully to knock some sense into a creature whose actions aren't their own.

name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
summary: Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources.

name: Lava Leap
trait: Composite, Earth, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: You wreath yourself in molten stone and hurtle toward your enemy.

name: Leading Dance
summary: You sweep your foe into your dance.

name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
summary: The leaf order’s secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

name: Lie Detector
summary: You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

name: Lifelink Surge
summary: You learn the _lifelink surge_ link spell.

name: Light of Revelation
summary: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

name: Lightning Dash
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Move, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: For an instant, you transform yourself into a being of pure lightning and fly forward, shocking anyone in your way.

name: Lingering Chill
prerequisite: You've been brought to 0 Hit Points by an enemy that has the cold trait or an enemy's ability that has the cold trait.
summary: The chill of ice entered your veins and never left, adjusting the internal temperature of your body.

name: Linked Focus
summary: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

name: Lion's Might
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 79</row>
summary: You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions.

name: Living Bonfire
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Wood
summary: Roots and branches of living wood writhe in elemental fire at your command, forming a bonfire fearsome enough to scare off predators in the night.

name: Log Roll
summary: You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady.

name: Loose Cannon
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 78</row>
summary: Your unpredictable gunfire often catches enemies off guard or hits unprotected areas.

name: Lost in the Crowd
summary: You’ve learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them.

name: Lucky Escape
summary: Force your foe to reroll the triggering attack

name: Magic Warrior Aspect
summary: You can alter your form to gain an aspect of the animal your mask represents.

name: Magic Warrior Transformation
summary: You can transform fully into the animal your mask represents.

name: Magical Edification
summary: You've learned those tidbits of magic that are most conducive to furthering your acquisition and transmission of knowledge.

name: Magical Scholastics
summary: While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past.

name: Magical Trickster
summary: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

name: Magnetic Field
summary: A magnetic field surrounds you.

name: Mammoth Lord Dedication
summary: You've undertaken the ultimate challenge of the Mammoth Lords and tamed a megafauna.

name: Manipulative Charm
prerequisite: Vampire Dedication; Trained in Deception or Trained in Diplomacy
summary:
Against humanoids, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to Lie, and to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information and Make an Impression.

 Once per day, you can cast _charm_ as a divine innate spell using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

name: Mask Familiar
summary: Your mask takes on a personality of its own, allowing it to serve as your familiar.

name: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
summary: You have mastered the opening steps to the Masquerade of Seasons, a dance that channels the power of spring, summer, winter, and autumn.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion has grown up over the course of your adventures, becoming a mature animal companion and gaining additional capabilities (page 211).

name: Mature Beastmaster Companion
summary: All of your animal companions grow up, becoming mature animal companions and gaining additional capabilities.

name: Megaton Strike
summary: You activate gears, explosives, and other hidden mechanisms in your innovation to make a powerful attack.

name: Melodious Spell
summary: You subtly weave your spellcasting into a performance.

name: Mental Forge
summary: Your experiences in combat shape your mind's capability to strengthen and shape your weapon to match the way you move in combat.

name: Mercy
summary: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

name: Minion Guise
prerequisite: animal companion or familiar; Expert in Deception; Vigilante Dedication
summary: When you are in your social identity, you can also grant a social identity to an animal companion, familiar, or other minion.

name: Modular Dynamo
summary: Your dynamo has modular configurations, allowing you to swap between various different possibilities with ease in order to adapt to various situations in combat.

name: Monk Resiliency
prerequisite: Monk Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have.

name: Mortification
summary: Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment.

name: Mountain Skin
summary: You become trained in medium and heavy armor.

name: Mug
summary: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

name: Multilingual Cipher
summary: You use multiple languages to create and break codes.

name: Named Artillery
summary: It is a tradition among artillerists to name the siege weapon most important to them and closest to their heart—much as a sailor on a ship, the weapon is their livelihood.

name: Natural Swimmer
summary: Water flows around you, letting you cut through the waves as if born to it.

name: Necromantic Resistance
summary: Gain resistance to necromancy effects and damage.

name: Necromantic Resistance
summary: As part of your training, you've inured yourself against necromancy through grueling, repeated exposure.

name: Necrotic Infusion
summary: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

name: Never Tire
summary: As long as you have an audience, you can continue to perform.

name: Nocturnal Kindred
summary: You have an innate connection with other creatures of the night and understand some of them.

name: Nonlethal Takedown
summary: You prefer to use nonlethal means against living opponents, but the weapons you carry are lethal enough to destroy undead.

name: Observant Explorer
summary: You've gained an intuitive sense about creatures.

name: Occult Evolution
summary: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

name: One with the Land
summary: Your connection to your bound terrain strengthens, making you unhindered by local weather.

name: Ongoing Investigation
summary: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities.

name: Order Magic
summary: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

name: Order Spell
summary: You gain the initial order spell from your order.

name: Orthographic Mastery
summary: You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text.

name: Ostentatious Reload
summary: Every good Firebrand knows that style can be as important as substance—so long as you don't screw up the delivery.

name: Oversized Throw
summary: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

name: Pact of Fey Glamour
summary: You've sworn a pact with fey powers, granting you the otherworldly appearance of your dreams in exchange for oaths of hospitality.

name: Paired Link
summary: You break a trinket such as a lodestone or jade pendant in two, creating a sympathetic link between the halves that bridges distance.

name: Paired Shots
summary: Your shots hit simultaneously.

name: Parting Shot
summary: You jump back and make a quick shot that catches your opponent by surprise.

name: Patch Job
summary: You can patch up damage to an object with a quick fix.

name: Peafowl Stance
summary: You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

name: Perfect Strike
summary: You call upon insight from your training to recover accuracy.

name: Perfect Weaponry
summary: You gain the Monastic Weaponry monk class feat.

name: Phonetic Training
summary: You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don't understand their meaning.

name: Pirate Weapon Training
summary: You're particularly skilled at wielding traditional pirate weapons.

name: Plate in Treasure
summary: Precious metal flows from your fingers to plate an object.

name: Play to the Crowd
summary: You show off for the crowd.

name: Poison Weapon
summary: You apply a contact poison or injury poison to the required weapon; if you have a free hand, you can Interact to draw a poison as part of this action.

name: Poisoner's Twist
summary: Poisons attack specific parts of the body.

name: Posse
summary: By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you.

name: Poultice Preparation
summary: When you create an herbal elixir, you can prepare it as a poultice instead.

name: Power Slide
summary: You throw the vehicle into a barely controlled skid, turning sharply to evade pursuit or bring your weapons to bear.

name: Powerful Shove
summary: You can push larger foes around with your attack.

name: Prayer-Touched Weapon
prerequisite: divine spells, you follow a good-aligned deity
summary: You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity.

name: Predictable!
summary: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

name: Primal Evolution
summary: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

name: Psi Strikes
summary: You siphon residual psychic energies from your spell into one weapon you're wielding or one of your unarmed attacks and when you unleash your mind, the energies flare to match.

name: Psychic Duelist Dedication
summary: Through experience and in-depth visualizations of mental battles, you've grown adept at psychic duels.

name: Psychopomp Familiar
summary: Your familiar becomes a masked psychopomp—an extraplanar guardian of the cycle of souls.

name: Push Back the Dead!
summary: You call to your ally and strengthen their resolve and abilities to defend against the horrific tricks undead bring to bear.

name: Quick Alchemy
summary: You gain the Quick Alchemy action.

name: Quick Fix
summary: You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string.

name: Quick Juggler
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: When you start to Juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one.

name: Quick Mount
summary: You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice.

name: Quick Reversal
summary: You turn your foes’ flanking against them with a quick reverse.

name: Quick Shot
summary: You draw your bow and attack with the same action.

name: Quick Study
summary: During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice.

name: Radiant Infusion
summary: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

name: Raging Athlete
summary: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

name: Rain of Rust
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal, Water
summary: You conjure a red raincloud in a 10-foot burst within 60 feet, which pours rust-colored rain directly below it.

name: Raise Symbol
summary: You present your religious symbol emphatically.

name: Rallying Anthem
summary: You learn the rallying anthem composition cantrip (page 371), which protects you and allies.

name: Ranger Resiliency
prerequisite: Ranger Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
summary: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each ranger archetype class feat you have.

name: Ravel of Thorns
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: Thorny vines grow in geometric patterns on surfaces in your kinetic aura.

name: Ravenous Charge
summary: Hungry for the flesh of the living, you hurl yourself into the fray, teeth gnashing.

name: Reach Beyond
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 79</row>
summary: You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't.

name: Reactive Dismissal
summary: You abruptly dismiss your eidolon to reduce the damage it takes, though this makes summoning it again more difficult.

name: Reactive Pursuit
summary: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Reactive Striker
summary: You gain the Reactive Strike reaction.

name: Rebel's Map
prerequisite: Horizon Walker Dedication or Scout Dedication
summary: Rebellions require an intricate knowledge of one's surroundings—because you might need to escape at any moment.

name: Reflexive Catch
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: Grab an item thrown at you.

name: Remember Your Training
summary: You were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter.

name: Repeating Hand Crossbow Training
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 77</row>
summary: You become trained in the repeating hand crossbow and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and shootist bandoliers.

name: Replenishing Consumption
summary: When you devour corpses and satiate your hunger, you also recover from some of your wounds, your necrotized blue flesh knitting back together almost immediately as soon as you begin shoveling the chunks of dead flesh down your throat.

name: Rescuer's Press
summary: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait.

name: Restorative Strike
summary: You balance both sides of the scales, restoring yourself while striking a foe.

name: Restore Omen
summary: You spend 10 minutes meditating with your harrow deck, then draw a card.

name: Return to the Sea
summary: You adapt a creature to living and moving in water.

name: Reverse Engineering
summary: You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most.

name: Rites of Convocation
summary: Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

name: Ritual Researcher
summary: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

name: Ritualist Dedication
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana, Expert in Nature, Expert in Occultism, or Expert in Religion
summary: You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals.

name: Rope Runner
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; Pirate Dedication
summary: You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground.

name: Running Reload
summary: You can reload your weapon on the move.

name: Sabotage
summary: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

name: Sacral Lord
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
summary: By right of ritual or sheer stubbornness, you have claimed rulership of the land.

name: Sacred Ground
summary: You pray continuously for 1 minute to call a subtle shadow of your deity’s realm over a 30-foot burst centered on you.

name: Sacred Ki
prerequisite: Ki Strike; you follow a deity
summary: The power of your faith suffuses your ki

name: Sacred Spells
summary: Add _chill touch_, _death ward_, _disrupt undead_, _disrupting weapons_, _holy cascade_, _magic stone_, and _sunburst_ to your spell list.

name: Safe Elements
summary: Elements are wild and dangerous, but you've found ways to reduce their risk.

name: Safe House
summary: You establish a safe house—a secure space in which to hide your secrets from the outside world.

name: Safety Measures
summary: You're often careful to be sure you're not hoisted on your own petard, or anyone else's, for that matter.

name: Scales of the Dragon
summary: Scales grow across your body, protecting you against physical and magical threats.

name: Scalpel's Point
summary: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy.

name: Scion of Domora Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 82</row>
summary: You gain a spirit guide ally.

name: Scoundrel's Surprise
summary: You drop your disguise at the right moment and surprise your target.

name: Scout's Charge
summary: You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

name: Scout's Warning
summary: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

name: Seeker of Truths
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear.

name: Semblance of Life
summary: You draw the moisture you've drained from others into your own flesh, temporarily taking on the appearance of life.

name: Sense Alignment
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 79</row>
summary: You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos.

name: Senses of the Bear
summary: While in ursine form, you gain low-light vision and scent (imprecise) 30 feet.

name: Settlement Scholastics
summary: Your studies open up new horizons.

name: Shadow Spells
summary: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition.

name: Shared Attunement
summary: When you would gain a benefit from your terrain attunement, you can grant it to one ally within 30 feet instead of yourself.

name: Sheltering Cave
summary: You spend 10 minutes communing with spirits of earth and stone, requesting shelter.

name: Shielded Stride
summary: When your shield is up, your enemies’ blows can’t touch you.

name: Shining Arms
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _light_
summary: When you cast _light_, you can modify its target to be 1 melee weapon.

name: Shorthanded
summary: You can operate a siege weapon with fewer than the minimum number of crew, at an increasing penalty.

name: Shrink Down
summary: Your eidolon can shrink to fit into small spaces.

name: Silent Spell
summary: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

name: Skilled Partner
summary: Your eidolon gains a 1st-level skill feat and a 2nd-level or lower skill feat.

name: Slam Down
summary: You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

name: Slayer's Strike
summary: You've dedicated yourself to studying ancient techniques and memorized minor prayers against undead to swiftly dispatch them.

name: Sleepwalker Dedication
summary: You've learned to manipulate states of consciousness, beginning with your own.

name: Snap Out of It! (Marshal)
summary: You give a quick shout, hoping to shake the fog clouding your ally's thoughts.

name: Snare Specialist
summary: You specialize in creating quick traps to obstruct your enemies on the battlefield.

name: Sneak Attacker
summary: You gain the sneak attack class feature, except it deals 1d4 damage, increasing to 1d6 at 6th level.

name: Snowcaster
summary: Your magical power grows as the shard's icy influence spreads ever deeper into your being.

name: Snowdrift Spell
summary: The howling wind and precipitation of your magic turn to thick snow.

name: Sociable Vow
summary: You can leverage your vow in more social interactions.

name: Social Purview
summary: You have built a reputation for yourself in your social identity.

name: Soothing Mist
summary: You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding.

name: Soul Flare
summary: You strive to change the outcome with sheer zeal.

name: Spell Protection Array
summary: You inscribe a circle of arcane runes that dampen enemies’ magic.

name: Spell Runes
summary: The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities.

name: Spellstriker
summary: You gain the magus's Spellstrike activity.

name: Spirit Spells
summary: Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting.

name: Spiritual Explorer
summary: You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer.

name: Spiritual Guides
summary: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

name: Split Shot
summary: You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots.

name: Spot Translate
summary: You interpret a creature's words, repeating their message in a different language that you know.

name: Spyglass Modification
summary: Your enhanced visual gear includes a regulating scope and reflectors, combined in an ingenuous setup that allows you to see around corners within the area of your overwatch field.

name: Stage Fighting
summary: You pull punches to give a better show.

name: Stand Still
summary: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.

name: Stargazer's Eyes
summary: Long hours in darkened observatories have sharpened your senses.

name: Starlit Eyes
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, starlit span hybrid study
summary: Starlight shines in your sight, enhancing your perception and range.

name: Steady Spellcasting (Magus)
summary: Confident in your technique, you don't easily lose your concentration when you Cast a Spell.

name: Steel Skin
summary: You wear your armor like a second skin.

name: Steel Yourself!
summary: You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance.

name: Stone Guardian
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: You learn to call a powerful guardian of earth and stone to your side.

name: Stoney Skin
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: Your skin takes on the hardness of stone.

name: Strange Script
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: You have such familiarity with obscure texts that you can compel them to reveal their secrets.

name: Strategic Assessment
summary: You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move.

name: Strategic Repose
summary: You've trained extensively in fighting the undead.

name: Striker's Scroll
summary: You can attach a scroll to your weapon or _handwraps of mighty blows_ to blend its spell into an attack, carefully folding it around a part of the weapon or sealing it to the weapon's surface.

name: Student of the Staff
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, twisting tree hybrid study
summary: You've studied the staff extensively to learn the hidden capabilities of your chosen weapon.

name: Summon Ensemble
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _summon instrument_
summary: When you cast _summon instrument_, you can modify it to summon multiple instruments.

name: Sun Blade
summary: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

name: Supernatural Senses
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
summary: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

name: Suplex
summary: Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground.

name: Sure Foot
prerequisite: Horizon Walker Dedication; Expert in Acrobatics; Expert in Athletics
summary: You know the secrets of moving in your favored terrain.

name: Surprise Attack
summary: You act before foes can react.

name: Surprise Snare
summary: You install one of your snares prepared for quick deployment in a space that's occupied by an opponent.

name: Swaggering Initiative
summary: You swagger readily into any fight—even an ambush.

name: Swift Leap
summary: Your undead physiology allows you to leap quickly toward or away from your opponent.

name: Swipe
summary: You make a wide, arcing swing.

name: Sympathetic Strike
summary: You collect your patron’s magic into one of your witch armaments, causing them to shine with runes, light, or another signifier of your patron.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74</row>
summary: You can expertly control your living hair and use it to perform various tasks.

name: Take the Wheel
prerequisite: Trick Driver Dedication; Expert in Driving Lore
summary: Diving into a moving vehicle and seizing the controls is nothing new for you.

name: Tandem Movement
summary: You and your eidolon move together.

name: Tenacious Toxins
summary: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.

name: Terrain Scout
summary: You gain the Terrain Stalker skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time.

name: That's Not Natural!
summary: Your mastery at surviving in the wild has given you a sort of sixth-sense when it comes to noticing creatures that aren't part of the natural order.

name: Thaumaturgic Ritualist
summary: Your studies into the supernatural have resulted in an especially strong knowledge of rituals.

name: The Harder They Fall (Rogue)
summary: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

name: Thermal Nimbus
summary: You direct waves of warmth into or out of your kinetic gate to drastically shift the temperature around you.

name: Thorough Reports
summary: Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.

name: Thoughtform Summoning
summary: You can create a prototypical creature from the depths of your imagination instead of calling one from elsewhere.

name: Through the Gate
summary: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level kineticist feat of your choice.

name: Tools of the Trade
summary: You're well-versed in weapons that allow you to bring bounties in alive.

name: Tracing Sigil
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _sigil_
summary: When you cast _sigil_, you can modify the spell to allow you to track the target.

name: Trapsmith Dedication
summary: You use glimmering gears and gnashing mechanisms to manufacture snares using specialized parts.

name: Treat Condition
summary: You treat an adjacent creature in an attempt to reduce the clumsy, enfeebled, or sickened condition.

name: Triangulate
summary: Your spotter's quick signals help you make even difficult shots seem simple.

name: Triple Time
summary: You learn the triple time composition cantrip (page 372), which speeds up you and your allies for a round.

name: Tumbling Lumber
summary: A slew of logs eject from the Plane of Wood and slam into your enemies.

name: Tunnel Wall
summary: Using your shield, you guard against the movement of foes as surely as if you were a wall of stone.

name: Turn Back the Clock
summary: After failing a test of skill, you hop back in your personal timeline so you can try again.

name: Tut-Tut
trait: Archetype, Emotion, Fear, Mental, Press, Uncommon
summary: The Sapphire Butterfly is not one for violence when simply intimidating a foe will do.

name: Twin Distraction
summary: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

name: Twin Parry
summary: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

name: Undying Conviction
trait: Aura, Cleric, Necromancy, Oracle, Uncommon, Wizard
prerequisite: able to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Your presence has a bolstering effect on your undead minions.

name: Unnerving Expansion
summary: You gather your curse around you and impel it to pour outward, expanding your maelstrom.

name: Versatile Signature
summary: You learn the triple time composition cantrip (page 372), which speeds up you and your allies for a round.

name: Vibration Sense
summary: Your eidolon gains tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
summary: From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle.

name: Violent Unleash
summary: The force of your mind unleashing itself wracks your enemies with a violent shockwave.

name: Vision of Weakness
summary: You can call upon divine insights to single out your foes' weak points.

name: Voice of Authority
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 64</row>
prerequisite: Expert in Intimidation; Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: You easily command the attention of others, and when the time comes to turn threats into action, your authoritative voice causes foes to falter.

name: Warding Light
summary: You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

name: Watch and Learn
summary: Pathfinder agents serve as members of diverse teams with complementary skill sets.

name: Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
summary: Access a new cantrip by using your Wayfinder.

name: Wellspring Control
summary: When you generate a wellspring surge, roll twice on the Wellspring Surges Table and take the result of your choice.

name: Whirling Grindstone
trait: Attack, Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: A whirling grindstone made of flint appears in an unoccupied square within 30 feet.

name: Wholeness of Body
summary: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki.

name: Wild Lights
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _dancing lights_
summary: When you cast _dancing lights_, you can modify it to create a single floating light in the shape of a Tiny creature.

name: Winter Sleet
trait: Cold, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance, Water
summary: Bone-chilling, swirling sleet surrounds you, cruel as deepest winter.

name: Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
summary: With a bit of hide, some antlers, and some cast-off fur, you can create a disguise that will fool even an experienced hunter.

name: Worm Sense
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 80</row>
summary: You emulate the senses of the cave worm.

name: Wormskin
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 80</row>
summary: Your flesh grows thick and bloated, protecting you against harm.

name: Wounded Rage
summary: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

name: You're an Embarrassment!
summary: Some Firebrands can't stand it when their allies are ruining their moment, and you're no different.

name: Adaptive Adept
summary: You’ve continued adapting your magic to blend your class’s tradition with your adapted tradition.

name: Advanced Targeting System
summary: Your ocular processors are augmented with advanced targeting systems, which allow you to more easily pinpoint your enemy and read their movements.

name: Ageless Patience
summary: You work at a pace born from longevity that enhances your thoroughness.

name: Agonizing Rebuke
summary: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress.

name: Ally's Shelter
summary: In stressful circumstances, you find strength in your allies' example.

name: Ambush Awareness
summary: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks attempted as initiative rolls.

name: Amorphous Aspect
summary: Your body is supremely flexible.

name: Ancestral Suspicion
summary: Long-lived elves have seen civilizations rise and fall, often at the hands of outside forces. As a result, they have developed a wariness of others who might seek to influence or control them.

name: Anchoring Roots
summary: Small roots sprout from your feet, steadying you as you move.

name: Animal Speaker
prerequisite: ability to communicate with some type of animals (such as bats or arthropods)
summary: You can speak to all animals, not just a particular subset.

name: Animalistic Resistance
summary: Your animalistic connections help you resist natural afflictions.

name: Ankle Bite
prerequisite: Fang Sharpener or Razortooth Goblin heritage
summary: Whenever someone grabs onto you, you instinctively bite down hard.

name: Aquatic Conversationalist
summary: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals with the amphibious or aquatic traits.

name: Arcane Safeguards
summary: The magic powering you makes it difficult for outside magic to affect you.

name: Athletic Might
summary: Surviving in hostile terrain has given you a great talent for mobility.

name: Azarketi Weapon Aptitude
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: You become familiar with using your weapons both in and out of water.

name: Blast Resistance
summary: You're used to the clamor of steel, the crack of a firearm, and the thunderous blast of explosions.

name: Blessed Blood
summary: Your spilled blood is sanctified, with effects similar to those of holy water.

name: Bloody Blows
summary: Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding.

name: Boulder Roll
summary: Your dwarven build allows you to push foes around, just like a mighty boulder tumbles through a subterranean cavern.

name: Bristle
summary: You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines.

name: Called
summary: You’ve heard the Call, and by resisting it, you’ve developed a bulwark against effects that target your mind.

name: Catchy Tune
summary: You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along.

name: Catfolk Weapon Rake
summary: You know how to efficiently use weapons that rake across your enemies.

name: Celestial Resistance
summary: Your growing connection to your celestial forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

name: Ceremony of Knowledge
summary: You tap into aeon knowledge.

name: Ceremony of Sunlight
summary: You have learned how to master the power contained within sunlight, just like the trees that form your body.

name: Chosen of Lamashtu
summary: You bear the favor and blessings of Lamashtu, the Mother of Monsters.

name: Clan Protector
summary: Your clan dagger can protect your allies as easily as yourself.

name: Clever Improviser
summary: You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth.

name: Clever Shadow
summary: You can perform simple Interact actions with your shadow, such as opening an unlocked door.

name: Climate Adaptation
summary: Like evergreen trees, which stay healthy and vibrant from winter through summer, you too can adapt to a variety of extreme climates.

name: Climbing Claws
summary: You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing.

name: Cloud Gazer
summary: Your connection to air allows you to see through obscuring mists.

name: Conductor's Redirection
summary: You conduct electrical damage through your body.

name: Conrasu Weapon Understanding
summary: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself.

name: Cornered Fury
summary: When physically outmatched, you fight with unexpected ferocity.

name: Crystalline Dust
summary: You've learned to disperse the crystalline motes coating your body as a haze.

name: Cultural Adaptability
summary: During your adventures, you've honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you.

name: Cunning Hair
summary: Your hair moves under your control.

name: Cunning Tinker
summary: Time spent tending to your own form has unlocked your ability to fix other things.

name: Cutting Flattery
prerequisite: Dandy Dedication or Pirate Dedication; Trained in Intimidation
summary: Repeated entries in Firebrand bragging and flyting contests have taught you how to twist pretty words into concealed insults.

name: Darkseer
summary: Zon-Kuthon smiles upon you—even if you curse his name—granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness.

name: Darting Monkey
summary: You have a heightened awareness in combat, and your darting strikes prevent your foes from distracting you or breaking your focus.

name: Debilitating Venom
summary: Your venom is particularly potent, affecting targets in different ways.

name: Defensive Needles
prerequisite: Cactus Leshy heritage or Pine Leshy heritage
summary: Your body is covered in sharp needles or spines which you can use to defend yourself.

name: Defiance Unto Death
summary: You loathe the alghollthus and their mind magic, and you’ve been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation.

name: Defy Death
summary: You’re exceptionally difficult to kill.

name: Defy the Darkness
summary: Using ancient dwarven methods developed to fight enemies wielding magical darkness, you've honed your darkvision and sworn not to use such magic yourself.

name: Demonblood Frenzy
summary: Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury.

name: Devil in Plain Sight
summary: You've learned to draw your fiendish nature into a small ball of corruption and hide it in your soul.

name: Devilish Wiles
summary: Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea.

name: Distant Cackle
summary: It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell.

name: Dogfang Bite
summary: You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do.

name: Drag Down
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: While swimming in water at least 10 feet deep, you grab an adjacent creature (on nearby land or in the water) and pull it below the surface.

name: Dwarven Reinforcement
summary: You can use your knowledge of engineering and metalwork to temporarily strengthen thick objects and structures.

name: Dwarven Weapon Cunning
summary: You’ve learned cunning techniques to get the best effects out of your dwarven weapons.

name: Easily Dismissed
summary: You are practiced at blending into the background of the streets and halls of larger folk to ensure that you are overlooked.

name: Eat Fortune
summary: As someone tries to twist fate, you consume the interference.

name: Eclectic Obsession
summary: Your desire for stimulation has led you from one pursuit to another and granted you a smattering of expertise with myriad crafts and professions.

name: Elemental Bulwark
summary: You call upon the corresponding elements of your suli heritage to resist the effect.

name: Elven Instincts
summary: Your senses let you react rapidly.

name: Elven Weapon Elegance
summary: You are attuned to the weapons of your elven ancestors and are particularly deadly when using them.

name: Embodied Dreadnought Subjectivity
summary: Your colossal might marks you as a behemoth, the pride of Nex's Fleshforges, and the heaviest ordnance is a child's toy in your monumental grasp.

name: Empathic Calm
summary: Once per day, you can cast either _calm emotions_ or _sanctuary_ as an innate occult spell, heightened to half your level rounded up.

name: Empyreal Blessing
summary: You can call forth a benediction upon your allies, whether you pray to a deity of the celestial realms or just find the power within yourself.

name: Energized Font
prerequisite: focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells
summary: You can focus your mind more quickly thanks to the magic that flows within you.

name: Enthralling Allure
summary: The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well.

name: Envenom Fangs
summary: You envenom your fangs.

name: Expanded Luck
summary: You are luckier even than most catfolk.

name: Expert Drill Sergeant
summary: You know how to get the most out of your allies.

name: Extinguish Light
summary: You wrap shadow around a single unattended light source within 120 feet that's no larger than a torch.

name: Extraplanar Supplication
summary: You call upon divine power to place a benediction upon your allies or a malediction upon your foes.

name: Favorable Winds
summary: You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield.

name: Feathered Cloak
summary: To blend in with the grounded and wingless, you fold your wings just so on your back, creating the illusion of a feathered cloak.

name: Feed on Pain
summary: The psychic feedback of another creature's pain fills you with false life.

name: Fey Disguise
summary: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions.

name: Fey Influence
summary: Your exposure to fey influence has given you some primal magic

name: Fiendish Resistance
summary: Your connection to your fiendish forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

name: Fighting Horn
summary: You can modify the size and shape of your horn over time using your mental powers.

name: Finned Ridges
summary: The ridges and flaps of your skin steer you through the water.

name: Firesight
summary: You can see through the haze of flame.

name: Fledgling Flight
summary: You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.

name: Flexible Tail
summary: You can perform simple Interact actions with your tail, such as opening an unlocked door.

name: Fluid Contortionist
summary: You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze.

name: Focused Cat Nap
summary: When you Cat Nap, you can also Refocus as you dream of a relevant activity.

name: Forest Stealth
summary: You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage.

name: Formation Training
summary: You know how to fight in formation with your brethren.

name: Fortify Shield
summary: You reinforce your shield with a rocky outgrowth of metal and stone.

name: Friendform
summary: The shared bond between you and your allies allows you to act on their behalf.

name: Gaping Flesh
summary: Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker.

name: Garuda's Squall
summary: Garudas' marksmanship and magic are second nature to you.

name: Gecko's Grip
summary: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip.

name: Genie Weapon Flourish
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: Whenever you critically hit using a falchion, ranseur, scimitar, trident, or a geniekin weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

name: Ghoran Weapon Practice
summary: With plenty of practice, the memories of previous fights from previous lives come flooding back.

name: Gnaw
summary: With enough time and determination, you can chew through nearly anything.

name: Gnoll Weapon Practicality
summary: You have come to know gnoll weapons as you know yourself.

name: Gnome Weapon Innovator
summary: You produce outstanding results when wielding unusual weapons.

name: Goblin Weapon Frenzy
summary: You know how to wield your people’s vicious weapons.

name: Graceful Guidance
summary: You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects.

name: Greater Animal Senses
summary: Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect.

name: Grippli Glide
summary: You can use your webbed feet to guide your fall.

name: Grippli Weapon Innovator
summary: You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons.

name: Grovel
summary: With obsequious words and begging gestures, you convince your foe you're less of a threat.

name: Guided by the Stars
summary: The stars grant you insights that guide your actions.

name: Halfling Ingenuity
summary: While your willingness to dig into a task you know little about might get you into trouble, your incredible luck often saves you from danger.

name: Halfling Weapon Trickster
summary: You are particularly adept at fighting with your people’s favored weapons.

name: Healer's Halo
summary: Your halo can enhance positive energy.

name: Heatwave
summary: You harness the oncoming flames and twist them into a screen of heat and smoke, granting you concealment until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Histrionic Injury
summary: You respond with a startled look, dramatic pratfall, or theatrical arm-flailing that stymies your attacker.

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline
summary: You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters.

name: Hopping Stride
summary: You've internalized the hopping gait of your vampiric forebear.

name: Hunter's Fangs
summary: Your fangs are exceptionally painful.

name: Hybrid Form
summary: When you Change Shape, you retain elements of your kitsune form, allowing you to speak in a fox form, use kitsune unarmed attacks in a tailless form, or gain a tail in your tailless form to use abilities that require one.

name: Hybrid Shape
summary: Mastery of your shapeshifting lets you combine the best features of your humanoid and spider forms.

name: Hypnotic Lure
trait: Concentrate, Enchantment, Mental, Nagaji, Occult, Visual
summary: Your unblinking gaze is so intense it can befuddle the mind of others, drawing your victims toward you even against their better judgment.

name: Inoculation Subroutine
summary: Your nanites reject diseases with ease.

name: Inspire Imitation
summary: Your actions inspire your allies to great achievements.

name: Integrated Armament
summary: Your mechanical body houses a weapon or shield that you can quickly draw and stow, leaving you prepared for combat at all times.

name: Intercorporate
summary: Your ordered physiology rejects unwelcome elements.

name: Intuitive Illusions
summary: Illusion magic comes to you so naturally that you can effortlessly sustain your magical ruses.

name: Inured to the Heat
summary: Your have a love for extreme heat.

name: Iruxi Glide
summary: You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air.

name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
summary: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks.

name: Jungle Runner
summary: You run through the jungle as easily as you would through an open field.

name: Kitsune Spell Mysteries
prerequisite: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
summary: You know more kitsune magic.

name: Kneecap
summary: You deliver a punishing blow to an enemy's knee, shin, or other vulnerable anatomy within your reach.

name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
summary: You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons.

name: Lab Rat
summary: You've spent more than your share of time in an alchemy lab.

name: Leshy Glide
prerequisite: Leaf Leshy heritage or Cat Fall
summary: Using your own leaves, you can control your descent.

name: Lifesense
summary: You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your psychopomp forebears.

name: Light Paws
summary: You can balance on your toes to step carefully over obstructions.

name: Lightless Litheness
summary: Your body is almost as flexible as your shadow.

name: Long Tongue
summary: You've learned to stretch your exceptionally long tongue beyond its original limits.

name: Long-Nosed Form
summary: You can transform into a specific, curious-looking human form.

name: Loud Singer
summary: Staying on pitch, proper breath control, and remembering the words are all less important than the real measure of a good singer: volume!

name: Loyal Empath
summary: You have incredible empathy for your friends and family, and you have an innate timing for helping others in distress.

name: Lucky Break
summary: You catch yourself as you make a mistake.

name: Magical Resistance
summary: Your animating magic provides some defense.

name: Magpie Snatch
summary: You move quickly, snatching a shiny item that catches your eye.

name: Malicious Bane
summary: Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes.

name: Marine Ally
summary: You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you.

name: Martial Experience
summary: You've crossed blades with a wide variety of foes wielding a wide variety of weapons, and you've learned the basics of fighting with nearly any of them.

name: Mask of Power
summary: Your _warmask_ sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power.

name: Mask of Rejection
summary: Your _warmask_ projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic.

name: Mist Child
summary: You blend in with unnatural subtlety.

name: Mistaken Identity
summary: You feel a strong connection with your progenitor and can convince yourself an effect targeting your mind was meant for theirs instead, allowing you to shrug off harmful effects.

name: Murderous Thorns
prerequisite: Hidden Thorn or Thorned Rose heritage
summary: Your thorns are many, vicious, and sharp.

name: Mutate Weapon
summary: deal more damage with your Living Weapon.

name: Myriad Forms
summary: With a bit of self-discovery, you find a new form.

name: Nagaji Spell Mysteries
prerequisite: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat
summary: You've learned more naga magic.

name: Nanite Shroud
summary: Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud.

name: Natural Illusionist
summary: By drawing upon the First World’s magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion.

name: Necromantic Physiology
summary: Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you.

name: Nephilim Resistance
summary: You resist energy like your extraplanar predecessors.

name: Noble Resolve
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: Once, genies ruled vast kingdoms, and a remnant of that confidence and power is reflected in your strong will.

name: Nothing but Fluff
summary: Your fluffy interior lacks specific organs and struts, with few weak spots to injure.

name: Offensive Analysis
summary: You can enhance your senses and mental state to consider every aspect of an attack.

name: One-Toed Hop
summary: Assuming a peculiar stance, you make a short hop on each toe.

name: Orc Weapon Carnage
summary: You are brutally efficient with the weapons of your orc ancestors.

name: Ornate Tattoo
summary: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic.

name: Pack Stalker
summary: Ambushes are an honored gnoll tradition.

name: Past Life
summary: Flashes of your life become clearer and more frequent, allowing you to apply skills you developed while alive.

name: Plague Sniffer
summary: You can sniff out the pungent tang of disease.

name: Powerful Guts
summary: Your stomach is particularly durable.

name: Practiced Paddler
summary: You’re skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony.

name: Precious Alloys
summary: Your unarmed attacks gain the properties of special materials.

name: Pride Hunter
summary: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies.

name: Project Persona
summary: Where others etch their armor to serve as a conduit for their imaginations, your vivid mind and bold personality allow you to project a more fitting persona over your lackluster armor.

name: Protective Claws
summary: The chitin on your claws is so hard you can defend against attacks with them.

name: Protective Sheath
summary: When you lash out with your clan dagger, you keep its sheath close at hand.

name: Protective Subroutine
summary: Your nanites can augment your defenses.

name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
summary: You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches.

name: Ragdya's Revelry
summary: You dart away from your foe's attack with a casual laugh, using the opening to cause mischief.

name: Rat Magic
summary: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you.

name: Ratfolk Roll
summary: Your ability to curl up into a tight ball comes in handy.

name: Read the Roots
summary: The root systems of trees are a far-reaching network of information, and you know how to access them and extract their secrets.

name: Recognize Ambush
summary: Your combat training has honed you to be ready for an attack at all times.

name: Reflective Pocket
summary: You've formed a connection with a small hand mirror, allowing you to use it as an extradimensional storage space.

name: Renewing Quills
summary: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks.

name: Replicate
summary: You've learned to reshape your malleable form.

name: Restoring Blood
summary: Your body can process an alternative to your venom that heals wounds.

name: Reveal Hidden Self
summary: While hidden, you manifest a version of your animalistic nature.

name: Right-Hand Blood
summary: It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that of the left side is poisonous.

name: Ritual Reversion
summary: You can temporarily revert to a less conspicuous form without diminishing your senses.

name: Runtsage
summary: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions.

name: Scar-Thick Skin
summary: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body, girding you in fleshly armor that resists any wound weaker than those you have already survived.

name: Scion of Many Planes
summary: The long and complicated history of your bloodline manifests in your ability to draw power from more planar sources than most other nephilim.

name: Sealed Poppet
summary: You've reinforced your interior parts with sealant or other flame-retardant materials, protecting you from fire.

name: Sense Allies
summary: Like many humans raised in a close-knit community, you have always been strongly attuned to the presence of others.

name: Shadowy Disguise
summary: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance.

name: Shared Luck (Halfling)
summary: You are evidence that it’s lucky to travel with a halfling.

name: Shed Tail
summary: You can shed your tail to escape.

name: Sheltering Slab
summary: The stone around you is your ally, and you have learned to use it to shore up your weaknesses.

name: Shifting Faces
summary: You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you.

name: Shoki's Argument
summary: You feel a connection to shokis, the rambling collectors of wayward souls, and might have found old texts written by one.

name: Skilled Climber
summary: You can navigate vertical surfaces with ease.

name: Skillful Climber
summary: You can scamper up or down surfaces as nimbly as a monkey.

name: Skillful Tail
summary: You’ve always had a tail, but with practice, you’ve learned to use it for more than signaling your mood.

name: Skillful Tail (Ganzi)
summary: You have a tail or similar body part that is always willing to lend a hand (so to speak).

name: Skin Split
summary: You claw open the top layer of your scales and peel off the premature shed in order to remove harmful substances from your skin.

name: Slip with the Breeze
summary: You create gusts of wind when you jump, allowing you to carry yourself across greater distances.

name: Snare Genius
summary: Your expertise makes your snares more powerful, and you can place them quickly and efficiently.

name: Spark Fist
summary: You dust explosive black powder on your fist or glove before attacking, which combusts as you hit an opponent.

name: Spark of Independence
summary: You touch a creature with the minion trait and share the heightened sense of autonomy you've discovered.

name: Speak with Flowers
summary: At your very heartwood, you're a flower animated by elder magic, and with a little effort, you can speak to your kindred.

name: Speak with Kindred
summary: You have a connection with creatures that share your physiology.

name: Spirit Soother
summary: You are attuned to the minute sounds and sensations of restless spirits.

name: Springing Leaper
summary: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps.

name: Steam Spell
summary: You transform your fire spells into steam, making them more effective underwater.

name: Step Lively
summary: You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures.

name: Strix Vengeance
summary: You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin.

name: Supernatural Charm
summary: The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring.

name: Swift Swimmer
summary: You swim faster than most iruxi.

name: Swimming Poppet
summary: Your fins, flippers, or other accessories assist with steering you through water.

name: Tail Snatch
summary: You can whip your tail around to lash items from the unwary's grip.

name: Tail Spin
summary: You excel at using your tail as a weapon to upend your foes.

name: Taste Blood
prerequisite: Cel Rau, Straveika, Svetocher, or another lineage from a vampire with the Drink Blood ability
summary: You retain not only your vampiric parent's taste for blood but their ability to gain vitality from it.

name: Tenacious Net
summary: Escaping your nets is no simple task.

name: Tengu Feather Fan
summary: You've learned to bind some of your feathers together into a fan to focus your ancestral magic.

name: Tengu Weapon Study
summary: You've learned techniques for using blades and other tengu weapons.

name: Thrown Voice
summary: You've learned how to throw your voice through the winds, tricking others as to your location.

name: Tomb-Watcher's Glare
summary: When you critically hit an undead creature, or an undead creature critically fails a saving throw against one of your abilities, you drive your divine wrath home in your enemy’s heart.

name: Tongue Disarm
summary: You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe.

name: Torch Goblin
summary: You’ve spent enough time on fire that you know how to use it to your advantage.

name: Tough Tumbler
summary: You’ve taken your share of licks while scurrying around the battlefield and know how to defend yourself against opportunistic attackers.

name: Towering Presence
trait: Concentrate, Divine, Illusion, Polymorph, Tiefling, Transmutation
summary: You fill an area with your force of will, towering beyond where your true form should be.

name: Tranquil Sanctuary
summary: Whenever possible, you follow the serene path and encourage others to do the same.

name: Transposable Compliance
summary: Your protean vitality is fecund and many-succoring: your veins run with life-giving ichor that adapts to the blood and physiology of any body, and your skin molts on command, creating wound-stanching sheaths of tissue for yourself and others.

name: Treacherous Earth
summary: You have the power to shatter the earth into a shape of your devising.

name: Tree Climber (Goblin)
prerequisite: Tailed Goblin heritage or Treedweller Goblin heritage
summary: Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet.

name: Tree's Ward
summary: You've lived among trees for so long they recognize your presence and seek to protect you from harm.

name: Treespeech
summary: Your connection to elemental wood allows you to communicate with trees in the Universe in Muan, the language of wood elementals.

name: Uncanny Awareness
summary: You have a keen sense of movement around you.

name: Undead Companion
prerequisite: an animal companion or a familiar
summary: Your companion is also touched by undeath, a mix of a traditional companion and a skeleton, zombie, or stranger form of unlife.

name: Undead Slayer
summary: Your knowledge of your own not-quite-living anatomy, combined with your experience in combat, helps you take down undead foes with ease.

name: Unlock Secret
summary: You delve deeper into your psychic potential.

name: Vanara Weapon Trickery
summary: You've learned how to trick your foes using vanara weapons.

name: Vandal
summary: You have a knack for breaking and dismantling things.

name: Vanth's Weapon Execution
summary: You've trained in the finer points of dealing death.

name: Venom Spit
summary: You've learned the art of lobbing toxic spittle at vulnerable spots on your foes, especially the eyes.

name: Victorious Vigor
summary: Your victories in battle fill you with pride and imbue you with the energy to fight a bit longer despite your wounds.

name: Vishkanya Weapon Arts
summary: You are graceful and efficient in the use of vishkanyan weapons.

name: Ward Against Corruption
summary: Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as sahkils.

name: Warp Likeness
summary: You channel some of your own nature through your blow, temporarily warping your target's form to resemble your own.

name: Water Conjuration
summary: You carry the ocean with you wherever you go.

name: Wavetouched Paragon
summary: You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish.

name: Well of Potential
prerequisite:
focus pool, at least one innate spell from a
kashrishi heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at
least one of your focus spells
summary: Your mind is a deep well of psychic potential.

name: Well-armed
summary: Your detachable limbs offer flexibility.

name: Wildborn Adept
summary: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic.

name: Winglets
summary: You're among the few kobolds who grow a set of draconic wings later in life.

name: Abundant Step
summary: You can teleport yourself a short distance.

name: Adaptive Mask Familiar
summary: Your mask familiar adapts quickly to material form, allowing it to gain more familiar and master abilities.

name: Additional Recollection
summary: You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face.

name: Advanced Arcana
summary: You gain one wizard feat.

name: Advanced Blood Potency
summary: You gain one sorcerer feat.

name: Advanced Bloodline
summary: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

name: Advanced Bow Training
summary: Through constant practice and the crucible of experience, you increase your skill with advanced bows.

name: Advanced Breakthrough
summary: You gain one inventor feat.

name: Advanced Concoction
summary: You gain one alchemist feat.

name: Advanced Deduction
summary: You gain one investigator feat.

name: Advanced Devotion
summary: You gain one champion feat.

name: Advanced Dogma
summary: You gain one cleric feat.

name: Advanced Element Control
summary: You gain one kineticist feat.

name: Advanced Elemental Spell
prerequisite: flame order, stone order, storm order, or wave order
summary: Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers.

name: Advanced Flair
summary: You gain one swashbuckler feat.

name: Advanced Fury
summary: You gain one barbarian feat.

name: Advanced Hunter's Trick
summary: You gain one ranger feat.

name: Advanced Kata
summary: You gain one monk feat.

name: Advanced Maneuver
summary: You gain a fighter feat.

name: Advanced Martial Magic
summary: You gain one magus feat.

name: Advanced Muse's Whispers
summary: You gain one bard feat.

name: Advanced Mysteries
summary: You gain one oracle feat.

name: Advanced Red Mantis Magic
summary: Your Red Mantis magical training has improved.

name: Advanced Revelation
summary: You learn an advanced revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Advanced Shooter
summary: You've dedicated your training to the most complex and weird weapons of your favorite group.

name: Advanced Shooting
summary: You gain one gunslinger feat.

name: Advanced Synergy
summary: You gain one summoner feat.

name: Advanced Thaumaturgy
summary: You gain one thaumaturge feat.

name: Advanced Thoughtform
summary: You gain one psychic feat.

name: Advanced Trickery
summary: You gain one rogue feat.

name: Advanced Weapon Training
summary: You’ve studied the art of wielding an advanced weapon.

name: Advanced Wilding
summary: You gain one druid feat.

name: Advanced Witchcraft
summary: You gain one witch feat.

name: Advantageous Assault
summary: After compromising your enemy’s movement, you deliver a more deadly blow.

name: Agile Maneuvers
summary: Your easily maneuver against your foes.

name: Aldori Riposte
summary: Learn to strike back at your opponent when they fail to attack you.

name: Align Ki
summary: The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle.

name: Analyze Idiolect
prerequisite: Linguist Dedication; Expert in Deception; Expert in Society
summary: You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

name: Analyze Weakness
summary: Your knowledge of a creature’s physiology helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Animal Skin
summary: When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide.

name: Animate Net
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _animate rope_
summary: When you cast _animate rope_, you can modify it to animate a net.

name: Anticipate Ambush
summary: You keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel Speed.

name: Arcane Sensitivity
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 79</row>
summary: You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself.

name: Archaeologist's Warning
summary: You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

name: Armor Specialist
summary: You have trained hard to optimize your armor's protective qualities.

name: Artokus's Fire
summary: Artokus developed a mixture of volatile materials that burns hotter and longer than typical alchemist's fire.

name: Ash Strider
trait: Air, Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: You discorporate into a cloud of whirling ash and Stride.

name: Assured Knowledge
summary: You can procure information with confidence.

name: Attack of Opportunity
summary: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Axe Thrower
summary: You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease.

name: Basic Magus Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Scroll Cache
summary: You have a vast and overflowing collection of scroll scraps, riddled with errors and misspellings and leaking energy like a sieve.

name: Basic Summoner Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Bear Hug
summary: You snatch at your opponent with your claws, pulling them close in a ferocious bear hug.

name: Beast Gunner Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana; Trained in Crafting; expert with at least one type of firearm, you own a beast gun and have slain the type of creature associated with your beast gun in a fair hunt (see above)
summary: You've bonded to your beast gun and unlocked the first hints of its hidden potential.

name: Beastmaster's Trance
summary: You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses.

name: Bellflower Dedication
prerequisite: Charisma 14; Expert in Stealth; Expert in Survival; member of the Bellflower Network
summary: You dedicate yourself to freeing slaves and escorting them to freedom.

name: Benevolent Spirit Deck
summary: You manifest a ghostly deck of harrow cards that seek to protect you or an ally.

name: Betraying Shank
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 79</row>
summary: While your usual diplomacy is well intentioned, you know that sometimes those same skills will need to be turned to deception.

name: Blazing Talon Surge
summary: You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

name: Blood Frenzy
summary: Your eidolon flies into a frenzy.

name: Boaster's Challenge
prerequisite: Expert in Deception, Expert in Diplomacy, or Expert in Intimidation; Firebrand Braggart Dedication
summary: You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat.

name: Bolera's Interrogation
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace pg. 79</row>
summary: You can force a creature to tell the truth

name: Brains!
summary: You consume the brains of your foe, causing synapses long rotten to fire and enabling you to shake off your mental torpor.

name: Brutal Bully
summary: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

name: Bullet Dancer Burn
summary: The fiery blaze of your weapons combined with your unorthodox technique leaves your opponents with little opportunity to capitalize on any gaps in your defenses, or properly defend themselves against your onslaught.

name: Burning Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental fire, causing it to set the target on fire.

name: Burning Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental fire, causing it to set the target on fire.

name: Butterfly's Kiss
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: You can make nonlethal Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

name: Butterfly's Sting
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: You gain the sneak attack class feature.

name: Cadence Call
summary: You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm.

name: Cannon Corner Shot
summary: By loading special ammunition in a particular way, you can make your siege weapons do all manner of tricks that other siege engineers can barely even imagine.

name: Captivating Intensity
summary: Your ability to captivate others has grown, and you can use your captivator abilities more often.

name: Cascade Bearer's Flexibility
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
summary: You call upon your Cascade Bearer training to help you adjust a spell for the current situation.

name: Cascade Countermeasure
summary: When in Arcane Cascade, you can make yourself resistant to magic.

name: Cast Down
summary: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

name: Cast Out
summary: You attempt to cast a malevolent entity out of the creature or object it's possessing.

name: Cauterize
summary: You use the smoking barrel of your firearm to sear shut a bleeding wound.

name: Ceremonial Knife
summary: You have prepared a special knife to direct energies when spellcasting.

name: Champion's Reaction
summary: You can use the champion’s reaction associated with your cause.

name: Clear as Air
trait: Air, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: Compact layers of air diffract and bend light around your body, making you appear as clear as the sky on a perfect day.

name: Clear the Way
summary: You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path.

name: Cleave
summary: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

name: Clinch Strike
summary: Your opponents can't slip your grasp without receiving further punishment.

name: Clockwork Celerity
summary: You can use unstable clockwork devices in your innovation to push your invention to act more quickly.

name: Combination Finisher
summary: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow.

name: Combine Elixirs
summary: You’ve discovered how to mix two elixirs into a single hybrid concoction.

name: Confounding Image
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _mirror image_
summary: When you cast _mirror image_, you can modify it to create a duplicate of yourself.

name: Connect the Dots
summary: Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

name: Construct Shell
summary: You've adjusted your construct innovation so that when you ride it, special plates, hollows, or similar form partial barriers around you to add additional protection.

name: Consume Power
summary: You absorb energy and hold it in your kinetic gate.

name: Convincing Illusion
summary: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

name: Corrupted Shield
summary: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

name: Counter Element
summary: Your absolute dedication to a single element lets you attempt to gain control over it, even when the element is in service to another entity.

name: Counter Perform
summary: You gain the counter performance composition spell.

name: Craft Facsimile
prerequisite: Expert in Crafting; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
summary: You're renowned for your ability to recover important items and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in.

name: Crane Flutter
summary: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.

name: Crawling Fire
summary: You mimic the motions of a beast of your devising, and it becomes real, with a flaming pelt and searing claws.

name: Crimson Shroud
summary: You can surround yourself with bloody mist.

name: Crossbow Terror
summary: You are a dynamo with the crossbow.

name: Crowd Mastery
summary: You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd.

name: Crown of the Saumen Kar
summary: Your body begins to evolve and adapt, taking the first steps towards blending your very self with the ancient curse of the saumen kar.

name: Crushing Step
summary: The weight of your armored feet casts aside natural impediments.

name: Current Spell
summary: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

name: Current Spell
summary: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you spin off some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

name: Daring Act
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics or Trained in Athletics; Firebrand Braggart Dedication
summary: You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies.

name: Dash of Herbs
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Vitality, Wood
summary: A small cloud of medicinal herbs heal a creature.

name: Daywalker
summary: Through a profane pledge or a bloodline quirk, you can tolerate the sun's light.

name: Dazing Blow
summary: You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them.

name: Dazzling Bullet
summary: Your tricks discombobulate your opponent, leaving spots in their vision from the bright flash of your gunshot reflected straight into their eyes.

name: Death Warden
summary: With your intimate familiarity with the duality of positive and negative energy, you're able to stand as a bulwark against death and undeath alike.

name: Deathly Secrets
summary: No means of creating or ruling the undead is beyond your grasp, even those of magical traditions not your own.

name: Debilitating Bomb
summary: Your bombs impose additional effects on your enemies.

name: Defend Mount
summary: You interpose yourself between an attacker and your mount, defending your mount from harm.

name: Defensive Coordination
summary: Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line.

name: Defy Fey
summary: You are keen to the wiles of the fey and can usually shake off their magic.

name: Desert Wind
trait: Air, Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: A vortex of sand and dust surrounds you.

name: Detonating Spell
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Metamagic, Oracle, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
summary: Your spell becomes volatile and explosive.

name: Directional Bombs
summary: You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction.

name: Dirge of Doom
summary: You learn the dirge of doom composition cantrip (page 370), which frightens your enemies and keeps them from fully recovering from their fear.

name: Disarming Smile
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 78</row>
summary: With a wide, sincere smile, you give your attacker pause.

name: Disarming Stance
summary: You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

name: Discerning Gaze
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: You have a sense for when people are lying.

name: Discerning Strike
summary: Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses.

name: Disciple of Shade
summary: You've delved deeper into the mysteries of shadow and become blessed with magical power that increases your skills in the arts of deception and persuasion.

name: Disk Rider
