prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _floating disk_
summary: When you cast _floating disk_, you can modify it to ride atop.

name: Disrupting Strikes
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 79</row>
summary: You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead.

name: Diverting Vortex
summary: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.

name: Divine Ally
summary: You gain a divine ally of your choice.

name: Divine Emissary
prerequisite: a familiar, you follow a good-aligned deity or patron
summary: Your familiar is a divine emissary, sent to you by your deity or patron and infused with celestial powers.

name: Divine Rebuttal
summary: You strive against magical threats physically and spiritually.

name: Divine Weapon
summary: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

name: Dodge Away
summary: You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose.

name: Dragon Roar
summary: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.

name: Dragon's Rage Breath
summary: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

name: Drenching Mist
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _obscuring mist_
summary: When you cast _obscuring mist_, you can modify it to extinguish flames.

name: Drifter's Juke
summary: You move in and out of range to complement your attacks.

name: Driving Rain
summary: Heavy drops of rain batter down, hitting like sling stones and impeding vision.

name: Duel Spell Advantage
summary: When you start a psychic duel, you gain a third natural psychic spell.

name: Educate Allies
summary: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

name: Eidolon's Opportunity
summary: Your eidolon makes a melee Strike against the triggering creature.

name: Eidolon's Wrath
summary: Your eidolon gains the _eidolon's wrath_ focus spell, which it casts, instead of you.

name: Eldritch Archer Dedication
prerequisite: expert in at least one type of bow
summary: You blend magic with your archery, leading to powerful results.

name: Elemental Artillery
trait: Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal, Wood
summary: Spinning wood and metal together, you create a rugged wooden ballista.

name: Elemental Explosion
summary: You unleash the energy roiling within you.

name: Elysium's Cadence
prerequisite: You've partied extensively with an azata or entered a romantic relationship with an azata.
summary: You've been ensnared by an azata's infectious enthusiasm for life, love, and freedom that manifests as a pearlescent afterimage in your graceful movements, a spring in your soft steps, an ever-present melody in your euphonic voice, and eddies of passionate colors in your mesmerizing eyes.

name: Emerald Boughs Accustomation
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Expert in Society
summary: You are comfortable and socially capable in almost any cultural context.

name: Endemic Herbs
summary: During your daily preparations, you find medicinal plants endemic to your location.

name: Energetic Resonance
summary: Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

name: Enervating Wail
summary: You release a terrible wail that tears at the spirits of all nearby.

name: Ephemeral Tracking
summary: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places.

name: Expanded Elemental Magic
summary: You reach new understandings of the elements, taking an expansive view.

name: Expeditious Advance
summary: You advance and retreat quickly.

name: Expert Alchemy
summary: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 3.

name: Expert Fireworks Crafter
prerequisite: Firework Technician Dedication; Expert in Crafting
summary: You're particularly adept at crafting fireworks, allowing you to create much more powerful fireworks than you otherwise could.

name: Expert Herbalism
summary: Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3.

name: Expert Poisoner
summary: Your advanced alchemy level for poison increases to your level – 3.

name: Exploit Opening
summary: You take advantage of your spotter's devastating attack to unleash your own follow-up attack.

name: Explosion
summary: Your innovation can explode on command.

name: Explosive Arrival
summary: Your summoned creature appears in a detonation of arcane runes.

name: Far Throw
summary: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

name: Fearsome Familiar
summary: Your elemental familiar trades places with an elemental from its elemental plane.

name: Feeling Your Oats
prerequisite: Celebrity Dedication or Dandy Dedication; Trained in Deception
summary: You are incredible, impeccable, an icon of style and grace—and everyone knows it.

name: Feverish Enzymes
summary: Your claws and fangs exude an infectious enzyme, related to the necrotic effects of ghoul fever, that causes a creature's wounds to heal slowly.

name: Fey Tracker
summary: You are exceptionally skilled at noticing the subtle techniques fey use to avoid notice.

name: Field Artillery
summary: While castles are generally obliging enough to stay in one place, out in the field positioning is of paramount importance—a gun in the wrong place is worse than useless.

name: Fleeting Shadow
summary: You're able to quickly disappear and then move about stealthily.

name: Flexible Ritualist
summary: You can perform two aspects of a ritual yourself.

name: Flinging Updraft
summary: A speeding wind heeds your call, picking someone up and depositing them nearby.

name: Follow-Up Strike
summary: You have trained to use all parts of your body as a weapon.

name: Forced Entry
prerequisite: Expert in Athletics; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
summary: You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering.

name: Frighten Undead
summary: Your very presence chills creatures of the night down to their core and you can use the spiritual power and faithful life force of religious verses to frighten even mindless undead.

name: Frightful Condemnation
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Harsh Judgment; Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: Your willingness to follow through on your pitiless judgment is frightful to the person you have condemned.

name: Fulminating Shot
summary: You channel potent magic into your next shot, empowering it with a blast of crackling energy.

name: Furious Focus
summary: You’ve learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously.

name: Gang Up
summary: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

name: Gear Up
summary: Whether it's wooden stakes, holy water, or more unusual tools, you always have just the right thing to handle an undead's unusual weaknesses and vulnerabilities.

name: Ghost Strike
summary: You can infuse a weapon you are carrying with magical energies that allow it to strike true against incorporeal undead.

name: Ghostly Grasp (Ghost)
summary: Your control over your ghostly form grows.

name: Giant's Stature
summary: You grow to incredible size.

name: Gorilla Pound
summary: You pound your chest before slamming into your foes.

name: Grave Mummification
summary: Exposure to the elements, magic, alchemy, and other phenomena intensified the changes from your mummification.

name: Grave Sense
summary: Learn how to sense undead in the area.

name: Grave Strength
summary: The flesh you've consumed over the course of your existence as a ghoul has made you stronger, gifting you with strange insights from the minds of the sapient creatures you've devoured and bringing you closer to a state of undead perfection.

name: Gravel Guts
summary: Stone never becomes queasy, so why should you? You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against the sickened condition.

name: Greater Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

name: Grown of Oak
summary: You can make your skin take on the woody endurance of an ancient tree and have your familiar follow suit.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
summary: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their Armor Class against the triggering attack.

name: Guide the Timeline
summary: You know the result you want and subtly nudge the timeline to your intended destination.

name: Guided Skill
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
summary: You ask your spirit guide for aid.

name: Halcyon Speaker Dedication
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; member of the Magaambya of conversant rank
summary: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

name: Harmonize
summary: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

name: Harrow Ritualist
summary: You immediately learn two of the following rituals: _astral projection_, _call spirit_, _commune_, _commune with nature_, _legend lore_, or _planar binding_.

name: Heaven's Thunder
summary: With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body.

name: Hellknight Dedication
prerequisite: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
summary: You have forged your body to comply with the commands of your mind—orders steeped in the Measure and the Chain.

name: Hellknight Signifer Dedication
prerequisite: spellcasting class feature; Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
summary: You have bolstered your force of will with the power of the Measure and the Chain.

name: High-Quality Scrounger
summary: When you Craft a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level.

name: High-Speed Regeneration
summary: Your wounds knit together with barely a thought.

name: Holistic Care
summary: You provide emotional and spiritual care.

name: Implement Initiate
summary: You gain your implement's initiate benefit.

name: Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)
summary: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Inertial Barrier
summary: Your spell leaves behind barriers that reduce shock and motion.

name: Inexorable
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 80</row>
summary: You imbue yourself with the resilience of the cave worm.

name: Infiltrate Dream
summary: Entering a dream is as natural to you as stepping through a doorway.

name: Inner Fire (SoM)
summary: While you're in Stoked Flame Stance, you have cold and fire resistance, and any creature touches you takes fire damage.

name: Inner Strength
summary: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

name: Insect Shape
summary: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

name: Instinct Ability
summary: You gain the instinct ability for the instinct you chose for Barbarian Dedication.

name: Instinctive Support
summary: When you support your animal companion, your companion supports you in turn.

name: Invigorating Mercy
summary: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

name: Irresistible Magic
summary: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate defenses against magic that dragons, otherworldly beings, and certain other powerful creatures have.

name: It's Alive!
summary: You've mastered the use of electrical energy to power your clockwork creations.

name: Jagged Berms
trait: Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Wood
summary: You conjure up to six cube-shaped mounds of packed earth.

name: Jelly Body
prerequisite: You've been reduced to 0 Hit Points while engulfed by an ooze.
summary: Some of the ooze that surrounded you made its way permanently into parts of your body, turning you soft to the touch and semitransparent enough to show bones.

name: Keen Recollection
summary: You can recall all sorts of information.

name: Keep Pace
summary: Your prey can't escape.

name: Keep Pace
summary: When your hunted prey tries to bolt, you follow.

name: Ki Blast
summary: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki.

name: Ki Cutting Sight
summary: Everything is connnected—all is part of the whole. Find where to add your ki and you can break the whole.

name: Knight Reclaimant Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Stealth; Trained in Survival; any non-evil alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank
summary: You have sworn the Crimson Oath and become a full member of the Crimson Reclaimers.

name: Knight Vigilant
prerequisite: Trained in Religion; any good alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank
summary: You are dedicated to the cause of the Shining Sentinels.

name: Knowledge is Power
summary: When you critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check about a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the creature, to your AC against its next attack roll, and to your save against its next effect requiring a save.

name: Liberate Soul
summary: The light flows from your sigil of Pharasma to shatter the bonds imprisoning a soul.

name: Light Step
summary: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

name: Lightning Rod
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: You smash a metal rod into your foe and call lightning to it.

name: Litany Against Wrath
summary: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

name: Living Rune
summary: You’ve bridged a connection between the runes on your body and the magic of runestones, allowing you to place an armor rune on your living flesh.

name: Loyal Warhorse
summary: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

name: Macabre Virtuoso
prerequisite: Reanimator Dedication; Expert in Arcana, Expert in Occultism, or Expert in Religion
summary: Any necromancer can create zombie and skeleton, but you know the secrets behind the creation of far more advanced undead monstrosities.

name: Mage Hunter
summary: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

name: Magic Hands
summary: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, integrating magical healing with the mundane.

name: Mammoth Charge
summary: You Command an Animal to order your megafauna companion to Stride twice.

name: Master Summoner
summary: During daily preparations, you can designate one of your spell slots to become two summoning slots of the same spell level, from which you can cast only summoning or incarnate spells.

name: Masterful Warden
summary: Your mastery of warden magic increases.

name: Mastermind's Eye
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: When you identify a creature with Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed to you.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion becomes a mature animal companion and gains additional capabilities (page 211).

name: Mature Megafauna Companion
summary: You've raised your megafauna companion to be a more powerful force on the battlefield than most of its kind.

name: Mature Trained Companion
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
summary: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion.

name: Megafauna Veterinarian
prerequisite: Mammoth Lord Dedication; Expert in Nature
summary: By heeding the wise advice of elders in your following— and aided by your own experience—you've learned how to provide medical care to the megafauna of the Mammoth Lord followings.

name: Megavolt
summary: You bleed off some electric power from your innovation in the shape of a damaging bolt.

name: Mesmerizing Gaze
summary: When you meet someone's gaze, they are unable to look away.

name: Mind Shards
summary: With a swing and a thought, you detonate your mind weapon into a burst of psychic shards that shred the mind.

name: Molten Wire
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Metal, Primal
summary: Spinning molten iron through a vortex of fire, you trap your foe in searing wires.

name: Mountain Stronghold
summary: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you.

name: Mounted Shield
summary: You've trained with your shield to defend both yourself and your mount.

name: Mummy's Despair
trait: Archetype, Aura, Divine, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental
summary: You force your mental anguish outward, projecting it upon those around you.

name: Munitions Machinist
summary: You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs.

name: Nameless Anonymity
summary: Your mask protects you further from divination.

name: Narrative Conduit
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 78</row>
summary: You act as a conduit for your companions just as your stories are a conduit between teller and listener.

name: Night's Glow
summary: The stars and moon lend you their light.

name: Nightwave Springing Reload
summary: Training with the crew of the Nightwave has taught you their technique for reloading while leaping to board another ship.

name: Nimble Shield Hand
summary: You are so used to wielding a shield that you can do so even while using the hand that's holding it for other purposes.

name: No Hard Feelings
summary: Despite the devastation your weapons tend to inflict upon their targets or the destruction you might unleash upon an area, your foes still manage to walk away at the end of a fight—at least sometimes.

name: Nocturnal Sense
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
summary: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

name: Numb
summary: As your body continues to rot and putrefy, your senses deaden and your undead powers grow.

name: Obscured Terrain
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _obscuring mist_
summary: When you cast _obscuring mist_, you can modify the spell to blanket the area, making it difficult to see the ground.

name: One More Activation
summary: You've forged a deeper bond to your invested items, allowing you to activate them more than usual.

name: One-Inch Punch
summary: You put all your force into a single mighty, carefully controlled blow.

name: Ostentatious Arrival
summary: If the next action you take is to Manifest your Eidolon as a three-action activity, or to Cast a three-action summoning Spell, the creature appears in an explosion.

name: Pact of Draconic Fury
summary: You've sworn a pact with a dragon, giving you the ability to tap into the dragon's immeasurable power in exchange for adding to their hoard.

name: Pain Tolerance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You gain resistance to mental damage equal to half your level and a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you clumsy, drained, or enfeebled.

name: Parallel Breakthrough
summary: You expand your mind beyond your area of psychic specialty.

name: Perfect Ki Adept
summary: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection.

name: Performative Weapons Training
summary: You're skilled with flashy weapons.

name: Perpetual Scout
summary: You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best.

name: Phalanx Breaker
summary: You know that to take out an enemy formation, you must punch a hole through its center.

name: Phase Out
summary: Your eidolon phases out of reality slightly, gaining resistance to all damage (except force and negative) equal to half your level.

name: Pirouette
summary: You twirl gracefully, spinning on one foot to evade your opponent's attack.

name: Pistolero's Challenge
summary: With a stern call, carefully chosen barb, or some other challenging declaration, you demand your foe's attention in a duel.

name: Piston Punch
summary: You lash out with a powerful punch, extending your dynamo to a greater length in order to attack two creatures in a row.

name: Poison Coat
summary: In nature, certain animals are covered in venomous spines, such that even touching them is deadly.

name: Polearm Tricks
summary: Your connection to rune magic has revealed tricks to make polearms deadlier in your hands.

name: Practiced Opposition
summary: You've battled more undead than you care to remember, often with little time to prepare between foes, forcing you to rely on experience and muscle memory to guide your blade.

name: Precise Finisher
summary: Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot.

name: Predatory Claws
summary: Your nails grow into sharp claws, perfect for seizing and tearing your prey.

name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
summary: You have just the thing for the situation.

name: Psi Development
summary: You've found a new mental form.

name: Quick Snares
summary: You can rig a snare in only moments.

name: Rain-Scribe Sustenance
summary: You use the power of your Rain-Scribe magic to draw on a stream of primal power for sustenance.

name: Rallying Charge
summary: Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight.

name: Ranger's Bramble
summary: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns.

name: Rapid Manifestation
summary: Your unwavering soul brings up your defenses as soon as you're in danger.

name: Read the Dust
summary: You watch the creature or hazard as it collapses, careful for any sign it may return.

name: Reflexive Shield
summary: You can use your shield to fend off explosions and the like.

name: Relentless Disarm
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 81</row>
prerequisite: Zephyr Guard Dedication; Trained in Athletics
summary: You have been trained to disarm foes.

name: Reloading Trick
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 77</row>
summary: You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

name: Remote Trigger
summary: You've learned how to trigger snares from afar.

name: Repulse the Wicken
summary: You use your foe's failure as an opening to push them away.

name: Resourceful Ritualist
summary: You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill.

name: Return Fire
summary: Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire.

name: Revealing Stab
summary: You drive your piercing weapon into an imperceptible foe, revealing its location to your allies.

name: Ricochet Stance (Fighter)
summary: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Rising Hurricane
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: A hurricane lifts your enemies into the air before bringing them crashing down in a bloody rain.

name: Roiling Mudslide
trait: Composite, Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Water
summary: You form water and earth into a mudslide that smashes your opponents and coats them in mud.

name: Rough Terrain Stance
summary: You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you.

name: Sacred Armaments
summary: Through the power of your faith or the blessing of a priest, your weapons are fully effective against incorporeal creatures.

name: Sand Snatcher
summary: A figure of sand with grasping arms arises in an unoccupied square within 30 feet.

name: Say that Again!
summary: The world is full of obnoxious weasels who think they can pull one over on you—put them in their place! When an adjacent creature attempts to Lie to you or to Demoralize you and gets a critical failure on the roll, you can use your reaction to make a Shove attempt against that opponent.

name: Scatter Blast
summary: You pack your weapon with additional shot and powder, creating a risky but devastating wave of destruction.

name: Scholarly Defense
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: Your knowledge of strange creatures and their bizarre anatomy allows you to anticipate their physical attacks and reduce the damage you take from them.

name: Scouring Rage
prerequisite: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
summary: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

name: Scout's Speed
summary: You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies.

name: Scrap Barricade
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Overflow, Primal
summary: Ragged pieces of metal weld together into a ramshackle structure.

name: Scroll Esoterica
summary: Your esoterica includes scraps of scriptures, magic tomes, druidic markings, and the like, which you can use to create temporary scrolls.

name: Scrollmaster Dedication
prerequisite: expert in any Lore skill; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Scrolls
summary: Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory.

name: Second Shield
summary: You're used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle.

name: Selective Energy
summary: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

name: Share Burden
summary: You draw the misfortune or curse into yourself, potentially enabling you to enter your curse maelstrom state.

name: Shatter Defenses
summary: Your offense exploits your enemy’s fear.

name: Shield Wall
summary: You use your shield in tandem with an ally's, forming a barricade.

name: Shield Warden
prerequisite: [Champion] divine ally (shield); [Champion] tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
summary: When you have a shield raised, you can use your Shield Block reaction when an attack is made against an ally adjacent to you.

name: Shielded Tome
summary: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse a shield into your favorite book, where it appears as an elaborate bookmark.

name: Shove Down
summary: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

name: Simple Crystal Magic
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 74</row>
summary: You are capable of seeing magic as flowing runes and can scribe a personal rune that represents you.

name: Sixth Sense
summary: Your psychic abilities also allow you to detect the lingering thoughts of spirits and similar entities.

name: Skirmish Strike
summary: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

name: Sky and Heaven Stance
summary: You enter a stance allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky.

name: Slice and Swipe
summary: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

name: Slinger's Readiness
summary: You've learned a gunslinger's tricks for staking out your territory in a fight.

name: Sly Disarm
summary: You can Disarm a creature through sleight of hand rather than brute force.

name: Smite Evil
summary: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

name: Smite Good
summary: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

name: Snap Shot
summary: You can react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters.

name: Sniper's Aim
summary: You take an extra moment to carefully sync your aim and breathing, then fire a shot with great accuracy.

name: Snowstep
summary: Snow and ice are no hindrance to you.

name: Song of Marching
summary: You learn the song of marching composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.

name: Soul Arsenal
summary: Choose an additional soulforged armament of a different type than the type you already chose, and choose one essence power for it.

name: Sound Mirror
summary: You twist not just the visual, but the auditory as well, allowing you to pass without a sound and create minor noises as distractions—perfect for misdirection and infiltration.

name: Spell Relay
summary: You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range.

name: Spellmaster Dedication
prerequisite: Intelligence 14, Wisdom 14, or Charisma 14; ability to cast focus spells; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells
summary: As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic.

name: Spiral Sworn
summary: You trace a spiral in the air while intoning prayers to Pharasma, gaining her blessing for a time.

name: Spirit's Absolution
summary: You purify a spirit by absolving it of its sins and regrets.

name: Spirits' Interference
summary: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

name: Spiritual Sense
summary: You have a vague connection to the Ethereal Plane that enables you to notice spirits.

name: Spiritual Strike
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 82</row>
summary: Your spirit guide enhances your attacks with occult power.

name: Split Slot
summary: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

name: Staff Sweep
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
summary: You sweep your foes away with your staff.

name: Staggering Fire
summary: You've learned how to fire at enemies to slow them down, allowing innocents and fellow knights alike time to escape.

name: Startling Appearance (Vigilante)
summary: You can startle foes who are unaware of your presence.

name: Steady Spellcasting
trait: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Oracle, Psychic, Sorcerer, Witch, Wizard
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Steam Knight
trait: Composite, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance, Water
summary: You shape your kinetic aura into swirling armor of steam that scalds your enemies and propels you on super-heated jet streams.

name: Stella's Stab and Snag
summary: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement.

name: Sticky Poison
summary: A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

name: Stone Blood
summary: Your blood clots quickly.

name: Stone Blood
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: Your blood becomes thick and sluggish, but no less effective at oxygenating your cells.

name: Stonebound Magic
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: You've learned to manifest your connection to stone by conjuring it to your side.

name: Stoney Deflection
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: You gather the resiliency of stone to block attacks against you.

name: Storm Retribution
summary: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

name: Storming Breath
summary: You spit out a freezing breath or sonic scream.

name: Strain Mind
summary: You strain your body beyond its limits to use an amp even when your mental power is depleted.

name: Stumbling Feint
summary: You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

name: Sun's Fury
summary: The Old Sun Gods have granted you a gift in your fight against Walkena.

name: Superior Propulsion
summary: By experimenting with the effects of momentum gained from your signature vehicle's movement, you have learned to get more from propulsion than just speed when the pilot pushes the vehicle to its limit.

name: Surprise Strike
summary: Your sudden use of improvised weapons can take opponents off guard.

name: Swashbuckler's Riposte
summary: You've learned to riposte against ill-conceived attacks.

name: Swift Intervention
summary: You're burdened with noticing potential threats at all times.

name: Swift Tracker
summary: Your keen eyes catch signs of passage even when you’re moving.

name: Swordmaster Dedication
prerequisite: Strength 14, Dexterity 14, or Constitution 14; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Swords
summary: Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon.

name: Sympathetic Vulnerabilities
prerequisite: Exploit Vulnerability, mortal weakness or personal antithesis
summary: When you apply your will to invoke a vulnerability, the result is more powerful, and the vulnerability ripples out in a web from your main target to affect a broader range of creatures.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74</row>
summary: Your hair deals increased damage and can grapple.

name: Tandem Strike
summary: You and your eidolon each attack, seamlessly targeting the same foe without interfering with each other's movements.

name: Tap Vitality
summary: You tap into the entity's life force to heal your wounds, though at the cost of the entity's personality bleeding into your own.

name: Targeted Redirection
summary: You aim a shot at your spotter, intending for your spotter to redirect that shot off their own weapon or shield to hit your foe from a better angle, and avoid your foe's cover.

name: Tempest-Sun Redirection
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Tempest-Sun Mages affiliation
summary: If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots that damages other creatures, you can bend some of that spell’s offensive energy, protecting allies in the area and boosting your own defenses against certain foes.

name: Thorough Research
summary: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you learn an additional fact about the subject.

name: Thunder Clap
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You slam your hands together to unleash a deafening blast.

name: Tiger Slash
summary: You make a fierce swipe with both hands.

name: Time Mage Dedication
prerequisite: You have a spellcasting class feature.
summary: You might be a novice in the temporal arts now, but in the future, you'll hold time in the palm of your hand.

name: Torrent in the Blood
trait: Healing, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Vitality, Water
summary: A healing wave splashes across creatures in a 30-foot cone, its cleansing water driving afflictions from the body.

name: Tree of Duality
trait: Air, Composite, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Wood
summary: An ephemeral tree bursts forth, floating on air in an unoccupied square of your choice within 60 feet.

name: Triggerbrand Salvo
summary: You slice, stab, or batter your opponent with the melee portion of your combination weapon before pulling the trigger at point-blank range.

name: Triple Shot
summary: You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

name: Twist The Knife
summary: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

name: Two-Element Infusion
summary: Slamming one element into another, you combine their strengths.

name: Uneasy Rest
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _sleep_
summary: When you cast _sleep_, you can modify the spell to make subjects of your spell experience troubled dreams.

name: Unnerving Prowess
summary: Make a free Demoralize check when you critically succeed with your dueling sword.

name: Upset Balance
summary: You lean into your foe's attack, using the weight of your body and armor to send them reeling.

name: Urgent Upwelling
summary: Defeat lets you to tap into your wellspring.

name: Uzunjati Storytelling
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Uzunjati affiliation; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
summary: You tell a quick story or begin telling a longer tale.

name: Vacate Vision
summary: You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty.

name: Vengeful Spirit Deck
summary: You manifest a ghostly deck of harrow cards.

name: Vexing Tumble
summary: You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions.

name: Viking Weapon Specialist
summary: You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people.

name: Vision of Foresight
summary: You use your daydreams to predict the success of actions, rapidly envisioning the possibilities.

name: Visual Fidelity
summary: You've found a way to use a hodgepodge combination of devices to enhance your visual abilities in every situation.

name: Volatile Grease
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _grease_
summary: When you cast _grease_, you can modify it to cover a creature in flammable grease.

name: Volcanic Escape
summary: Lava reflexively explodes underneath you and the creature that hurt you.

name: Warding Rune
summary: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic.

name: Watch This!
summary: A common saying among Firebrands is, “There's always a fool who thinks they can do it better—and they're often right.” You verbally commit to using an action on your next turn to make a melee Strike against the same enemy your ally has missed.

name: Watch Your Back
summary: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

name: Water Step
summary: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight.

name: Water Step
summary: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces normally wouldn't support your weight.

name: Weight of Stone
summary: A packed cloud of thundering boulders descends from the sky, beating down everyone in its path.

name: Westyr's Wayfinder Repository
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
summary: You can use your _wayfinder_ to store a little extra magic for when you need it most.

name: Whirling Throw
summary: You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance.

name: Witch's Charge
summary: You forge a magical link with another creature, granting you awareness of that creature’s condition and creating a conduit for spellcasting.

name: Wolf Drag
summary: You rip your enemy off their feet.

name: Wooden Palisade
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Wood
summary: Planks of wood, embellished with carvings, spring forth to form a wall.

name: Worm's Feast
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 80</row>
summary: You call forth a brood of infantile cave worms to feast on your enemy's flesh.

name: Advanced First Aid
summary: Use First Aid to reduce frightened and sickened condition values

name: Aerobatics Mastery
summary: Improve your ability to Maneuver in Flight.

name: Ashen Veil
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Expert in Religion; Master in Stealth
summary: By smearing ash or tainted earth over your skin and armor, you shroud yourself from the dead.

name: Battle Cry
summary: Demoralizes foes when you roll for initiative

name: Battle Prayer
prerequisite: Master in Religion; you follow a deity
summary: Calling out to your deity, you recite scripture to harm a foe

name: Biographical Eye
summary: Intuit details about someone’s profession and residence.

name: Bizarre Magic
summary: Your magic becomes more difficult to identify

name: Bless Tonic
prerequisite: Master in Crafting; deity who grants _heal_ divine font
summary: You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm

name: Bless Toxin
prerequisite: Master in Crafting; deity who grants _harm_ divine font
summary: You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets

name: Break Curse
prerequisite: Expert in Occultism or Expert in Religion
summary: Use your knowledge to break curses

name: Chronocognizance
summary: The flows and ebbs of time are obvious to you, as are the tangles that form when it's distorted.

name: Consult the Spirits
prerequisite: Master in Nature, Master in Occultism, or Master in Religion
summary: Learn about your environment from resident spirits.

name: Disturbing Knowledge
summary: Frighten foes with occult secrets.

name: Doublespeak
summary: Pass a secret message to allies in your conversation.

name: Efficient Controls
prerequisite: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication; Master in Crafting
summary: By reducing redundant systems and streamlining essential functions, you have made it easier for the vehicle to operate with fewer crew.

name: Entourage
summary: You have a small group of admirers who tend to follow you around while you’re in civilized settlements.

name: Environmental Grace
prerequisite: Master in Survival; deity who grants the cold, fire, nature, or travel domain
summary: You rapidly adapt to environments through a combination of skill, meditation, and divine grace

name: Evangelize
prerequisite: Master in Diplomacy; you follow a deity or philosophy
summary: You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener’s mind to whirl

name: Expeditious Search
summary: Search areas in half the time

name: Expert Disassembler
summary: You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them.

name: Explosive Entry
prerequisite: Demolitionist Dedication; Master in Engineering Lore
summary: You know exactly how to make a memorable entrance.

name: Fabricated Connections
summary: You can lie about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

name: Foil Senses
summary: Take precautions against special senses

name: Free and Fair
summary: Use New Leadership and other activities more efficiently

name: Graceful Leaper
summary: Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter.

name: Grudging Compliment
summary: Every Firebrand can recognize the skill of others, but you've turned it into an art you can wield in combat.

name: Impeccable Crafting
summary: Craft items more efficiently

name: Influence Nature
summary: Influence the behavior of certain animals in the area.

name: Kip Up
summary: Stand up for free without triggering reactions

name: Master of Apprentice
summary: Teaching is a difficult art form, but you've gotten a pretty good handle on it.

name: Monster Crafting
summary: Craft items using monster parts

name: Morphic Manipulation
trait: Exploration, General, Necromancy, Positive, Primal, Skill, Uncommon
summary: You've attuned your natural aura to that of plant life, coaxing it to grow faster than normal.

name: Muscle Mimicry
prerequisite: Alter Ego Dedication; Trained in Athletics; Master in Deception
summary: Your study of another allows you to mirror their movements subtly, even in the heat of combat.

name: Numb to Death
prerequisite: Diehard; you have died at least once
summary: Your past has left you numb to death’s call

name: Paragon Battle Medicine
summary: Kassi Aziril taught you her techniques that originated the modern use of Battle Medicine.

name: Party Crasher
summary: You attend all the fashionable society parties, no matter how exclusive they might be.

name: Planar Survival
summary: Use Survival to Subsist on different planes

name: Prepare Papers
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 78</row>
summary: You're practiced at creating forgeries that establish your outlaw credentials or augment your legal authority.

name: Prescient Consumable
summary: Procure consumable items with Prescient Planner

name: Propeller Attachment
summary: You've mastered attaching clockwork propellers to your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears.

name: Push it
prerequisite: Trick Driver Dedication; Master in Driving Lore
summary: You can push your vehicle's performance beyond the limits envisioned by its makers.

name: Quality of Life
summary: Cost of living expenses are reduced

name: Quick Change
summary: You can shift between your identities with ease.

name: Quick Climb
summary: Climb swiftly

name: Quick Recognition
summary: Identify spells as a free action

name: Quick Setup
summary: You have learned to setup simple crafting jobs with ease.

name: Quick Swim
summary: Swim quickly

name: Quick Unlock
summary: Pick a Lock with 1 action

name: Rapid Affixture
summary: Afﬁx a Talisman in less time.

name: Read Shibboleths
summary: All communication is filled with slight tells and signals.

name: Sacred Defense
prerequisite: Master in Religion; you follow a deity
summary: You call upon your deity to grant you their protective blessing

name: Sanctify Water
summary: You imbue water with your deity’s blessing

name: Scholastic Identification
summary: You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

name: Shameless Request
summary: Make Requests of others with lesser consequences

name: Skeptic's Defense
summary: You don't believe in any mental twaddle, and you're certainly not afraid of it.

name: Slippery Secrets
summary: Evade attempts to uncover your true nature

name: Speech of the Mammoth Lords
prerequisite: Mammoth Lord Dedication; Master in Diplomacy; Master in Intimidation
summary: You've learned the ancient tongue spoken by the creatures of the far north.

name: Subjective Truth
summary: Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies.

name: Supertaster
summary: Gain secret checks to detect poison by taste.

name: Swift Sneak
summary: Move your full Speed while you Sneak

name: Terrified Retreat
summary: Cause foes you Demoralize to flee

name: That was a Close One, Huh?
prerequisite: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication; Master in Deception
summary: You laugh innocently about the inexplicable luck of your last shot hitting its mark or how close the attack that just missed you came to taking your head off, causing your foes to second guess whether it's a good idea to oppose you in battle.

name: Tumbling Theft
prerequisite: Expert in Acrobatics; Expert in Thievery
summary: You reach for an opponent's item as you move past a foe.

name: Voice Cold as Death
trait: Archetype, Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, Fear, Mental, Skill
summary: Channeling the energy of the Crimson Oath into your voice, you pronounce a threat in a tone so icy it freezes the blood.

name: Wall Jump
summary: Jump off walls

name: Water Sprint
summary: Stride across the surface of a body of water.

name: Able Ritualist
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant.

name: Accompany
summary: You use your performance to supplement an ally’s spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spell in their stead.

name: Accurate Swing
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
summary: You strike cleanly with wide, sweeping attacks to inflict maximum damage

name: Accursed Magic
summary: When the curse within you spills out, you can lay curses on others and claim them for yourself with ease.

name: Accursed Touch
summary: You've learned to harness the supernatural curse that animates you, imbuing your most powerful attacks with a terrible curse.

name: Achaekek's Grip
summary: You sense if a creature you have slain in the last year has been restored to life, as long as you and that creature are on the same plane.

name: Acquired Tolerance
summary: A small amount of poison, taken at nonlethal doses, can help the body build up a resistance against a more deadly dosage.

name: Advanced Deity's Domain
summary: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Advanced Domain
summary: Your prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Advanced Hallowed Spell
summary: You dig deeper into the magical tools found in wizard schools and divine domains.

name: Advanced School Spell
summary: You gain access to the advanced teachings of your arcane institution, learning a powerful new school spell.

name: Ambushing Knockdown
summary: You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground.

name: Animal Rage
trait: Barbarian, Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Rage, Transmutation
summary: You transform into your animal.

name: Anthemic Performance
summary: Your music, speech, or other performance inspires your allies to dive into battle.

name: Arcane Breadth
summary: Your thorough studies allow you to cast more arcane spells each day.

name: Archaeologist's Luck
summary: You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck.

name: Archer's Aim
summary: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot.

name: Armiger's Mobility
prerequisite: expert in heavy armor; Hellknight Armiger Dedication
summary: You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor.

name: Armored Rebuff
summary: You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe.

name: Arrow Snatching
summary: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source.

name: Attuned Stride
summary: You can move freely through terrain you're attuned to.

name: Back to Back
summary: You excel at watching your allies' backs and helping them watch yours.

name: Basic Beast Gunner Spellcasting
summary: You've unlocked the first secrets of beast guns, granting you the power of their synergistic magic.

name: Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
summary: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Modification
summary: You've learned to modify your innovation in order to enhance its capabilities beyond what an ordinary piece of equipment can accomplish.

name: Beacon Mark
summary: When you cast _sigil_, you can modify the spell to allow you to determine the target's location.

name: Black Powder Blaze
summary: You learn to take advantage of every shot, flying across the battlefield with the help of your weapon's recoil.

name: Bleeding Finisher
summary: Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding.

name: Blessed Spell
prerequisite: Blessed One Dedication; ability to cast spells from spell slots; Mercy
summary: When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions.

name: Blind-Fight
summary: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Bloodline Breadth
summary: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline’s tradition each day.

name: Bloodline Resistance
summary: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

name: Bond Conservation
summary: By efficiently and carefully manipulating the arcane energies unleashed by your bonded item, you can conserve just enough power to cast another spell, though this second spell is slightly weaker.

name: Bonds of Death
summary: You sway with the motions of your spells that animate the dead, channeling your power to sustain two at the same time.

name: Boost Summons
summary: Augmenting your eidolon extends to creatures you summon.

name: Brain Drain
summary: With a wresting of will, you siphon off a creature's mental energy to replenish your own.

name: Bravo's Determination
prerequisite: Expert in Deception; Firebrand Braggart Dedication
summary: Your confidence borders on self-delusion, but it keeps you going against overwhelming odds.

name: Breath of the Dragon
summary: You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate.

name: Bullet Split
summary: You carefully align your weapon with the edge of your blade, splitting the projectile in two as you fire to attack two different targets.

name: Bullseye
summary: You carefully take aim to avoid your foe’s concealment and cover.

name: Call Gun
summary: You build a powerful magical connection with a chosen gun or crossbow, gaining the ability to conjure it directly to your hand from any distant location.

name: Call Ursine Ally
summary: You can cast a 3rd-level _summon animal_ as an innate spell, but only to summon a black bear.

name: Call Your Shot
summary: When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add additional benefits to the list you can choose from.

name: Call and Response
summary: Your composition takes the form of a call-and-response chant that lets your allies continue the effect without you.

name: Call the Hurricane
summary: Massive waves spiral around you, with you as the eye of the hurricane.

name: Can't You See?
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism; Expert in Stealth
summary: The eye rebels, the mind recoils—no matter how much those who can see you try to explain what's there, their friends' gazes just skitter over you, like a bird afraid to land.

name: Capture Magic
summary: When you resist a spell, you capture some of its magic for your own use.

name: Chaotic Spell
trait: Bard, Manipulate, Metamagic, Oracle, Sorcerer, Uncommon, Witch, Wizard
summary: Your foe can hardly predict and counter your moves if you yourself have no idea what will happen.

name: Chronomancer's Secrets
summary: The secrets of time peel back, revealing deeper truths.

name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
summary: You learn a mystical stance that transforms your ki into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs, clinging to everything you touch.

name: Clue Them All In
summary: You can clue in all your allies at once.

name: Conductive Sphere
trait: Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Primal
summary: A floating metal ball forms in a space within 30 feet, flashing with electricity.

name: Constricting Hold
summary: Your eidolon constricts the creature, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to your eidolon's level plus its Strength modifier, with a basic Fortitude save against your spell DC.

name: Controlled Blast
prerequisite: Demolitionist Dedication; Calculated Splash, Directional Bombs, or Expanded Splash
summary: You maximize the effectiveness of your explosives by controlling every possible parameter of the blast meticulously.

name: Counter Curse
summary: You gather the energy of your maelstrom and fling its unleashed power into the enemy's curse, attempting to neutralize it.

name: Countercharm
summary: Your enchantments and illusions are so dominant that you can use them to counteract similar magic cast by others.

name: Courageous Opportunity
summary: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

name: Cremate Undead
summary: Your overwhelming vitality sets undead alight.

name: Crossblooded Evolution
summary: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

name: Crude Communication
summary: Even if you don't speak a creature's language, you can rely on inflection, root words, and body language to infer rudimentary meaning.

name: Cursed Effigy
summary: After your attack, you grab a bit of blood, cut hair, or other piece of the creature's body.

name: Cyclonic Ascent
summary: Whorls of wind surround your lower body, forming a cyclone that lifts you into the air.

name: Dark Persona's Presence
trait: Aura, Emotion, Enchantment, Fear, Mental, Psychic
summary:
When you Unleash your Psyche, all your rage and pain—the portion of your psyche dedicated to cruel retribution—come along with it.

 The force of your dark persona's negativity batters constantly against all creatures in a 30-foot emanation when you Unleash your Psyche and for as long as your Psyche is Unleashed.

name: Deadly Aim
summary: You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

name: Deadly Butterfly
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: You gain access to the butterfly sword's critical specialization effect.

name: Debilitating Dichotomy
summary: You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body.

name: Deeper Dabbler
summary: With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day.

name: Deimatic Display
summary: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

name: Delay Trap
summary: You try to jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects.

name: Disarming Assault
summary: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

name: Disorienting Opening
summary: You use your foes’ openings to expose even greater weaknesses.

name: Diverse Recognition
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
summary: Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats.

name: Divine Breadth
summary: As your understanding increases, your god grants you more divine spells each day.

name: Divine Healing
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; Expert in Religion; worship a deity with a divine font that grants _heal_
summary: Although you aren't a proper champion of your faith, your deity still recognizes your efforts and provides you with a small divine ability to help others.

name: Dream Magic
summary: You learn dream-related magic to aid your studies.

name: Drifting Pollen
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: A haze of pollen floats around you.

name: Drive Back
summary: You push the enemy back and attempt to intercede between the foe and your ally.

name: Dual Finisher
summary: You split your attacks.

name: Dualistic Synergy
summary: If your next action is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots, you gain a benefit.

name: Dueling Riposte
summary: You elegantly counterattack against your flailing enemy.

name: Duo's Aim
summary: With assistance from your spotter, you aim for an especially accurate attack.

name: Eclectic Skill
summary: Your broad experiences translate to a range of skills.

name: Eerie Environs
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Stealth
summary: The natural world can be scary to those not used to it—and you make it scarier still.

name: Eerie Traces
prerequisite: Trained in Intimidation; Trained in Survival
summary: The tracks you leave behind are strange, somehow disconcerting and unnerving—they might travel backward, or through places no one would think to pass through.

name: Efficient Rituals
summary: You can perform some rituals in less time.

name: Elaborate Talisman Esoterica
summary: As you continue to collect talismanic esoterica, you improve your ability to create temporary talismans.

name: Elemental Overlap
summary: Though you've dedicated yourself to one element, you learn to mix that element with another.

name: Elude the Divine
summary: You are able to escape inquisitions involving divine magic, allowing you to blend in well in Mzali but also to avoid unwanted attention in other oppressive theocracies.

name: Emblazon Energy
summary: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

name: Enchanting Arrow
summary: With a single whisper carried on the wind, you enchant your ammunition to make a foe more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Energy Resistance
summary: Your eidolon has stronger resistance.

name: Enhanced Psychopomp Familiar
summary: Your psychopomp's continued service in Pharasma's name brings it favor from the goddess.

name: Enlarge Companion
summary: You make your companion enormous.

name: Equitable Defense
summary: Gritting your teeth through the pain, you position yourself to counterattack.

name: Exude Abyssal Corruption
summary: Most of the changes from the demon within you have harmed you so far, but you've found a way to expel some of the corruption within you to poison others.

name: Familiar Form
summary: You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability.

name: Felling Strike
summary: Your attack can ground an airborne foe.

name: Feral Mutagen
summary: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

name: Ferocious Shape
summary: You’ve mastered the shape of dinosaurs.

name: Fey Caller
summary: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

name: Fey's Trickery
summary: You connect with the fey trickster within yourself to create whimsical illusory duplicates that distract your foes.

name: Fiery Retort
summary: Ignoring your pain, you sear your attacker with a wave of flame.

name: Flamboyant Cruelty
summary: You love to kick your enemies when they're down, and you look fabulous when you do.

name: Flashing Shield
summary: Your shield flares with holy light as you block the attack, searing the undead with the power of your faith.

name: Flensing Slice
summary: When you hit with both attacks with Double Slice, you flense the target, making it bleed and creating a weak spot.

name: Floral Restoration
summary: You request that nearby plants share their vitality with you to replenish your body and magic.

name: Follow-Up Assault
summary: Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed.

name: Foolproof Instructions
summary: You feel confident that you can explain your scrolls so well that even your allies can use them.

name: Forgotten Presence
summary: The world conspires to keep you forgotten and unnoticed— memories cloud, ink stains out your name in ledgers, and portraits of you crack and warp over your face.

name: Form Retention
summary: You have trained your mind and body to tolerate polymorph magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately.

name: Fortified Flesh
summary: Your flesh is resistent to physical damage.

name: Fortissimo Composition
summary: Your anthems grow louder and more potent, bolstered by your muse’s power.

name: Friendly Toss
summary: You toss your friends around the battlefield.

name: Frozen Breadth
summary: Your attunement to arcane cold enhances the depths of your growing power.

name: Furious Bully
summary: You bully foes across the battlefield.

name: Fused Staff
summary: When you prepare a staff, you can hold it up to a weapon to merge the two items.

name: Future Spell Learning
summary: More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn.

name: Garden Path
summary: You can guide your crop to move without notice.

name: Gardener's Resolve
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve.

name: Ghost Flight
summary: You can suppress your tether to the ground, overcoming your resistance to fly free.

name: Gigaton Strike
summary: When you use a full-power Megaton Strike, you can knock your foe back.

name: Glyph Expert
summary: You've learned to recognize the telltale writings and other signs that indicate the presence of magical traps.

name: Golden League Xun Dedication
summary: You are a xun for the Golden League, aiding the organization.

name: Golem Grafter Dedication
prerequisite: expert in Arcana and Crafting, or an ally with expert proficiency in those skills willing to augment you
summary: Your flesh has been specially treated with the same arcane and alchemical processes used to toughen the skin of flesh golems.

name: Grand Dance
summary: You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance.

name: Great Boaster
summary: Your bragging is particularly effective.

name: Greater Cruelty
summary: The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

name: Greater Mercy
summary: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

name: Greenwatch Veteran
summary: Your time spent tracking your target allows you to quickly identify its weaknesses and relay them to your allies.

name: Grievous Blow
summary: You know how to deliver focused, powerful blows that bypass your enemies' resistances.

name: Grit and Tenacity
summary: You call upon deep reserves of toughness and mental fortitude to power through an otherwise debilitating effect.

name: Guardian Ghosts
summary: You magically divert some of the harm from an incoming attack away from yourself, forcing your undead companion to take it in your stead.

name: Guardian's Embrace
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
summary: Your spirit guide discorporates to surround you in an invisible protective shroud.

name: Hamstringing Strike
summary: You slow your foes with a well-aimed attack.

name: Hazard Finder
summary: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards.

name: Heal Mount
prerequisite: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (_lay on hands_)
summary: Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy.

name: Heightened Captivation
summary: You can infuse your enchantments and illusions with more power.

name: Helt's Spelldance
summary: Ranik Helt knows a special technique to hide his spells as part of a performance, and you've learned this technique.

name: Hot Foot
summary: Using a carefully aimed shot, you make a creature “dance.”

name: Hulking Size
summary: Your eidolon grows substantially.

name: Ilverani Purist
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 79</row>
summary: All twilight speakers are trained to resist the alluring customs of younger peoples, but you have made it your mandate to keep the Ilverani way unchanged.

name: Impassable Wall Stance
summary: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

name: Impenetrable Fog
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: Fog condenses in a chaotic, swirling pattern, thick enough that it seems to push back against you.

name: Impervious Vehicle
summary: From armor plating and flexible components, to reinforced materials and backup redundant functionality, you have built safeguards to protect your vehicle from the rigors of combat.

name: Improved Command Corpse
summary: When you use Command Undead on a mindless undead, if the undead succeeds at its save but doesn't critically succeed, it becomes your minion for 1 round.

name: Improved Elemental Blast
summary: The power of your elemental blast improves.

name: Improved Poison Weapon
summary: You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects.

name: Improvised Crafting
summary: You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available.

name: Improvised Critical
summary: You can apply critical specialization effects to improvised weapons you wield.

name: Incredible Aim
summary: By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true.

name: Incredible Beastmaster Companion
summary: Your mature animal companions continue to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Construct Companion
summary: Thanks to your continual tinkering, your construct companion has advanced to an astounding new stage of engineering, enhancing all its attributes.

name: Incredible Familiar
summary: Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Incredible Megafauna Companion
summary: Under your care and training, your megafauna companion has realized its innate potential.

name: Incredible Mount
summary: Under your care and training, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Incredible Reanimated Companion
summary: You imbue the necrotized flesh of your reanimated construct companion with strange chemicals and fine-tune the clockwork within, enhancing all its capabilities.

name: Innate Magic Intuition
summary: You've spent countless hours learning to recognize and predict a creature's innate magical abilities.

name: Insistent Command
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
prerequisite: Master in Nature; Animal Trainer Dedication
summary: When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success.

name: Inspired Stratagem
summary: During your daily preparations, you can review stratagems for the day’s adventures with up to five allies.

name: Instinctive Strike
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
summary: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

name: Interrupt Charge
summary: You attempt to snag the foe before they run away.

name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
summary: You can invoke the Crimson Oath to unleash blasts of ruby energy from your weapon.

name: Ironblood Stance
summary: You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow.

name: Jellyfish Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 212, Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 75</row>
summary: You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity.

name: Jumping Jenny Display
summary: This multi-sequence rocket blasts confetti at a series of altitudes.

name: Kindle Inner Flames
summary: As a candle can light another, you awaken the latent potential to channel fire in other creatures.

name: Knight's Retaliation
summary: You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe.

name: Know-It-All
summary: When you Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context.

name: Knowledge is Power
summary: Your academic knowledge about a creature allows you to subtly alter your magic to defeat them.

name: Larcenous Hand
summary: When you cast _mage hand_, you can modify it to steal an object from the target.

name: Leap and Fire
summary: You're quick enough to line up a shot even while diving to the ground.

name: Lethargy Poisoner
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death pg. 77</row>
prerequisite: Drow Shootist Dedication; Trained in Crafting
summary: You've learned more than the use of hand crossbows from drow lore.

name: Levering Strike
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
summary: Strike your foe and make them unbalanced

name: Lingering Flames
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _fireball_
summary: When you cast _fireball_, you can modify its effects to set creatures in its area aflame.

name: Lion's Fury
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 79</row>
summary: You gain access to the lion scythe's and sun sling's critical specialization effects.

name: Live Ammunition
summary: There are generally few things as ill-advised as being shot out of a cannon or launched by a trebuchet, but people use the tactic every so often in a desperate situation.

name: Living for the Applause
summary: Nothing can stop you as long as you have an audience cheering you on.

name: Loaner Spell
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

name: Lobbed Attack
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: Make an unexpected ranged attack with a Juggled item.

name: Lore Seeker
summary: You see what others don’t, and you’ve developed magical tricks to find hidden truth.

name: Lorefinder
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: You know that fate sometimes conspires to keep dangerous knowledge or items from the eyes of those most able to understand them.

name: Magic Arrow
summary: You imbue your ammunition with eldritch power.

name: Magic Finder
summary: You've learned a few tricks to ensure you find every last magic item and interesting magical effect during your missions.

name: Magical Adept
summary: Your eidolon gains more magic.

name: Magical Knowledge
summary: Increase your proficiency rank in one of Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion from expert to master and in another from trained to expert.

name: Makeshift Strike
summary: You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

name: Malleable Mental Forge
summary: You open your mind to further weapon customization.

name: Manifold Modifications
summary: You've modified your innovation using clever workarounds, so you can include another initial modification without compromising its structure.

name: Mantis Form
summary: You can transform yourself into a mantis battle form.

name: Many Guises
summary: You can take on any number of mundane guises.

name: Martyr
summary: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

name: Masked Casting
summary: You harness the magical energy flowing through your eyeless mask to effortlessly protect you from visual effects.

name: Mental Static
summary: Your thoughts sting back when a lesser mind tries to invade your own.

name: Metabolize Element
summary: Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy.

name: Metabolize Element
summary: Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy.

name: Mind Projectiles
summary: You have learned to stretch your mind's influence further, releasing projectiles with a swing of your mind weapon.

name: Miniaturize
summary: Your eidolon can shrink even further.

name: Minor Omen
summary: The stars warn you of danger in the nick of time.

name: Mixed Maneuver
summary: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole.

name: Mobile Shot Stance
summary: Your shots become nimble and deadly.

name: Monk Moves
summary: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you’re not wearing armor.

name: Murksight
summary: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow.

name: Mutable Familiar
summary: Your familiar's supernatural spirit has outgrown its corporeal body.

name: Mysterious Breadth
summary: Increase the spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

name: Necromantic Bulwark
summary: Regular exposure to necromantic effects left you better able to defend against them.

name: Necromantic Tenacity
summary: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.

name: Nimble Roll
summary: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

name: Occult Breadth
summary: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more occult spells each day.

name: Ooze Empathy
prerequisite: Oozemorph Dedication; at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype
summary: You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level.

name: Opportune Backstab
summary: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

name: Opportunistic Grapple
summary: You attempt an Athletics check to Grapple your prey.

name: Order Training
summary: You gain the lesser order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

name: Ore Fists
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: When you enter the Stonestrike Stance, your fists appear to be covered with veins of unrefined ore.

name: Out of Hand
summary: Even when your limbs are severed, they remain a part of you.

name: Overdrive Ally
summary: You quickly fling some of your powered-up mechanisms to an ally, sharing your benefits with them briefly.

name: Pact of Infernal Prowess
summary: You've sworn a pact with devils, granting you success in life in exchange for your soul in the afterlife.

name: Paralyzing Slash
summary: Your enzymes can paralyze your foes rather than merely making it harder for them to heal their wounds.

name: Patron's Breadth
summary: You can cast more spells each day.

name: Peer Beyond
summary: You have uncanny insight into the way ghosts and haunts manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate.

name: Perfect Resistance
summary: You gain resistance equal to half your level to all damage from effects with the appropriate trait for your School of Perfection: fire for Unblinking Flame, water for Unbreaking Waves, air for Unfolding Wind, and earth for Untwisting Iron.

name: Perpetual Breadth
summary: You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items.

name: Persistent Creation
summary: You can cast _creation_ as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time.

name: Phalanx Formation
summary: You know how to clear a line of fire for your allies.

name: Physical Training
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; Expert in Acrobatics; Expert in Athletics
summary: You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness.

name: Pinning Fire
summary: You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

name: Pinpoint Poisoner
summary: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons.

name: Positioning Assault
summary: With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position.

name: Positive Luminance
summary: You learn how to create a luminous reservoir of positive energy that you can use to punish undead who dare attack you.

name: Powerful Snares
summary: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

name: Practiced Guidance
summary: You can better Aid your crop.

name: Precious Arrow
summary: You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses.

name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
summary: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

name: Preventative Treatment
summary: You provide preventative remedies and care to help your patient fight off future maladies.

name: Primal Breadth
summary: Increase the spell slots you gain from druid archetype feats by 1 for each spell rank other than your two highest druid spell slots.

name: Protect Ally
summary: You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks.

name: Public Execution
summary: Some rebel Firebrand cells make a practice of publicly declaring the main target of a given operation.

name: Purify Element
summary: You turn an element into its purest form.

name: Quick Positioning
summary: You're always ready to get the jump on your target.

name: Quick Shield Block
summary: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

name: Quick Stow (Swordmaster)
summary: You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat.

name: Raise Menhir
summary: You raise a druidic monument, such as a standing stone or warding tree, from the ground, creating a powerful primal ward that blocks other types of magic.

name: Read Disaster
summary: You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

name: Reading the Signs
summary: You have a knack for drawing the right card, be it from a harrow deck, in a game of cards, or even when drawing from a _Deck of Many Things_.

name: Recognize Threat
prerequisite: master in a Recall Knowledge skill; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
summary: You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team.

name: Recycled Cogwheel
summary: You're able to scavenge the cogwheels from your daily quick-deploy snares that use gears.

name: Reflexive Courage
