summary: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

name: Reflexive Grip
summary: You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out.

name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
summary: You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear.

name: Remove Presence
summary: Your spell reaches into the mind of a creature and removes you from it.

name: Renewed Vigor
summary: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

name: Resounding Bravery
summary: Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

name: Restorative Channel
summary: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

name: Retaliatory Cleansing
summary: You twist your hand in front of the blow, ensuring the enemy's attack shatters the required _holy water_ or bomb.

name: Retch Rust
summary: You exhale tendrils formed from flakes of rusted metal.

name: Reversing Charge
summary: You dive into the fray before rewinding yourself to safety.

name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
summary: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Rippling Spin
summary: After the triggering attack is done, Step.

name: Rule of Three
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 78</row>
summary: Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt.

name: Runic Impression
summary: You can temporarily replicate the effects of a property rune for your weapon or unarmed attacks.

name: Running Tackle
summary: You charge toward your opponent, throwing your body at them in a vicious tackle.

name: Rupture Stomp
summary: Every dwarf knows that the rock they walk upon can be either a best friend or a treacherous path.

name: Sacrifice Armor
summary: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

name: Safeguard Soul
summary: You've girded your soul against outside interference.

name: Safeguarded Spell
summary: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body.

name: Sanctify Armament
summary: You touch a weapon and bring it into concordance with your deity.

name: Sanguivolent Roots
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: Blood-drinking vines grow from the ground in a 15-foot burst within 120 feet.

name: Scarecrow
summary: You fight fiercely to protect your crop.

name: Scattered Fire
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _fireball_
summary: When you cast _fireball_, you can modify its area to be two non-overlapping 10-foot bursts.

name: Scholar's Hunch
summary: Scholarly debates have taught you to think on your feet.

name: Second Ally
summary: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

name: Selfless Parry
summary: You protect those near you with a flash of steel.

name: Sense Chaos
summary: You sense chaos as an unsettling feeling of nervous energy.

name: Sense Evil
summary: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

name: Sense Good
summary: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

name: Shadow Spell
summary: You attach a piece of your shadow to a spell to cloud the senses and cause mischief.

name: Shadowdancer Dedication
prerequisite: Master in Stealth; Expert in Performance
summary: You dedicate yourself to the shadows.

name: Shamble
summary: You may be slower than you were in life, but your pace is unfaltering.

name: Share Rage
summary: You stoke an ally’s fury.

name: Shoving Sweep
summary: You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back.

name: Show-Off
summary: As is the tradition with many Firebrands, you call your shot and look to impress with an extra bit of panache or a greater stunt.

name: Sickening Bite
summary: Your saliva causes severe nausea and mild fever in the living, weakening them so that you can more easily finish them off.

name: Sidestep
summary: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue.

name: Sin Reservoir
summary: During daily preparations, you can indulge in your associated sin.

name: Siphoning Touch
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _vampiric touch_
summary: When you cast _vampiric touch_, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet.

name: Skill Mastery (Investigator)
prerequisite: Investigator Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
summary: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert.

name: Skill Mastery (Rogue)
prerequisite: Rogue Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
summary: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert.

name: Skim Scroll
summary: You can activate the magic of a scroll with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt.

name: Skyseeker
summary: You Leap toward an opponent.

name: Slayer's Blessing
summary: You carry scraps of materials dangerous to undead and can apply them to your weapon.

name: Sly Striker
summary: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t off-guard.

name: Smoke Curtain
summary: You load an extra dose of powder into your shot, causing it to belch a cloud of smoke.

name: Smoldering Explosion
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _fireball_
summary: When you cast _fireball_, you can modify the spell to leave behind a brief cloud of smoke in its area.

name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)
prerequisite: Master in Medicine; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
summary: Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses.

name: Soaring Shape
summary: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

name: Solar Detonation
trait: Fire, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Vitality
summary: Blinding flames explode in a swirling sphere! The detonation fills a 20-foot burst within 60 feet of you.

name: Soulsight
summary: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

name: Spell Swipe
summary: You attack in an arc and enact your spell against everyone you hit.

name: Spike Skin
summary: You touch a willing creature, causing its skin to harden and form spiky protrusions.

name: Spirit Familiar
summary: Your familiar can subsume its body to become pure spirit.

name: Spirit's Anguish
summary: You purify a spirit by coaxing it to release its anguish in a final cathartic howl.

name: Stab and Blast
summary: You slice or smash your opponent with the melee portion of your weapon before pulling the trigger at point-blank range.

name: Stalwart Mind
summary: When necessary to avoid a magical compulsion or curse, you can be as stubborn as your megafauna companion.

name: Standby Spell
summary: You've honed one spell as your favored combat technique, and you've practiced it enough that you no longer need to prepare it to cast it.

name: Stasian Smash
summary: You've modified your dynamo with Stasian coils, allowing you to make a powerful attack that crackles with electricity.

name: Statement Strut
summary: You have an eye for fashion and know how to sell attitude and confidence with your walk.

name: Statue
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: Your body and equipment appear to be made of stone as you hold perfectly still.

name: Steal Vitality
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _vampiric touch_
summary: When you cast _vampiric touch_, you can modify it to remove your enfeebled or clumsy condition.

name: Sticky Bomb
summary: You mix in an additive to make your bomb’s contents adhere to the target and continue to deal damage.

name: Stitched Familiar
summary: Your familiar can shed its material form, becoming a mass of animated magic.

name: Storm Shroud
summary: You become surrounded by a swirling storm of rain, sand, snow, or clouds, whichever of those suits your bound terrain.

name: Storm Spiral
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Sonic
summary: Dark thunderclouds swirl in a miniature storm, crisscrossed with lightning bolts; a tremendous thunderclap fills the air.

name: Strangle
summary: You twist and squeeze the breath out of your foe.

name: Stunning Finisher
summary: You attempt a dizzying blow.

name: Submission Hold
summary: Your iron grip slowly saps your opponent's strength.

name: Subtle Shank
summary: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

name: Sudden Leap
summary: You make an impressive leap and swing while you soar.

name: Superimpose Time Duplicates
summary: You call alternate versions of yourself, either from a different timeline or perhaps yourself from a different point in your current timeline, to aid you in combat.

name: Supreme Psychic Center
summary: With the merest thought, you realign your mental defenses to your duel's circumstances.

name: Surging Focus
summary: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your surge of righteous indignation allows you to draw upon untapped reserves of divine power.

name: Surreptitious Spellcaster
summary: You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed.

name: Survivor of Desolation
summary: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against unnatural weather events or environmental hazards occurring in blighted or otherwise unnaturally marred regions.

name: Swap Reflections
trait: Archetype, Conjuration, Extradimensional, Incapacitation, Occult, Teleportation
summary: You've learned how to use even your reflection to your advantage.

name: Swashbuckler's Speed
summary: You move faster, with or without panache.

name: Swim Through Earth
summary: The earth parts before you, letting you swim through it.

name: Swipe Souvenir
summary: When you wriggle free from an enemy’s grasp, you take something of theirs with you.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74</row>
summary: Your hair attacks gain the reach trait and you can deliver hexes through it.

name: Tactical Entry
summary: You Stride.

name: Tangled Forest Stance
summary: You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes’ movements.

name: Terrain Master
summary: You are able to adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

name: The Harder They Fall (Ranger)
summary: You know how to make a larger creature hurt when it falls to the ground.

name: Thoughtsense
summary: You can detect the flickers of mental activity let off by all thinking creatures.

name: Thrash
summary: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

name: To Battle!
summary: With a resounding cry, you rally your ally to the offensive.

name: Topple Giants
summary: When you observe an ally try and fail to execute a strategic maneuver against your enemies, you coordinate with your other allies to finish the job.

name: Transcribe Moment
summary: You gain the _transcribe moment_ focus spell.

name: Tumbling Strike
summary: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the Reflex DC of an enemy adjacent to you.

name: Ubiquitous Gadgets
summary: They thought you had used up all your devices, but they thought wrong! You have a few more gadgets up your sleeve than others expect.

name: Unbelievable Luck
summary: While no one, not even you, might appear to understand why, you demonstrate a greater ability to hit your targets regardless of the obstacles in your way.

name: Unfazed Assessment
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 81</row>
summary: You have witnessed hundreds of fighting styles and quickly adapt to defend against complicated maneuvers.

name: Universal Versatility
prerequisite: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
summary: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

name: Unkillable
summary: You're relentless and nigh unkillable, shrugging off blows that should destroy you, though they might make your body start to fall apart.

name: Unravel Mysteries
prerequisite: master in a Decipher Writing skill; Scrollmaster Dedication
summary: You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren’t discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things.

name: Unseen Passage
summary: You have mastered a magical technique for moving through dangerous woodlands unseen.

name: Unshakable Idealism
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; expert in Will saves
summary: Your faith and hope can’t be shaken, and you won’t flee when lives are at stake.

name: Unshaken in Iron
summary: You know the precise limits of your armor, and trust it to save you from harm.

name: Vantage Shot
summary: You and your spotter take advantage of each other's attacks to momentarily hide and throw your foes off-balance against your follow-up attack.

name: Vicious Fangs
summary: You aim for your victim's prominent arteries.

name: Viking Vindicator
summary: You are one of the raiders eagerly planning to launch an assault by sea on the Whispering Tyrant's Isle of Terror.

name: Vivacious Bravado
summary: Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain.

name: Void Siphon
summary: The raw energy of the Void saps the essence of the living.

name: Waking Dream
summary: While in your trance, you can blur the line between dreams and reality for others.

name: Walk the Plank
summary: You frighten a foe into moving where you want them, traditionally demanding they walk the plank.

name: Wall Run
summary: You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground.

name: Warden's Boon
summary: You point out vulnerabilities present in your hunted prey, granting the benefits listed in Hunt Prey and your hunter’s edge to an ally until the end of their next turn.

name: Warped Constriction
summary: The entity inhabiting your body is an aberrant being with unfathomable motivations, and when you hold a foe close, tendrils and tentacles unfurl from your body to crush your foe and pollute it with alien wrongness.

name: Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator
prerequisite: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
summary: You are adept at using the unusual resonance of your _wayfinder_ to aid in any deceptions you might employ.

name: What Could Have Been
summary: Rather than conjuring creatures from elsewhere in the world or the planes, you can temporarily pull a much different version of yourself from an alternate timeline—for instance, instead of summoning a generic or random troll with summon giant, you summon a troll version of yourself from a timeline where you're a troll.

name: Whispering Steps
summary: Your spell leaves a lingering connection between you and a creature—one through which you can nudge the creature's mind this way or that.

name: Whodunnit?
summary: You carefully consider your case and narrow down some of the details.

name: Wild Winds Initiate
summary: You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance.

name: Wind Caller
summary: You bid the winds to aid you, carrying you through the air and allowing you passage through the strongest headwinds.

name: Witch's Bottle
summary: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Witch’s Bottle
summary: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Work Yourself Up
summary: You concentrate on your mental state, tapping into that raw emotional energy.

name: World-Wise Vigilance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 79</row>
summary: Your keen study of other cultures gives you insights into the ways those cultures fight.

name: Worm Empathy
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You can connect with cave worms (and other worm-related creatures, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level.

name: Zealous Rush
summary: You bless yourself on the move.

name: Aboleth Transmutation
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters to mold the flesh of your ancestors.

name: Absorb Toxin
prerequisite: You are not immune to diseases or poisons
summary: Your skin readily absorbs poison and can consciously draw toxins into your body to spare others.

name: Accursed Claws
summary: Your claws carry your mother’s hag magic.

name: Agathion Magic
summary: The harmonious magic of Nirvana flows through you.

name: Aggravating Scratch
summary: Your claws carry an irritant that is harmless to you but can be damaging to others.

name: Alluring Performance
summary: You command the attention of those around you with an elegant display.

name: Analyze Information
summary: You can stoke your mind into a burst of analytical prowess.

name: Anarchic Arcana
summary: The magic in your blood is unpredictable.

name: Ancillary Motes
summary: You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.

name: Angelic Magic
summary: You can tap into the magic of angels that runs through your blood.

name: Animal Magic
summary: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world.

name: Arcane Camouflage
summary: You have developed magical techniques to aid you with stalking your prey.

name: Arcane Propulsion
summary: You redirect energy from your core to ports on your back or feet, allowing you to fly for a short time.

name: Arcane Slam
summary: You channel magical power from your core into your arm, empowering your attack as you attempt to slam your foe into the ground.

name: Archon Magic
summary: You can tap into the heavenly magic that is your birthright.

name: Asura Magic
summary: You can cast _blood vendetta_ and _death knell_ once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

name: Azarketi Purification
summary: You can cast _purify food and drink_ as a primal innate spell, but only on liquids.

name: Azata Magic
summary: Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection.

name: Bark and Tendril
summary: You wield primal magic.

name: Battleforger
summary: You can sharpen weapons, polish armor, and apply special techniques to temporarily gain better effects from your armaments.

name: Between the Scales
summary: Underestimating you is a grave mistake, but it's one others keep making.

name: Big Mouth
summary: Your cheek pouches are especially stretchy.

name: Bloodletting Fangs
summary: You emulate your vampiric parent's techniques for drawing blood from a victim.

name: Bone Caller
summary: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts.

name: Bone Missile
summary: You can remove your ribs to use them as arrows or bolts.

name: Breath Like Honey
summary: You smell of honey and savory things.

name: Briar Battler
summary: You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage.

name: Brightness Seeker
summary: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast _augury_ as an innate divine spell.

name: Call of Elysium
summary: The wild wonder of Elysium harmonizes within you, and in dire straits, you can share its benefits with your allies.

name: Cantorian Rejuvenation
summary: The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you.

name: Captivating Curiosity
summary: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance.

name: Catrina's Presence
summary: You've adopted the calming presence of catrinas, the festive dead..

name: Cautious Curiosity
prerequisite: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
summary: You've learned a few magical techniques for getting yourself both into and out of trouble unnoticed.

name: Cave Climber
summary: After years of clambering through caverns, you can climb easily anywhere you go.

name: Celestial Magic
prerequisite: Angelkin, Lawbringer, Musetouched, or another lineage feat associated with celestials
summary: You possess celestial magic.

name: Celestial Wings
summary: With effort, you can call forth magical wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your celestial forebears.

name: Ceremony of Aeon's Guidance
summary: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends.

name: Ceremony of Aeon's Shield
summary: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection.

name: Ceremony of Fortification
summary: Your exoskeleton arranges itself into an optimal defensive shape.

name: Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand
summary: Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent.

name: Charred Remains
summary: Your next fire spell leaves embers in its wake.

name: Cling
summary: You hang onto a foe to harry them into submission.

name: Close Quarters
summary: You've trained to fight with allies in tunnel warrens, dense undergrowth, or similarly cramped terrain.

name: Coating of Slime
summary: An acidic ooze coats your limbs.

name: Constant Gaze
summary: Your eyes keep a continual watch for dangers from all sides.

name: Cooperative Soul
summary: You have developed a soul-deep bond with your comrades and maintain an even greater degree of cooperation with them.

name: Core Attunement
summary: Your core allows you to draw more power from it.

name: Crystalline Cloud
summary: When you use Crystalline Dust, you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a 10-foot-radius cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait.

name: Cunning Climber
summary: Whether you are climbing a ship’s rigging, a jungle tree, or a clock tower, you have an uncanny knack for finding footholds and handholds where larger creatures can’t.

name: Daemon Magic
summary: The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power.

name: Dance Underfoot
summary: You dart under the legs of your enemies in combat.

name: Dangle
summary: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing.

name: Dangle (Vanara)
summary: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing.

name: Death's Drums
summary: Your life has been spent challenging death itself, and proximity to that implacable foe only makes your heart beat harder.

name: Defensive Instincts
summary: Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack.

name: Demolitionist
summary: You know how to destroy objects with a well-placed explosion.

name: Demon Magic
summary: You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects.

name: Devil Magic
summary: Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception.

name: Dig Up Secrets
summary: You are an endless well of knowledge and can remember several vital pieces of information at once.

name: Disorienting Venom
summary: The venom injected by your fangs disorients your foes.

name: Divine Countermeasures
summary: You’ve studied your extraplanar heritage with the intent of better defending yourself, whether against creatures aligned with or opposed to your extraplanar lineage, and you’ve found that your techniques are equally powerful against celestials, fiends, and other divine entities.

name: Divine Wings
summary: With effort, you can call forth magical wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your extraplanar forebear, whether they be elegantly feathered wings or ominous bat wings.

name: Djinni Magic
summary: The magic of djinn runs through your blood.

name: Dracomancer
summary: Your inborn arcane power manifests as your exemplar's most time-honored spells.

name: Dragon Grip
summary: Your hold has a unique draconic connection.

name: Dragon Prince
summary: The blood of the Dragon Kings runs strong in your veins.

name: Dragon's Breath
summary: You can put more effort into your Kobold Breath to channel greater draconic power, though it takes more out of you.

name: Dragonblood Paragon
prerequisite: Strongjaw Kobold heritage, Venomtail Kobold heritage, Dracomancer, or Kobold Breath
summary: Your draconic anatomy becomes especially pronounced.

name: Drain Emotion
summary: You touch an adjacent creature and attempt to draw out its excess emotion.

name: Duskwalker Magic
summary: Your connection to psychopomps gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath.

name: Earthsense
summary: Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble.

name: Echoes in Stone
summary: You pause a moment to attune your senses to the stone around you.

name: Eclectic Sword Training
summary: You were always taught that you needed to be able to use whatever weapon came your way.

name: Eerie Compression
summary: Your limbs and even your torso can collapse in on themselves, allowing you to fit through tight spaces as though you were a Small creature.

name: Efreeti Magic
summary: The magic of your efreeti ancestors flows through you.

name: Elf Step
summary: You move in a graceful dance, and even your steps are broad.

name: Embodied Dragoon Subjectivity
summary: When your allies call for swift reinforcements or lightning raids, you're ready to answer.

name: Endless Memories
summary: You've lived a thousand lives and done a hundred-thousand things.

name: Energize Wings
summary: You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms.

name: Energy Blessed
summary: Energy runs through your blood more powerfully.

name: Envenom Strike
prerequisite: you possess a Strike from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat that deals poison damage
summary: You spit venom onto a weapon you're holding or a weapon held by a willing creature within 30 feet; you can also use this ability to envenom your nagaji fangs unarmed attack.

name: Evade Doom
summary: You can elude supernatural disaster.

name: Expert Longevity
summary: You've continued to refine the knowledge and skills you've gained through your life.

name: Fade Away
summary: Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects.

name: Fell Rider
summary: You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying, unified juggernaut on the battlefield.

name: Ferocious Gust
summary: With heavy wing beats, you whip up a furious gust and direct it at your opponents.

name: Fey Ascension
summary: The fey influence on your form and features grows even more powerful and notable.

name: Fey Magic
summary: You can use faerie magic to hide yourself and expose hidden foes.

name: Fiendish Magic
summary: You possess fiendish magic.

name: Fiendish Wings
summary: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors.

name: First World Adept
prerequisite: at least one primal innate spell
summary: Over time your fey magic has grown stronger.

name: Flower Magic
summary: Certain magics in the world flow easily through your sap.

name: Flowering Path
summary: Vitality and elemental wood flows out from your body and into the earth, infusing it with a stream of new life.

name: Fortified Mind
summary: Your mind is unusually resilient and resistant to influence.

name: Fortuitous Shift
summary: You have grown more comfortable with your penchant for supernatural disappearance.

name: Fox Trick
summary: You always have time for a joke or prank.

name: Freeze It!
summary: You are no rime hag or Jadwiga, but the magic of the north has still left a mark on you.

name: Garuda Magic
summary: You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess.

name: Glory and Valor!
summary: You are descended from the einherji, the worthy warriors of chaos.

name: Grandmother's Wisdom
summary: You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel.

name: Gripping Limbs
summary: Nodules, hooks, or claws on your limbs allow you to cling to surfaces with ease.

name: Group Aid
summary: Your upbringing emphasized teamwork, and helping your allies comes naturally to you.

name: Guarded Thoughts
summary: Your mind, like a dark naga's, foils attempts to read your thoughts.

name: Guiding Luck
summary: Your luck guides you to look the right way and aim your blows unerringly.

name: Hardy Traveler
summary: There’s no journey too far or burden too heavy when you have friends at your side or hope within your heart.

name: Hefting Shadow
summary: Your shadow can contain objects.

name: Heir of the Saoc
summary: In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren.

name: Helpful Halfling
summary: When you aid a friend with a task, you find many ways to help and avoid interfering.

name: Heroes' Call
summary: The songs of ancient heroes echo through your mind and quicken your pulse, especially in dire straits.

name: Hungry Goblin
summary: You’ll eat anything and anyone.

name: Improvisational Warrior
summary: You have increased skill with improvised weapons.

name: Incredible Improvisation
summary: A stroke of brilliance gives you a major advantage with a skill despite your inexperience.

name: Inner Breath
summary: Your body is capable of recycling its own air.

name: Internal Respirator
summary: Your body can internally synthesize oxygen for limited periods of time.

name: Invoke the Elements
prerequisite: Brine May, Snow May, Veil May, or Virga May
summary: You summon an aura of shimmering heat, flurrying snow, crashing waves, or swirling wind and lightning.

name: Irrepressible
summary: You are easily able to ward off attempts to play on your fears and emotions.

name: Jalmeri Rakshasa Magic
summary: You can cast _dispel magic_ and _reaper's lantern_ once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

name: Janni Hospitality
summary: You can use magic to show others desert hospitality.

name: Janni Magic
summary: The magic of jann runs through your blood.

name: Juvenile Flight
summary: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.

name: Kizidhar Magic
summary: You can wield the arcane magic of a kizidhar

name: Kneel for No God
summary: Your ancestors’ defiance of magic and your people’s strictly egalitarian mindset mean that certain forms of magic have little effect on you.

name: Larcenous Tail
summary: Your tail's chaotic and independent nature causes it to perform mischief even when you don't intend it, and it can somehow steal things it shouldn't be able to handle.

name: Laughing Gnoll
summary: A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat.

name: Legendary Size
summary: The vanaras of old were tricksters able to step across wide rivers or slip into impossibly small spaces.

name: Lesser Augmentation
summary: You've focused on enhancing yourself and have received an improvement to one of your existing abilities.

name: Life Leap
summary: You phase through a space that a living creature occupies in a flash, spontaneously appearing on the opposite side of it in a vibrant display of colorful light.

name: Light from Darkness
summary: You've battled the fiendish power within your nature and come out on top; whatever you decide to do with your life, for good or evil, will be your choice and your choice alone.

name: Lucky Keepsake
summary: You have a keepsake that grants you luck.

name: Marid Magic
summary: You channel the magic of marids.

name: Mask of Pain
summary: Your mask has grown into a manifestation of your pain, which you can release.

name: Miraculous Repair
trait: Arcane, Ardande, Concentrate, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Transmutation, Undine
summary: Geniekin can't grant magical wishes, but some echo of power lingers within you.

name: Mirror Refuge
summary: Your origin in the space behind mirrors enables you to use a mirror as a hideaway, like the spell _meld into stone_.

name: Moderate Enhance Venom
summary: You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with Envenom to moderate vishkanyan venom.

name: Morrigna's Spider Affinity
summary: Much like morrignas, you feel an affinity for spiders.

name: Mother's Mindfulness
summary: You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place.

name: Mountain's Stoutness
summary: Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most.

name: Multitalented
summary: You’ve learned to split your focus between multiple classes with ease.

name: Natural Magnetism
summary: Your connection with elemental iron grants you a natural field of weak magnetic attraction.

name: Night Magic
summary: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood.

name: No Evidence
summary: You leave little sign when attempting to remain unseen.

name: Occult Resistance
summary: Your study of occult practices has shown you how to best defend against them.

name: Offensive Subroutine
summary: Nanites augment your attacks.

name: Otherworldly Acumen
prerequisite: at least one innate spell gained from an elf ancestry feat
summary: The arcane magic you possess grows in power and complexity.

name: Overcrowd
summary: Your physiology is slight, and you can pack into small spaces with others of similar stature.

name: Pack Tactics
summary: You have mastered how to hunt with your pack.

name: Perfume Cloud
summary: You issue a cloud of your fragrance like a full-body sneeze—but one that might save your life as the powerful perfume makes your attackers' eyes sting and water.

name: Peri Magic
summary: The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips.

name: Pervasive Superstition
summary: You steep yourself in superstition and practice ancient orc mental exercises for shrugging off the effects of magic.

name: Piercing Quills
summary: Your quills can dig particularly deep into the flesh of your opponents.

name: Pinch Time
summary: One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between.

name: Predator's Growl
summary: You give a throaty growl to attempt to Demoralize a creature you just found.

name: Preemptive Reconfiguration
summary: Your body anticipates the blow.

name: Pride in Arms
summary: With a shout of triumph, you grant inspiration to an ally fight on.

name: Qlippoth Magic
summary: You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes.

name: Quill Spray
prerequisite: Quillcoat Shisk heritage or quill unarmed attack
summary: You can launch a mass of quills at opponents.

name: Ragdya's Dance
summary: Even when faced with deadly danger, you fight with the rapturous laughter of Ragdya in your heart and can play impossible tricks.

name: Rain of Bolts
summary: Throughout the day, your body produces powerful projectiles within your chassis.

name: Rakshasa Magic
summary: You remember the secrets of your rakshasa forebears and know how to apply those memories to get results.

name: Rakshasa Ravaged
summary: You and your family know well the ravages of rakshasa predations, and you know how to best defend yourself against their growing corruption in the world.

name: Rat Form
summary: You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces.

name: Read the Stars
prerequisite: Trained in Astrology Lore or Trained in Occultism
summary: You're incredibly skilled in iruxi astrology, and you can gain useful (if cryptic) hints from the stars' alignment.

name: Rejuvenation Token
summary: You tie yourself to the Material Plane by implanting a piece of your consciousness into a weapon, piece of armor, or other item that's precious to you.

name: Repair Module
summary: You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds.

name: Replenishing Hydration
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: You draw life from the water around you.

name: Returning Throw
summary: You have mastered the technique of arcing a projectile so that it returns to your hand after being thrown, though this requires a moment to precisely calculate the trajectory and possible ricochets.

name: Ricocheting Leap
summary: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes.

name: Riptide
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: Drag a grabbed creature into nearby water

name: Rivethun Spiritual Attunement
summary: Your time spent among the Rivethun has heightened your awareness of animate spirits around you, giving you the ability to sense them briefly.

name: Rokoan Arts
summary: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa.

name: Roll with It (Goblin)
summary: When you take a big hit, your foe bounces you around like a rubber ball, but you escape the worst of the blow.

name: Scalding Spit
summary: Your bodily fluids burn with surprising volatility, as if you ran on oil instead of blood.

name: Scaling Poppet
summary: Your construction integrates ropes, hooks, or other tools to help you move across steep surfaces.

name: Scorching Disarm
summary: You make a weapon unbearable to hold.

name: Sculpt Shadows
summary: You coax nearby shadows into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, using a tiny piece of your shadow to make it solid; in doing so, you lose 1 Hit Point.

name: Sense Thoughts
summary: You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking.

name: Sense for Trouble
summary: You can tell when something's off.

name: Serpentcoil Slam
summary: Your people's ancient and storied rivalry with garudas led you to develop special techniques against flying foes.

name: Serpentine Swimmer
summary: You undulate your body in a series of sinuous serpentine motions as you swim, drastically improving the speed at which you move through the water.

name: Shadow Sight
summary: You draw on your connection with the Shadow Plane to see through all but the deepest darkness.

name: Shaitan Magic
summary: The magic of shaitans runs through your blood.

name: Shared Luck (Catfolk)
summary: Other creatures can benefit from your luck

name: Shory Aeromancer
prerequisite: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity
summary: Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you.

name: Silent Step
summary: You vanish with silent treads.

name: Skeletal Resistance
summary: Your body becomes resistant, your hardened bones deflecting weapons and other forms of damage.

name: Skittering Scuttle
summary: You can scuttle farther and faster when maneuvering alongside allies.

name: Slip into Shadow
prerequisite: ability to cast at least one spell with the darkness trait
summary: Your shadow magic bleeds into the space around you.

name: Slip the Grasp
summary: You have some feature that allows you to quickly evade effects that restrain you.

name: Smoke Sight
summary: You're used to fighting and hiding in a haze of smoke and flame.

name: Snare Commando
prerequisite: Snare Crafting; Expert in Deception or Expert in Intimidation
summary: Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight.

name: Soaring Flight
summary: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below.

name: Sodbuster
summary: Years toiling in soil have made you an expert digger.

name: Solar Rejuvenation
summary: If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level.

name: Solar Rejuvenation (Ghoran)
summary: The warmth and light of the sun gives you life.

name: Spirit Strikes
summary: Your connection to the Boneyard empowers you to bring death to all forms of life and unlife, exploiting their weaknesses.

name: Spore Cloud
summary: You unleash a cloud of pollen or similar spores.

name: Squad Tactics
summary: You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe.

name: Stone Bones
summary: Your intractable nature can help you shrug off even the most grievous injuries.

name: Stonewalker
summary: You have a deep reverence for and connection to stone.

name: Strand Strider
summary: Your eight legs serve you well when climbing walls and webs alike.

name: Strong Swimmer
summary: Your swim Speed increases to match your land Speed.

name: Studious Adept
summary: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic.

name: Swift Application
summary: You expertly combine the motions of attacking and coating your weapon with venom.

name: Telekinetic Slip
summary: A thin shell of telekinetic energy pushes from your skin, widening your enemy's grasp enough for you to slip free.

name: Terrain Advantage
summary: You can take advantage of the terrain to bypass foes’ defenses.

name: Tetraelemental Assault
summary: Your Elemental Assault cycles through all four elements.

name: Thorned Seedpod
summary: When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines.

name: Tongue Tether
summary: Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands.

name: Towering Growth
summary: You're capable of growing as tall as a pine tree for a short time.

name: Transcendent Realization
summary: You've unleashed even more of your mind's limitless potential.

name: Tree Climber
summary: You've spent much of your life among the treetops and have become an expert at quickly and safely climbing them.

name: Two-Truths
summary: Your ability to imitate your progenitor is so strong, you can even convince yourself.

name: Uncanny Cheeks
summary: You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time.

name: Undying Ferocity
summary: You resist death’s clutches with supernatural vigor, daring death to claim you while promising that any such attempt will surely fail.

name: Unhampered Passage
summary: You won't allow others to restrain you.

name: Unyielding Disguise
prerequisite: ability to cast _humanoid form_ or _illusory disguise_
summary: When you cast _humanoid form_ or _illusory disguise_ to alter your appearance, the spell's duration is 2 hours.

name: Velstrac Magic
summary: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place.

name: Viper Strike
summary: You move and attack with a swiftness that most can't follow.

name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
summary: Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin.

name: Vivacious Conduit
summary: Your connection to the First World has grown, and its vital energy flows into you rapidly.

name: Wary Skulker
summary: Ever alert, you scout for danger even when you are trying to stay hidden.

name: Water Dancer
summary: You glide through the water with graceful ease.

name: Water Strider
summary: Water cradles your every step, allowing you to walk on its surface.

name: Web Hunter
summary: Through the careful cultivation of highly sensitive hairs, you've developed the ability to sense creatures without seeing them.

name: Well-Groomed
summary: You are fastidious about keeping yourself clean

name: Wheedle and Jig
summary: You make capering motions and silly sounds to captivate onlookers.

name: Wind God's Fan
summary: Your fan can stir up even more powerful winds.

name: Wing Step
summary: With a sharp flap of your wings, you stay light on your feet as you move.

name: Wings of Air
summary: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back.

name: Accursed Clay Fist
prerequisite: Golem Grafter Dedication; expert in unarmed attacks
summary: You have replaced one of your forearms with one made of clay and infused with cursed arcane magic.

name: Add Element
summary: Choose a second kinetic element to add to the one you already have.

name: Aerial Piledriver
summary: Heaving both yourself and your opponent into the air, you bring them crashing to the ground.

name: Agile Grace
summary: Your graceful moves with agile weapons are beyond compare.

name: Ancestral Mage
summary: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same.

name: Angel of Death
summary: All your Strikes against a creature you have Marked for Death have the death trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

name: Annotate Composition
summary: By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

name: Armor Rune Shifter
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 75</row>
summary: You learn the secrets of armor runes by viewing them through gems and can alter them at your discretion.

name: Armored Rest
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
summary: You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it.

name: Assured Ritualist
summary: You can cover for a secondary caster's error.

name: Attunement to Stone
summary: You can feel vibrations through the ground.

name: Aura Shaping
summary: You control the size of your kinetic aura.

name: Azure Fins
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: When submerged in water or another liquid, you form small fin-like arms along your body, granting you far greater maneuverability while swimming.

name: Bat Form
summary: You can transform into a bat.

name: Bear Empathy
summary: You have a magical affinity for bears and can speak to them through sounds and body language.

name: Beast Dynamo Howl
summary: You've incorporated beast tech from Arcadia into your dynamo, adding in components from various terrifying creatures to enhance your prosthesis's capabilities.

name: Beastmaster Bond
summary: You can communicate telepathically with your animal companions within 100 feet.

name: Beneath Notice
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Deception
summary: You are skilled at hiding from your foes and targets among the common populace.

name: Bestiary Scholar
prerequisite: Master in Arcana, Master in Crafting, Master in Nature, Master in Occultism, or Master in Religion; Scrollmaster Dedication
summary: You learn how to apply your extensive knowledge of certain creatures using the lore you know.

name: Big Debut
summary: Now's your chance! You're a Firebrand, and the world must know it.

name: Black Powder Flash
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 79</row>
summary: You ignite a pinch of black powder in a foe's face.

name: Blazing Streak
summary: Stride twice, making Strikes against up to four different creatures within reach at any point during your movement.

name: Borrow Time
summary: You reach ahead and make use of time that's yet to be.

name: Buckler Dance
summary: You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack.

name: Burrowing Form
summary: Your eidolon can burrow through loose dirt.

name: Call Worm Spirit
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You call forth a ghostly manifestation of the worm spirit.

name: Called Shot
summary: You target a specific area of your foe's anatomy to debilitating effect.

name: Camouflage
summary: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

name: Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
summary: Your Cascade Bearer training allows you to broaden the horizons of your halcyon spells further than most Magaambyans, weaving in spiritual magic.

name: Cascading Ray
summary: Magical energy spills out to extend beyond the creature you struck.

name: Castigating Weapon
summary: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the enemy and its allies.

name: Cautious Delver
summary: You've studied the many ways that ancient architects and spellcasters protected their possessions, such as by implementing deadly traps and curses, and learned some magic to counteract them.

name: Certain Strike
summary: Even when you don’t hit squarely, you can still score a glancing blow.

name: Chain Infusion
summary: The elemental matter in your blast keeps reconstituting itself to travel onward, no matter how many bodies it collides with.

name: Channel Rot
summary: You've learned to channel your curse through weapons you wield instead of solely through your flesh.

name: Cloud Walk
summary: Your growing link to cloud dragons has granted you the ability to walk on clouds.

name: Cobra Envenom
prerequisite: Cobra Stance; expert in unarmed attacks
summary: You lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe.

name: Come and Get Me
summary: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

name: Command Attention
trait: Archetype, Auditory, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental, Visual
summary: You command the attention of all around you with style, ensuring their gaze falls only upon you until the end of your next turn.

name: Communal Tale
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 78</row>
summary: Stories are an experience meant to be shared as a group.

name: Consecrate Spell
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Metamagic, Oracle, Sorcerer, Uncommon
prerequisite: ability to cast focus spells, divine spells
summary: You infuse a spell with the power of your faith, consecrating it.

name: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
summary: You defy Tar-Baphon with every undead you destroy, using your victory to rally your allies.

name: Counterclockwork Focus
summary: You understand the need for law enforcement doctrine to adapt to the ever-changing innovations in technology and arcana.

name: Courageous Assault
summary: With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack.

name: Crashing Slam
summary: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

name: Cut from the Air
summary: You can knock aside ranged attacks.

name: Daring Flourish
summary: You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts.

name: Dazzling Block
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, sparkling targe hybrid study
summary: When you use Shield Block, you can create a flash of brilliant, multicolored light in a 15-foot cone.

name: Dazzling Display
summary: You perform a bewildering show of prowess, such as by whirling and flashing a weapon, that unnerves foes.

name: Debilitating Shot
summary: Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

name: Deflecting Shot
summary: You're always ready to take a quick shot to deflect a weapon or distract a foe enough to render them off target.

name: Demanding Challenge
summary: If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.

name: Deny Support
summary: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

name: Deny the Songs of War
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 79</row>
summary: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it.

name: Derring-Do
summary: When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

name: Destructive Block
summary: You can protect yourself more effectively, at the expense of your shield.

name: Determined Dash
summary: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

name: Devoted Focus
summary: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

name: Dimensional Disappearance
prerequisite: _dimensional assault_ focus spell, laughing shadow hybrid study
summary: You take advantage of teleportation to better hide your position.

name: Disarming Twist
summary: After your initial attack redirects your foe’s defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

name: Disruptive Stance
summary: The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you’re prepared to foil enemies’ actions.

name: Distant Wandering
summary: Your body falls unconscious and your spirit projects out of it.

name: Distracting Explosion
summary: Your enemies think they can concentrate on something else while you're nearby? Oh, you'll give them a distraction, all right!

name: Double, Double
summary: For each temporary oil or potion you brew during your daily preparations, you brew two copies of it.

name: Drain Vitality
summary: You draw out the bestial magic energy within your bonded beast gun to fortify yourself, purge ongoing harm, and bolster your life force with a sheath of swirling life essence.

name: Draw from the Land
summary: You pull strength from the surrounding terrain.

name: Dream Guise
summary: You Stride into a willing ally's space, at which point both of your appearances shift into a shared third appearance, usually one that looks like a mix of the two of you.

name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
summary: You attack as you dash among foes.

name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
summary: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Eerie Proclamation
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Curse, Druid, Linguistic, Manipulate, Necromancy, Primal, Ranger, Uncommon
prerequisite: Expert in Occultism; Expert in Survival
summary: You know there are places in the world that are just wrong— places where the birds don't sing and where you always feel like you're being watched.

name: Eidetic Memorization
summary: Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time.

name: Elastic Mutagen
summary: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

name: Eldritch Debilitations
summary: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

name: Electrify Armor
summary: You electrify your armor to punish foes who dare to attack you.

name: Elemental Shape
summary: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body and manifest as a living embodiment of those elements.

name: Elemental Transformation
summary: You open your kinetic gate, but rather than activating your kinetic aura, you instead become overwhelmed with transformative elemental energy.

name: Elucidating Mercy
summary: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

name: Emerald Boughs Hideaway
prerequisite: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation
summary: You use Emerald Bough techniques to create a small extradimensional space called a hideaway that lasts as long as you are conscious.

name: Emissary of Peace
summary: Even when bloodshed is inevitable, you would rather see your foes surrender.

name: Emotional Surge
summary: Your heart soars, increasing your power for a moment.

name: Emphatic Emissary
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 79</row>
summary: You can tell when diplomacy has failed and a meeting is close to unraveling or falling to blows.

name: Endure Death's Touch
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; expert in medium or heavy armor
summary: Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away.

name: Energy Fusion
summary: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

name: Energy Ward
summary: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

name: Ensnaring Wrappings
summary: Some of your wrappings come loose to ensnare a creature you recently damaged.

name: Entwined Energy Ki
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74</row>
summary: You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities.

name: Everyone Duck!
summary: You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap’s effects.

name: Expand Spiral
summary: Your prayers encompass your companions, granting you the ability to share Pharasma's blessings.

name: Expanded Splash
summary: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

name: Expert Captivator Spellcasting
summary: You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive.

name: Expert Skysage Divination
summary: Your studies of the stars have taught you about the mysteries of the cosmos.

name: Fading
summary: You fade partially from reality.

name: Fearsome Brute
summary: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Flailtongue
summary: Your tongue has mutated into a lashing weapon reminiscent of Kabriri's bone-laden flail.

name: Flash your Badge
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg pg. 78</row>
summary: You make a fearsome show of your authority.

name: Flinging Charge
summary: You throw a weapon to distract your opponent as you close the gap to begin your assault.

name: Font of Knowledge
summary: Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics.

name: Furious Sprint
summary: You rush forward.

name: Fused Polearm
summary: During your daily preparations, you can magically fuse your arcane bonded weapon and a magical staff together into one item, with the staff making up the haft of the weapon.

name: Gathering Moss
summary: By rooting yourself in place, you are able to focus your body's natural healing to work faster.

name: Gaze of Veracity
prerequisite: Hellknight Signifer Dedication; ability to cast focus spells
summary: You can channel your mask’s power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation.

name: Giant Snare
summary: You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares.

name: Gift of the Hoard
prerequisite: You have succeeded at an important task given by a dragon, such as procuring a special treasure for their hoard.
summary: In pleasing the cravings of a mighty dragon, they have deigned to impart some of their magical essence into your body.

name: Glass Skin
prerequisite: You were present at the death of the medusa Alethsia, whose vitrumantic powers were passed on to you in the wake of her destruction.
summary: Even if vitrumancy is a mystery to you, your blood and flesh know the secrets of the art of arcane glass.

name: Glutton for Flesh
summary: You have developed a capacity to store more flesh within your gaunt body to leave yourself satiated longer.

name: Goblin Jubilee Display
summary: Flames and explosions sear the air in a riot of color and devastation that rivals that wrought by even the wildest goblin party.

name: Grave Sight
summary: Your ability to sense undead has improved.

name: Great Cleave
summary: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

name: Greater Awakened Power
summary: Your power undergoes yet another awakening.

name: Greater Bloodline
summary: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

name: Greater Deathly Secrets
summary: Your undead secrets grow stronger still.

name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
summary: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

name: Greater Magical Edification
summary: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge.

name: Greater Magical Scholastics
summary: You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

name: Greater Spell Runes
summary: You gain more powerful spell runes.

name: Greenwatcher
summary: Your experience fighting against and alongside fey creatures is nearly unrivaled.

name: Growth Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental wood, causing your magic to expand and grow beyond its original limitations.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
summary: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases.

name: Harden Flesh
summary: You fortify your skin with minerals drawn from earth and stone.

name: Harrying Strike
summary: Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies.

name: Healing Transformation
summary: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

name: Helpful Tinkering
summary: You don't just tinker with your own innovation, you fiddle with your allies' weapons as well (for their benefit, of course).

name: Heroic Recovery
summary: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

name: Hilt Hammer
summary: You know how to turn any weapon into a bone-crushing implement of skeletal destruction.

name: Holy Light
trait: Champion, Cleric, Concentrate, Divine, Evocation, Light, Uncommon
summary: You raise your arms to the sky and pray fervently, surrounding yourself in a beacon of holy light.

name: Hook 'Em
summary: The Salt Breakers learned to use whatever they could during the Vidric Revolution, and they quickly mastered the art of making a rope into a useful tool in combat.

name: House of Imaginary Walls
summary: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

name: Hunter's Vision
summary: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

name: I Meant to Do That
prerequisite: Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication; Trained in Deception
summary: Somehow your stray bullet causes an unintended reaction that creates a problem for your enemy: perhaps a ricochet knocks your foe's weapon away or they stumble over stray debris in an attempt to dodge your bullets.

name: Impose Order (Psychic)
summary: You bring discipline to your mind and magic, ensuring that you don't under-perform.

name: Imposing Destrier
summary: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Impressive Landing
summary: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

name: Improved Command Undead
prerequisite: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
summary: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
summary: Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Instant Armor
summary: A knight is nothing without their armor, and you know how to keep yours ready.

name: Into the Future
summary: You know your spell will be needed not now but in a few moments, so you cast your magic into the future.

name: Invigorating Breath
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
summary: Your spirit guide exhales its sweet-smelling breath on you, granting you the strength to push through your pain.

name: Just One More Thing
summary: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

name: Knockback
summary: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

name: Knockback Strike
summary: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

name: Know it All
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled.

name: Lastwall Warden
summary: Use your shield to protect your allies.

name: Lead the Way
summary: You move forward, creating an opening for others to follow.

name: Litany Against Sloth
summary: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

name: Litany of Self-Interest
summary: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

name: Lock On
summary: Aha! You lock on to your enemy's weak point to assist your construct companion in destroying it.

name: Lunging Spellstrike
summary: Your spell unwinds the structure of your staff to make it exceptionally long, or even separate it into shards held together by magical power.

name: Magical Adaptation
summary: When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it.

name: Major Lesson
summary: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

name: Martial Exercise
summary: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords.

name: Master Monster Hunter
summary: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

name: Masterful Obfuscation
prerequisite: master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Scrollmaster Dedication
summary: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study.

name: Menacing Prowess
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Intimidation
summary: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty.

name: Merciful Elixir
summary: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

name: Merciless Rend
summary: Your eidolon rends its foes.

name: Meteoric Spellstrike
summary: A trail of energy flows from your target back to you.

name: Methodical Debilitations
summary: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy’s tactical advantages.

name: Mighty Bulwark
summary: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers.

name: Mirror Shield
summary: You reflect the spell back against its caster.

name: Mockingbird's Disarm
summary: The Mockingbird is a master at running into foes and coming away with their weapons.

name: Monk's Flurry
summary: You gain the Flurry of Blows action.

name: Nimble Strike
summary: You’re cunning enough to find an opening in an opponent’s attack.

name: Ode to Ouroboros
summary: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell (page 371), which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

name: Ongoing Strategy
summary: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

name: Oracular Warning
summary: You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes.

name: Overpowering Charge
summary: You trample foes as you charge past.

name: Overwhelming Energy
summary: With a complex gesture, you call upon the primal power of your spell to overcome enemies’ resistances.

name: Pass Through
summary: Filtering your form through the substance of an object, you can pass through walls, doors, and more.

name: Peafowl Strut
summary: You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace.

name: Peerless Warden
summary: Your mastery of primal magic has given you access to the greatest secrets of warden magic.

name: Penetrating Fire
summary: You blast a bullet through one foe and into another.

name: Penetrating Shot
summary: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

name: Perfect Ki Expert
summary: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: _unblinking flame aura_ for Unblinking Flame, _unbreaking wave vapor_ for Unbreaking Waves, _unfolding wind buffet_ for Unfolding Wind, or _untwisting iron roots_ for Untwisting Iron.

name: Phenom's Verve
summary: You're possessed with an incredibly vivacious spark that separates you not only from ordinary gun users and gunslingers, but even from other phenoms.

name: Plant Shape
summary: You can take the shape of a plant creature.

name: Potent Poisoner
summary: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

name: Practiced Defender
summary: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised.

name: Practiced Reloads
summary: You've mastered the reloading techniques and methods usually practiced by only the most dedicated firearm professionals.

name: Precious Munitions
summary: You mix flecks of precious materials you've gathered on your journeys into your custom bullets to bring out those properties in your temporary ammunition.

name: Precise Debilitations
summary: You attack with great precision.

name: Prevailing Position
summary: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

name: Primal Howl
summary: Your companion can let out a howl laced with your primal magic.

name: Pristine Weapon
summary: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

name: Propulsive Leap
summary: By expelling flames from your feet or levitating through electrical repulsion, you propel yourself through the air.

name: Protective Bond
summary: The power of your bond can protect you and your eidolon from harm.

name: Provocator Dedication
summary: For you, fighting is as much about style as skill.

name: Pushing Attack
summary: Your eidolon has an attack that pushes away enemies.

name: Quicken Heartbeat
summary: You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine.

name: Quickened Casting
trait: Bard, Concentrate, Oracle, Sorcerer, Spellshape, Witch, Wizard
summary: If your next action is to cast a cantrip or a spell that is at least 2 ranks lower than the highest-rank spell slot you have, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

name: Radiant Blade Spirit
summary: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
summary: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic.

name: Rapid Recharge
summary: You tap into an arcane trick to recover your ability to meld spells and attacks.

name: Reactive Charm
summary: You're so charming and distracting that when pressed, you can cast a simple enchantment in time to foil an attacker.

name: Rebounding Assault
summary: You hurl your melee weapon at an opponent, then fire a bullet into the weapon's hilt, making it deal additional damage and bounce back to your grasp.

name: Recover Spell
summary: You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates.

name: Redirecting Shot
summary: Seeing your ally's attack about to go astray, you fire your weapon to right its course.

name: Reflexive Riposte
summary: You can riposte almost without a thought.

name: Replenishment of War
prerequisite: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
summary: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

name: Repurposed Parts
summary: You are familiar with the fittings and cogwheels of your snares and can repurpose parts from prepared quick-deploy snares to assemble a new creation on the fly.

name: Resilient Touch
summary: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

name: Resounding Blow
summary: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

name: Reverberating Spell
summary: Your spell disorients your targets with a metallic clangor.

name: Roadkill
summary: In your hands, any vehicle is a weapon.

name: Rockslide Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground.

name: Rockslide Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental earth, causing chunks of stone to litter the ground.

name: Rocky Flesh
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: Your flesh takes on the hardness of stone.

name: Rope Mastery
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Athletics
summary: Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways.

name: Rubbery Skin
summary: Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality.

name: Runic Mind Smithing
summary: You focus your mind on thoughtforms of fundamental magical forces, shaping them into a property rune that you mentally etch onto your mind weapon.

name: Saving Slash
summary: Make a check to reduce a critical hit against you to a normal hit.

name: Scour the Library
summary: Seeing an enemy's attack, you quickly consult multiple scraps of lore in your mind, synthesizing them into the perfect plan.

name: Scout's Pounce
summary: You leap from the shadows to strike your foes.

name: Scroll Adept
summary: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

name: Shadow Magic
summary: You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

name: Shadow Reservoir
prerequisite: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Shadowcaster Dedication
summary: Your own shadow speaks to you, providing knowledge of spells and a reservoir of magical power.

name: Shadow Sneak Attack
summary: You gain the sneak attack class feature, except you deal 1d6 precision damage regardless of your level.

name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout
summary: You gain the _shall not falter, shall not rout_ focus spell.

name: Share Weakness
summary: You select an object from your esoterica that has great personal value to you, such as a locket or treasured ring, and you grant it to an ally, establishing a personal link that allows your ally to affect an enemy as if they were you.

name: Shared Avoidance
summary: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

name: Shared Synergy
summary: You can grant the benefit from Dualistic Synergy to an ally within 30 feet instead of yourself, either allowing that ally to Recall Knowledge, granting that ally temporary Hit Points, or both, depending on the spell’s tradition.

name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
summary: The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional 3d6 piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel.

name: Shield of Faith
summary: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

name: Shield of Reckoning
summary: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

name: Side by Side (Druid)
summary: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

name: Signature Spell Expansion
summary: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

name: Signifer's Sight
summary: The magic flowing through your signifer’s mask allows you to see in the dark, and the mask dampens the distraction caused by sudden flashes of bright light.

name: Silencing Strike
summary: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

name: Silent Sting
prerequisite: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert in Stealth
summary: You quickly hide your weapon to make it difficult to pin the attack on you.

name: Siphon Life
trait: Aftermath, Flourish, Magical, Necromancy, Negative, Rare
prerequisite: You've been reduced to 0 Hit Points by an enemy with the negative trait.
summary: Experiences with necromantic energy have left a permanent mark on you, casting you in a deathlike pallor, chilling your body temperature to be ice-cold, turning your very blood black, and giving you the power to rip out an enemy's life force.

name: Sixth Pillar Dedication
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 223</row>
prerequisite: Dexterity 14; Expert in Acrobatics; ability to cast spells
summary: You use your physical discipline to channel your magic.

name: Slayer's Presence
summary: Your very presence strikes fear into the undead.

name: Sleeper Hold
summary: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

name: Sneak Adept
summary: It’s almost impossible to spot you.

name: Spellmaster's Ward
summary: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe.

name: Spinebreaker
summary: You squeeze your opponent in a vicious bear hug, putting intense pressure on their nerves, joints, or other pain points.

name: Spiritual Flurry
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
prerequisite: Scion of Domora Dedication; Spiritual Strike
summary: When you use Spiritual Strike, hit targets become flat-footed until the end of your current turn.

name: Spy's Countermeasures
summary: You’ve learned how to analyze and fake your responses to the most common magic used against spies.

name: Staggering Blow
summary: You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back.

name: Stalwart Standard
summary: Your banner makes it harder for your foes to push your allies around and encourages your allies to protect the innocent.

name: Starlit Spells
summary: The stars reveal and punish your enemies.

name: Steal Time
summary: You reach into another creature's timeline and attempt to alter their flow of time.

name: Steal the Sky
summary: You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft.

name: Stonebane
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: Your stonestrike attacks deal 1d6 additional damage against constructs, creatures with the earth trait, and earthen objects, such as a stone door.

name: Strident Command
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Master in Intimidation; Vigilante Dedication; Voice of Authority; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: The common folk heed your demands, and though your true foes rarely bend to your commands, when they do the hesitation can cost them the battle.

name: Surging Might
summary: With a complex gesture, you focus the divine power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances.

name: Surrounding Flames
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _wall of fire_
summary: When you cast _wall of fire_, you can modify it to create a 10-foot-radius hemisphere of fire.

name: Suspect of Opportunity
summary: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

name: Sustaining Steel
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, inexorable iron hybrid study
summary: You pull magic into your weapon, using its substance to transform the magic into restorative energy.

name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
summary: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell (page 371), which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

name: Tactical Debilitations
summary: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

name: Tactical Reflexes
summary: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings.

name: Tag Team
