summary: Your skilled teamwork with your spotter enables you both to assist one another when you falter, using either other's failures as opportunities to strike.

name: Tangle of Battle
summary: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

name: Targeting Finisher
summary: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

name: Tectonic Stomp
summary: You cause minor tremors that topple your enemies.

name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
summary: You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield.

name: Temporary Potions
summary: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

name: Terrain Form
summary: You crumble to pieces, becoming composed of the very terrain to which you're bound, with the effects of the _gaseous form_ spell, or you reconstitute into your normal form.

name: Terrain Transposition
summary: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

name: Terrifying Howl
summary: You unleash a terrifying howl.

name: Thaumaturge's Investiture
summary: Magical equipment and gear are the tools of your trade, and you know you need as many as possible to help you against the supernatural.

name: Through Spell
summary: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

name: Thunderclap Spell
summary: Your lightning splits the air, generating a booming shock wave.

name: Tiller's Aid
summary: You can quickly Aid your crop.

name: Tiller's Drive
summary: Increase your Speed and that of your crop.

name: Topple Foe
summary: You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet.

name: Toppling Tentacles
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _black tentacles_
summary: When you cast _black tentacles_, you can modify it to trip the targets.

name: Torrential Backlash
summary: Calling upon forbidden practices, you release the curse from within yourself, allowing it free rein to destroy everything around you.

name: Trampling Charge
summary: You urge your mount forward, trampling enemies in your path.

name: Transpose
summary: You switch places with your eidolon.

name: Trick Shot
summary: You shoot not at your foe but at an object nearby.

name: Tumbling Opportunist
summary: You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back.

name: Tunnel
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You gain a burrow speed of 10 feet.

name: Turn to Mist
summary: You turn into vapor, gaining the effects of _gaseous form_.

name: Twin Riposte
summary: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

name: Twin Shot Knockdown
summary: You fire at an enemy while targeting a part of its anatomy that will disrupt its balance.

name: Twin Weakness
summary: As you make an attack augmented by your esoterica, you also press your implement against the creature, applying its weakness as your implement's energies sear the creature's flesh.

name: Unbelievable Escape
summary: Your ability to narrowly evade danger defies all logic.

name: Unbreakable Bond
summary: You and your megafauna companion are bound together; as long as you live, it's much harder for your companion to die.

name: Uncanny Dodge
summary: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

name: Unseat
summary: You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount.

name: Unstable Concoction
summary: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

name: Unusual Composition
summary: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

name: Uzunjati Recollection
prerequisite: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
summary: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process.

name: Vicious Debilitations
summary: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!
summary: You can train your allies to Raise a Shield on your order

name: Ward Casting
summary: You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell.

name: Warden's Step
summary: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

name: Weapon-Rune Shifter
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 75</row>
summary: You learn how to alter the magic of weapon runes by using a crystal as a focusing component.

name: Weighty Impact
summary: Your eidolon knocks enemies down.

name: Whirlwind Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
prerequisite: Staff Acrobat Dedication; expert proficiency in your staff
summary: You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one.

name: Wide Overwatch
summary: Through a variety of perceptive techniques, careful routines, and upgrades to your enhanced visual gear, you have become able to observe and maintain your overwatch at a much greater distance.

name: Widen the Gap
summary: Once you have penetrated a foe’s defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent’s wound and deal some serious damage.

name: Wind Jump
summary: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

name: Winding Flow
summary: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

name: Winter's Embrace
summary: Your eyes are accustomed to the harsh glare of the sun on snow and ice.

name: Witch's Communion
summary: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74</row>
summary: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.

name: A Home in Every Port
summary: Spend downtime to gain free lodging for a night.

name: Axuma's Awakening
prerequisite: Exposure to the Well of Axuma
summary: Exposure of the well of Axuma has given you some arcane magic.

name: Axuma's Vigor
prerequisite: Exposure to the Well of Axuma
summary: Your vigor makes it easier for others to heal you.

name: Caravan Leader
summary: Your group can Hustle for much longer.

name: Fame and Fortune
summary: Gain RP when you critically succeed at Kingdom skills

name: Incredible Investiture
summary: Invest up to 12 magic items

name: Incredible Scout
summary: Grant allies +2 to initiative rolls when Scouting.

name: Acknowledge Fan
summary: Your reputation as a Firebrand precedes you, and you need only make a simple gesture or give a look of recognition to amaze those around you.

name: Additional Shadow Magic
summary: Choose an additional shadowdancer focus spell you haven't already selected from Shadow Magic.

name: Advanced Order Training
prerequisite: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
summary: You gain the greater order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
prerequisite: Eldritch Researcher Dedication; Seeker of Truths
summary: You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore.

name: Aegis of Arnisant
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; Shield Block; Master in Religion
summary: Inspired by the tale of Arnisant, you transform your shield into a magic ward.

name: Affliction Mercy
summary: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

name: Amplifying Touch
summary: Your healing energies empower attacks.

name: Architect of Flame
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal
summary: Flames rise and shape to your will, forming a wall or dome of your design.

name: Assassinate
summary: You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark.

name: Aura of Faith
summary: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

name: Banshee Cry Display
summary: You've learned how to pull off a sudden noisemaker at just the right moment in your display, a technique that can disrupt precise wording.

name: Beastmaster's Call
summary: You quickly call in a primal projection of a non-active companion to provide the companion's support benefit.

name: Blade of Justice
summary: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

name: Blade of Law
summary: You call upon the power of law and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed breaking or disrespecting the law or otherwise acting disorderly.

name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
summary: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe.

name: Blessed Denial
summary: You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally.

name: Blood Component Substitution
summary: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

name: Blood in the Air
summary: Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim.

name: Bloodline Focus
summary: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

name: Bloody Debilitation
summary: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

name: Boost Modulation
summary: You aren't satisfied with keeping to just one kind of boost from your constant tinkering, so you've learned to modulate between several possibilities at once.

name: Brutal Finish
summary: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foe’s defenses.

name: Bullet Dancer Reload
summary: You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata.

name: Cartwheel Dodge
summary: You can dodge away from damaging effects.

name: Chain Reaction
summary: You fire your gun once, creating a devastating and unpredictable chain of events; perhaps your bullet strikes exactly the right spot on a water tower, causing it to flood and incite a stampede of horses which knock over a lantern that sets a city on fire.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
summary: You can suffer so that others might live.

name: Charged Creation
summary: Your magic is drawn to your persistent creations.

name: Cheat Death
summary: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

name: Choking Smoke
summary: When you cast _fireball_, you can modify it to create a cloud of smoking smoke.

name: Clever Counterspell
summary: You creatively apply your prepared spells to Counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

name: Coffin Bound
summary: You bind your spirit to a coffin filled with soil of your homeland, making it a place of recovery.

name: Collapse Wall
summary: You detonate the required bombs in order to bring a wall down on a creature.

name: Combat Premonition
summary: By narrowing your sense of the future, you can improve that of your allies.

name: Communal Sustain
summary: Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect.

name: Competitive Eater
summary: Gorging on flesh after your stomach is full fortifies you, making you hardy enough to withstand more punishment.

name: Conflux Focus
summary: You imagine how you'll weave magic and combat into future battles, improving your focus.

name: Contingency Gadgets
summary: You are too brilliant to be caught off guard, and you always have just the right gadget for the situation.

name: Coordinated Charge
summary: You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow.

name: Coordinated Distraction
summary: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

name: Corpse Stench
summary: Your body exudes an overwhelming scent of decay in a 10-foot emanation, so putrid that it nauseates creates within that range.

name: Coven Spell
summary:
You rhyme with your ally’s incantations or echo their movements, linking your magic to empower their spell in one of two ways:
  • If their spell deals damage and doesn’t have a duration, you grant that spell a status bonus to damage equal to its rank.

name: Cracked Mountain
summary: You fight on, staying on your feet and lashing out at a foe.

name: Crimson Breath
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You gain a fire breath weapon similar to that of a crimson worm.

name: Critical Debilitation
summary: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

name: Cut the Bonds
prerequisite: Bellflower Dedication; expert in a melee weapon
summary: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.

name: Daredevil's Gambit
summary: If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target’s space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first.

name: Dashing Strike
summary: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

name: Deadeye
summary: You relax your eyes, taking in the presence of hidden things, granting you the ability to locate invisible creatures.

name: Deadly Poison Weapon
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 78</row>
summary: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

name: Deep Freeze
summary: You vent a jet of supercooled fluid from your innovation, damaging a foe and slowing it down.

name: Defensive Recovery
summary: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

name: Desiccating Inhalation
summary: You draw in the moisture from nearby creatures, draining them dry to heal your wounds.

name: Determined Lore Seeker
summary: You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss.

name: Diamond Soul
summary: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

name: Directed Poison
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _cloudkill_
summary: When you cast _cloudkill_, you can modify it to be under your control.

name: Disrupt Ki
summary: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

name: Distracting Shot
summary: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

name: Diverse Weapon Expert
prerequisite: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
summary: Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, and your proficiency rank for advanced weapons increases to trained.

name: Divine Wall
summary: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

name: Dodging Roll
summary: You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

name: Domain Fluency
summary: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery.

name: Domain Focus
summary: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

name: Double Prey
summary: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

name: Dragon Shape
summary: You can take on the shape of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

name: Dragon's Rage Wings
summary: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

name: Drive-By Attack
summary: You can smoothly line up an attack without disrupting your control.

name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
summary: Using a free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Eagle Eye
summary: Your practice with crossbows and firearms has sharpened your attention to detail.

name: Eagle Eyes
summary: You and your spotter are adept at watching out for one another.

name: Eclectic Polymath
summary: Your flexible mind can quickly shift from one spell to another.

name: Educated Assessment
summary: You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature’s Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment.

name: Effortless Impulse
summary: A steady ripple from your kinetic gate maintains one of your impulses.

name: Elaborate Scroll Esoterica
summary: You've picked up more scraps of magic texts, improving your makeshift scrolls.

name: Emblazon Antimagic
summary: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

name: Embrace the Pain
summary: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

name: Emergency Medical Assistance
summary: You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires.

name: Enforce Oath
prerequisite: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
summary: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

name: Enigma's Knowledge
summary: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

name: Enticing Dwelling
summary: Your _spirit dwelling_ is particularly inviting to spirit wisps.

name: Escape Timeline
summary: You step outside of the flow of time momentarily, allowing you to avoid dangers.

name: Evasiveness (Rogue)
prerequisite: Rogue Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
summary: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
prerequisite: Swashbuckler Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
summary: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

name: Expert Bard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Bard Spellcasting; Master in Occultism
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting
summary: You've learned the deeper secrets of beast guns, making you an expert in the magic they grant you.

name: Expert Cathartic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Combat Eidolon
summary: Your eidolon advances its capabilities in combat.

name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Druid Spellcasting; Master in Nature
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Kinetic Control
summary: You become an expert in kineticist class DC and impulse attack rolls.

name: Expert Magus Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Magus Spellcasting; Master in Arcana
summary: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Oracle Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Oracle Spellcasting; Master in Religion
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Psychic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Scroll Cache
summary: Your scroll collection is more powerful.

name: Expert Snowcasting
summary: You draw ever more magical cold into your being, learning how to manipulate it to your whims.

name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting; master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Expert Spellcasting
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting archetype benefits.

name: Expert Summoner Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Summoner Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
summary: You gain the expert bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; Master in Arcana
summary: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Extend Elixir
summary: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

name: Familiar's Eyes
summary: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

name: Fantastic Leap
summary: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

name: Felling Shot
summary: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

name: Festering Wound
summary: Wounds you inflict with your unarmed attacks fester and rot, becoming infected and difficult to heal.

name: Finessed Features
summary: You've learned how to build snares that trigger based on visual stimuli.

name: Firearm Expert
prerequisite: Gunslinger Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
summary: You've become an expert with your chosen weapons.

name: Flesh Wound
summary: You fire to ensure that even if your shot doesn't land cleanly, it still lands close enough to deal some damage.

name: Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting
summary: You broaden your ability to channel your power into halcyon magic.

name: Flexible Transmogrification
summary: You've learned how to transmogrify your eidolon to suit the circumstances of the day.

name: Flicker
summary: You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur.

name: Flinging Shove
summary: Whether you’re shoving opponents with a shield or a large weapon, you’ve learned to push them even further.

name: Flourishing Finish
summary: Your martial prowess demoralizes all who can see you.

name: Focused Shot
summary: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

name: For Love, For Lightning
summary: Rumors suggest this technique was pioneered by knights who undertook missions for Clarethe Iomedar at the half-moon, but many Crimson Reclaimers have since mastered it.

name: Forcible Energy
summary: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

name: Foresee Danger
summary: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

name: Foreseen Failure
summary: You see your spell fail to take hold to disastrous end, then snap back to reality—it was all a precognition, and you know to try a different spell.

name: Forewarn
summary: Your foresight and planning are more valuable than armor as you direct your ally away from danger, but there's a limit to how often you can guide your allies away from a foe's relentless assaults.

name: Fortunate Relief
summary: Your god favors your attempts to remove afflictions and conditions.

name: Frightening Appearance
summary: Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders.

name: Frostbite Runes
summary: Thick tattoos, each one a rune fragment from the saumen kar's long-lost language spelling out their pact with their equally lost deity, cover your body and stretch across your limbs, torso, and face.

name: Furious Grab
summary: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

name: Furnace Form
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Opening your kinetic gate, you allow flames to consume your form and leave you a living flame.

name: Garland Spell
summary: If your next action is to Cast a Spell with the fungus or plant trait, a garland of plants grows in a 10-foot burst in the spell’s range.

name: Ghosts in the Storm
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: Clouds, like eager pets, are drawn to you and to those in your good graces.

name: Gigantic Megafauna Companion
summary: The mammoths and other megafauna ridden by your people are larger than any ordinary beast.

name: Gigavolt
summary: When you unleash electricity from your innovation, you can bounce it off obstacles, creating a field of electric death.

name: Glacial Prison
trait: Cold, Impulse, Incapacitation, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: Intense cold swirls around your foe, covering it in frost that slows it down and turns its body to ice.

name: Golem Dynamo
summary: You've learned the secrets of Jistkan golem prostheses, allowing you to incorporate golem components into your dynamo and gain a portion of their magic.

name: Grasping Limbs
summary: Your eidolon grabs enemies.

name: Great Bear
summary: When you transform, you can take on a bear's bulk and size.

name: Greater Despair
summary: You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour.

name: Greater Physical Evolution
summary: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

name: Greater Revelation
summary: You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
summary: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

name: Greater Sun Blessing
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City pg. 79</row>
summary: Your connection to the Old Sun Gods grows stronger.

name: Green Tongue
summary: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

name: Gruesome Strike
prerequisite: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
summary: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

name: Guarded Advance
summary: You slowly advance on the battlefield, taking utmost caution.

name: Hedge Maze
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: You sculpt a manicured maze of hedges.

name: Hell's Armaments
summary: You’ve trained with your order’s weapon and your Hellknight plate long enough to apply your expertise from other weapons and armor.

name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
prerequisite: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
summary: You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong.

name: Hex Focus
summary: Your patron’s teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

name: Illusory Identity
summary: There are times when skills or looks are not enough to convince someone of your identity, and you instead require adequate documentation.

name: Imbue Mindlessness
summary: You grasp the mind of an undead creature and temporarily wipe it as empty as a zombie's brain.

name: Improved Dueling Riposte
summary: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the slightest opening or moment of weakness presents itself.

name: Improved Knockback
summary: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

name: Incredible Ricochet
summary: After your first shot singles out your opponent’s position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

name: Inescapable Grasp
summary: Your grasp has a supernatural quality to it, preventing your foes from easily escaping—with or without magical assistance.

name: Infectious Emotions
summary: When you use Catharsis, one ally within 30 feet gains the catharsis activation benefits in addition to you.

name: Inspirational Focus
summary: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

name: Instigate Psychic Duel
summary: You attempt to enter a psychic duel with a creature within 100 feet.

name: Intensify Investiture
summary: Your bond to your invested items enables you to put more of yourself into them.

name: Interfering Surge
summary: You overcharge the triggering spell with magic.

name: Invincible Mutagen
summary: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

name: Janatimo's Lessons
summary: Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations.

name: Judgment of the Monolith
summary: You can use your _ka stone_ to compel the truth.

name: Juggernaut's Fortitude
prerequisite: Barbarian Dedication; expert in Fortitude Saves
summary: Your proficiency rank in Fortitude saves increases to master.

name: Keen Magical Detection
summary: You sense magical dangers.

name: Knight in Shining Armor
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; expert in light armor, medium armor, or unarmored defense; trained in heavy armor
summary: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor.

name: Lasting Doubt
summary: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

name: Legs of Stone
summary: You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you.

name: Liberating Stride
summary: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

name: Lich Dedication
summary: After years of study and careful planning, you finally completed a _soul cage_ to house your soul and successfully performed a ritual to transform yourself into a lich.

name: Lightning Snares
prerequisite: Master in Crafting; Quick Snares; Snare Specialist
summary: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

name: Link Focus
summary: Your focus recovers faster.

name: Living Stone
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 83</row>
summary: Your body becomes living stone.

name: Lunging Stance
summary: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

name: Magic Sense
trait: Arcane, Detection, Magus, Oracle, Sorcerer, Wizard
summary: You have a literal sixth sense for ambient magic in your vicinity.

name: Maneuvering Spell
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 223</row>
summary: You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield.

name: Master Alchemy
summary: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 7.

name: Master Spotter
summary: Your incredible perception and trusty enhanced visual gear allow you to see things others miss.

name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
summary: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
summary: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

name: Master of the Dead
summary: You have reached the pinnacle of the reanimator's craft: the ability to raise nearly any corpse or skeleton as a gruesome mockery of the creature it once was.

name: Meditative Focus
summary: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

name: Metallic Envisionment
summary: You always account for every weakness, allowing your mind to imagine just the right physical form to take advantage of your opponents.

name: Miraculous Intervention
summary: Through divine intervention or whispered prayers, you foil an enemy's response.

name: Mobile Finisher
summary: You attack in motion.

name: Necromancer's Visage
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Necromantic energy demonstrates your power over undead, creating a demeanor that commands their fear and respect.

name: Necromantic Deflection
summary: You imbue your shield with life-giving energy to deflect harmful necromantic magic.

name: Night's Shine
summary: Your power from the moon and stars becomes strong enough to illuminate the night sky.

name: No Stranger to Death
summary: Your regular exposure to the insidious putrescence of undeath inured you to its effects.

name: No!!!
summary: The shock of seeing your ally near death breaks whatever limits exist in your mind, sending your power spilling forth.

name: Obscured Emergence
summary: You are, by nature, a thing of gloomy woods and barren wilds, and when you choose show yourself, a bit of this gloom clings to you, obscuring your form with strange distortions or mist.

name: Oneiric Influence
summary: While Infiltrating a Dream, you can also implant a suggestion in the target's mind.

name: Overwhelming Breath
summary: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

name: Overwhelming Spellstrike
summary: You pierce through your foe's resistance.

name: Pact of the Final Breath
summary: You've sworn a pact with a powerful psychopomp—typically an olethros advocate or yamaraj judge—granting you a reprieve before your soul will be collected in exchange for respect for the dead and assistance against the undead.

name: Pale Horse
summary: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

name: Paragon's Guard
summary: Once you’ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

name: Perfection's Path
prerequisite: Monk Dedication; expert in at least one saving throw
summary: Increase the proiciency rank for one saving throw to master.

name: Pesh Skin
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 78</row>
summary: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

name: Petrified Skin
prerequisite: You have been petrified by an enemy.
summary: It might have been a medusa, dracolisk, or even a fossil golem; regardless of the source, you were the target of some petrifying effect, and an element of that stony gaze has remained with you, both protecting and slowly consuming you.

name: Plentiful Snares
summary: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients.

name: Predator's Pounce
summary: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

name: Preparation
summary: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

name: Primal Focus
summary: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

name: Primal Summons
summary: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Psi Catastrophe
trait: Concentrate, Evocation, Mindshift, Occult, Psyche, Psychic
summary: You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast.

name: Purifying Spell
summary: You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness.

name: Rain of Razors
summary: Razor-sharp slivers of metal fall from the sky.

name: Rattle The Earth
summary: Striking the ground with the gravity of the deepest rocks, you cause an earthquake.

name: Reach for the Sky
summary: You command the room, firing a gun into the air and ordering everyone to surrender and put their hands in the air.

name: Reactive Interference
summary: Grabbing a sleeve, swiping with your weapon, or creating another obstruction, you reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

name: Read the Land
summary: You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information.

name: Reaper of Repose
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; master proficiency in a weapon
summary: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses.

name: Reason Rapidly
summary: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

name: Reclaimant Plea
summary: You call on the power of the Crimson Oath to gain magical aid.

name: Recollect Studies
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
summary: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures.

name: Redirect Elements
summary: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area.

name: Redirect Elements
summary: You seize the elemental essence of an incoming spell and redirect the spell to a creature of your choice within the spell's area.

name: Rejuvenation
summary: The call of your unfinished business recreates you after destruction.

name: Resolute
summary: You've tempered your mind and become resolute against effects that strain your willpower.

name: Reverberate
summary: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

name: Reverse Curse
summary: When you counter a curse or misfortune effect, you send it back to destroy its originator.

name: Ricochet Feint
summary: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

name: Ricochet Shot
summary: You bounce your shot off a nearby surface to strike your opponent from an unexpected angle.

name: Rock Rampart
trait: Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal
summary: Drawing on your connection to the Plane of Earth, you form a wall of rock and earth.

name: Roll with It (Ranger)
summary: You can dodge attacks from giants.

name: Rugged Survivalist
summary: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.

name: Sapping Symbol
summary: Your religious symbol glows with sacred energy, turning the attacker’s strength to weakness.

name: School Counterspell
summary: Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school.

name: Sea Glass Guardians
summary: Eerily beautiful elemental water beings race around you, eager to protect and heal you and your allies.

name: Second Sting
summary: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

name: Secret Eater
summary: You have discovered and found favor with the cult within the church of Kabriri known as the Secret Eaters.

name: Secrets of Shadow
summary: Your shadow's voice grows ever clearer; it whispers secrets of true power to you and shields your flesh from harm.

name: Self-Destruct
summary: You've installed a self-destruct device within your construct companion, which you can trigger with a special device from up to 60 feet away.

name: Sense Ki
summary: You can read the presence of ki in your area.

name: Shadow Illusion
summary: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms.

name: Shaped Contaminant
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 78</row>
summary: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

name: Shared Assault
summary: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

name: Shared Overdrive
summary: You've experimented enough on your teammates to transfer a substantial number of powered-up gizmos to them, enabling one of your allies to benefit from the full effects and duration of your Overdrive.

name: Shared Replenishment
summary: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

name: Shared Sight
summary: You bestow the mystical vision granted to you by your muse upon your allies.

name: Shared Warding
summary: You ward your allies from the attacks of your foes whenever you apply those protections to yourself.

name: Shattering Shot
summary: You fling a bomb into the air and then shoot it with your gun before it falls, raining destruction down over a wide area.

name: Shattershields
summary: Four plates of pitted metal float around you to intercept attacks.

name: Shepherd of Desolation
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Survivor of Desolation
summary: You know how to keep others alive in the Gravelands' murkiest shadows.

name: Shield Salvation
summary: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.

name: Shooter's Camouflage
summary: You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot.

name: Shoulder Catastrophe
summary: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself.

name: Side by Side (Ranger)
summary: You and your animal companion fight in tandem.

name: Signifer Armor Expertise
summary: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well.

name: Silver's Refrain
summary: Learn the _silver's refrain_ composition cantrip.

name: Sing to the Steel
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 79</row>
summary: You strike magical tones that can turn the tide of combat.

name: Six Pillars Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 223</row>
summary: You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed.

name: Space-Time Shift
summary: You travel just a few moments into the future to immediately arrive at your destination.

name: Speaking Sky
summary: You can hear air movement like soft whispers.

name: Spellmaster's Resilience
summary: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it.

name: Spirit's Wrath
summary: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

name: Spiritual Aid
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
summary: When you call your spirit guide for aid, its presence bolsters your will and agility.

name: Splendid Companion
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
summary: Your animal companion continues to develop.

name: Spring from the Shadows
summary: You leap from hiding and assail your target.

name: Stance Savant (Monk)
summary: You enter a stance without a thought.

name: Student of the Dueling Arts
summary: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day.

name: Summoner's Call
summary: In a moment of danger, you call your eidolon to your side.

name: Sunder Spell
summary: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

name: Swap Investment
summary: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.

name: Tense Negotiator
summary: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place.

name: Thaumaturge's Demesne
summary: You have claimed an area or location as your demesne, granting you the ability to ward and protect it.

name: Their Master's Call
summary: In a pinch, you pull one of your inactive companions from their rest to provide a companion's support benefit.

name: Titan's Stature
summary: You grow to even greater size.

name: Too Angry to Die
summary: You refuse to yield the battle, even after you've been knocked off your feet and nearly killed.

name: Towering Size
summary: Your eidolon becomes even bigger.

name: Tunneling Claws
summary: You have elongated claws and enhanced senses, making you uncanny at digging the underground passageways needed to construct ghoul warrens and rob graves without arousing suspicion.

name: Unbalancing Sweep
summary: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

name: Uncanny Bombs
summary: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

name: Uncanny Suction
summary: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.

name: Unshakable Grit
summary: You've become hardened by conflict after everything you've faced, and you possess a certain intractable stubbornness.

name: Venomous Touch
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You've learned to channel the sting of the worm.

name: Vernai Training
prerequisite: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
summary: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death.

name: Vigilant Benediction
summary: Unwilling to be outdone by the Crimson Reclaimers and their oath, you've petitioned the gods of good for a sliver of divine magic.

name: Wandering Oasis
summary: You’re surrounded by soothing energy.

name: Ward Slumber
summary: Just before going to sleep, you can perform a 10-minute ward to protect the slumber of up to eight creatures within 30 feet of you.

name: Warden's Focus
summary: Your connection with your surroundings deepens and expands, allowing you to draw in more of nature’s primal power as you focus.

name: Wave Spiral
summary: You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water.

name: Wild Strider
summary: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you.

name: Wiles on the Wind
trait: Air, Auditory, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal
summary: Speaking lies, you set them loose upon a drifting wind.

name: Wings of the Dragon
summary: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.

name: Witchwood Seed
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Polymorph, Primal, Wood
summary: You touch a creature to implant a malignant seed in its body.

name: Witch’s Broom
summary: A broom is the only steed you need to fly through the night sky.

name: Words of Unraveling
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual.

name: Advanced General Training
summary: Over the long course of your adventuring life, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities.

name: Airy Step
summary: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space.

name: Alter Resistance
summary: You focus on your protean forebears to change your energy resistance.

name: Ancestor's Rage
summary: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena.

name: Ancestor's Transformation
summary: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.

name: Aquatic Adaptation
summary: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water.

name: Aquatic Camouflage
summary: You blend into the waves.

name: Arcane Locomotion
summary: You've modified your body to allow you to augment your movement.

name: Arcane Sight
prerequisite: ability to cast the _detect magic_ cantrip
summary: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things.

name: Arise, ye Worthy!
summary: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp.

name: Astral Blink
summary: You've attuned your core to allow you to phase in and out of the Astral Plane, allowing you to teleport periodically.

name: Augment Senses
summary: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses.

name: Avenge Ally
summary: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks.

name: Azarketi Weapon Expertise
source: <row gap="tiny">Absalom, City of Lost Omens pg. 395</row>
summary: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched.

name: Black Cat Curse
summary: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature.

name: Bone Investiture
summary: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.

name: Bounce Back
summary: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.

name: Calaca's Showstopper
summary: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels.

name: Call of the Green Man
summary: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.

name: Can't Fall Here
summary: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds.

name: Cannibalize Magic
summary: The fey magic inside of you is a vital part of your body, and you can steal other sources of magic to replenish yours.

name: Caterwaul
summary: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
summary: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons

name: Ceaseless Shadows
summary: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd.

name: Celestial Mercy
prerequisite: Angelkin, Lawbringer, Musetouched, or another lineage feat associated with celestials
summary: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.

name: Celestial Strikes
summary: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil.

name: Ceremony of Growth
summary: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.

name: Cloak of Poison
summary: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you.

name: Cobble Dancer
summary: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments.

name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
summary: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for conrasu weapons.

name: Consistent Surge
summary: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly.

name: Continuous Assault
summary: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

name: Core Rejuvenation
summary: Your soul taps into your core's power to push against the grasp of death and allow you to recover consciousness.

name: Crafter's Instinct
summary: You sense a minor flaw in the weapon as you fire it, and quickly adjust your aim on the fly to avoid the flaw.

name: Daywalker
summary: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light.

name: Delver
summary: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water.

name: Dire Form
summary: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast.

name: Disruptive Stare
summary: Your frigid gaze can turn a foe's blood to ice.

name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
summary: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons.

name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
summary: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings.

name: Eldritch Calm
summary: Your fey heritage has altered your mindset to more resemble the uncanny perspective of the fey.

name: Elite Dracomancer
summary: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.

name: Elven Weapon Expertise
summary: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.

name: Enforced Order
summary: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos.

name: Enlarged Chassis
summary: You've empowered your core to support a larger body, granting you size and additional reach.

name: Envenomed Edge
summary: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points.

name: Eternal Memories
summary: You have lived longer than most realize, and due to your many lifetimes of practice you remember almost everything from your previous incarnations now.

name: Explosive Expert
summary: You have continued training in volatile weapons and gained a deeper understanding.

name: Ferocious Beasts
prerequisite: Bonded Animal, animal companion, or Pet; Orc Ferocity
summary: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc’s own blood.

name: Fey Skin
summary: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World.

name: Fiendish Strikes
summary: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack.

name: Finest Trick
summary: Many fiends—rakshasa rajas and demonic succubi most famously—can take on the forms of others.

name: Flame Jump
trait: Aasimar, Concentrate, Divine, Exploration, Fire, Manipulate, Teleportation
summary: Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.

name: Form of the Bat
summary: You can transform into a harmless bat.

name: Formation Master
summary: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies.

name: Fully Flighted
summary: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

name: Genie Weapon Expertise
trait: Ardande, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in falchions, ranseurs, scimitars, tridents, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.

name: Ghoran Weapon Expertise
summary: It's as if you've been training for a thousand years.

name: Gift of the Moon
summary: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.

name: Glamour
summary: You unlock a new level of fey power and can manipulate the perceptions of others using a font of First World magic.

name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
summary: You fight with effortless expertise with gnoll weapons.

name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
summary: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons.

name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
summary: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons.

name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
summary: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons.

name: Hag Magic
summary: Through your heritage, you can replicate a hag’s magic.

name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
summary: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons.

name: Harbinger's Caw
summary: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune.

name: Hatchling Flight
summary: You can fly a little!

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
summary: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.

name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
trait: Azarketi, Concentrate, Manipulate, Primal, Transmutation, Water
summary: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.

name: Idol Threat
summary: You brandish the precious object you're holding menacingly, at once mocking it and threatening its safety.

name: Impose Order (Aphorite)
summary: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order.

name: Impossible Gossip
summary: You can speak to inanimate objects, finding a magical spark within them similar to the one that animated you.

name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
summary: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

name: Incredible Ferocity
summary: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.

name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
summary: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky.

name: Inspirit Hazard
summary: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard.

name: Instinctive Obfuscation
prerequisite: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
summary: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats.

name: Invisible Trickster
summary: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so.

name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
summary: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.

name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
summary: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors.

name: Jinx Glutton
summary: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

name: Kashrishi Revivification
summary: The well of psychic energy held within your mind can exceed the limitations of your physical body.

name: Killing Stone
summary: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.

name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
summary: Your tails show your magical mastery.

name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
summary: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.

name: Lifeblood's Call
summary: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you.

name: Look but Don't Touch
summary: Many flowers are beautiful to look upon but deadly to touch—and you're one of them.

name: Malleable Form
prerequisite: ability to cast at least one polymorph spell
summary: You adroitly shift your form, taking on another appearance.

name: March the Mines
summary: You march through the earth and lead an ally along.

name: Mask of Fear
summary: Your _warmask_ burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension.

name: Metal-Veined Strikes
summary: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.

name: Mischievous Tail
summary: Your tail can bedevil your foes.

name: Mist Strider
summary: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight.

name: Monkey Spirits
summary: Vanaras generally consider the spirits of departed monkeys to be less informative or interesting than their own ancestors traveling the cycles of existence, yet these monkey spirits can prove useful when the situation is dire.

name: Nagaji Spell Expertise
summary: Your magical skill rivals that of accomplished naga spellcasters.

name: None Shall Know
summary: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you.

name: One with Earth
summary: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it.

name: Orc Weapon Expertise
summary: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.

name: Pit of Snakes
summary: Mundane serpents obey your summons.

name: Planar Sidestep
trait: Arcane, Ardande, Concentrate, Conjuration, Ifrit, Oread, Suli, Sylph, Talos, Undine
summary: You shift your body briefly between planes, reducing the damage from your foe's attack.

name: Primal Rampage
summary: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin.

name: Purge Sins
summary: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities.

name: Quick Spring
summary: Ishii Bunji is a skilled tumbler, and learning his technique allows you to propel yourself across the battlefield faster than your enemies can react.

name: Radiant Burst
summary: Your skin glows with intensity.

name: Reanimating Spark
summary: The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive.

name: Redirect Attention
summary: Through your strong connection with your progenitor, you're able to redirect those attempting to spy on you.

name: Rehydration
summary: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air.

name: Reimagine
summary: You can cast _dreaming potential_ as an innate occult spell.

name: Resist Ruin
summary: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need.

name: Revivification Protocol
summary: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you.

name: Scrutinizing Gaze
summary: Your family's traditions of defending against Geb's undead have granted you a sixth sense for detecting spirits, haunts, and other restless dead, no matter their form or the strength of their presence.

name: Secret Eyes
summary: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets.

name: See the Unseen
summary: You notice things that others can't see at all.

name: Shadow Pact
summary: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.

name: Shadow's Assault
summary: Your shadow assaults your foes.

name: Shaitan Skin
summary: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan.

name: Shinstabber
summary: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up.

name: Shory Aerialist
prerequisite: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast _fly_
summary: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.

name: Skeletal Transformation
summary: You rearrange your bones into a bestial shape.

name: Skeleton Commander
summary: You gain the ability to summon your own skeletal minions.

name: Skirt the Light
summary: You can travel the border between the Material and Shadow Planes and even bring others along.

name: Skittering Sneak
summary: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.

name: Slip Sideways
prerequisite: Grimspawn, Pitborn, oHellspawn, or another lineage feat associated with fiends or the Maelstrom
summary: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.

name: Spell Devourer
summary: You don’t just resist magic; you devour it.

name: Spew Tentacles
summary: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.

name: Spiteful Rake
summary: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes.

name: Squirm Free
summary: You're used to slipping out of a bigger creature's grasp or escaping a child's overly enthusiastic hug.

name: Steadfast Ally
summary: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support.

name: Stronger Debilitating Venom
summary: Add one of the following to the debilitations from which you can choose when you Envenom.

name: Stubborn Persistence
summary: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials that would leave others ready to drop.

name: Suli Amir
summary: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.

name: Summon Air Elemental
summary: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Celestial Kin
summary: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally.

name: Summon Earth Elemental
summary: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Fiendish Kin
summary: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.

name: Summon Fire Elemental
summary: You can summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Metal Elemental
summary: You can summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Nephilim Kin
summary: You have a connection to the Outer Planes, allowing you to summon a divine ally.

name: Summon Water Elemental
summary: You can summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Wood Elemental
summary: Your connection to the Plane of Wood allows you to summon elemental allies.

name: Telluric Power
summary: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies.

name: Tengu Weapon Expertise
summary: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons.

name: Thunder God's Fan
summary: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm.

name: Toppling Dance
summary: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain the trip trait, but only against the creature whose space you share.

name: Translucent Skin
summary: Your body is translucent while underwater.

name: Truespeech
summary: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.

name: Unbound Freedom
summary: Your future is no other person's to control, and the cycles of your fate sometimes step in to protect you when that control would be taken from you.

name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
summary: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break.

name: Unconventional Expertise
prerequisite: Unconventional Weaponry; trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry
summary: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.

name: Universal Longevity
summary: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life, so you’re almost never truly untrained at a skill.

name: Unrivaled Builder
summary: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done.

name: Vanara Battle Clarity
summary: Your focus in combat is practically unshakable.

name: Vanara Weapon Expertise
summary: Thanks to numerous joyous practice exercises, you've become an expert in vanara weapons.

name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
summary: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper.

name: Venom Purge
summary: You produce a specialized venom that burns out other toxins and impurities in your body.

name: Very, Very Sneaky
summary: You can move up to your Speed when you use the Sneak action, and you no longer need to have cover or greater cover or be concealed to Hide or Sneak.

name: Vicious Snares
summary: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries.

name: Violent Vines
summary: When angered, you can imbue nearby vines with your wrath, provoking them into a murderous rampage.

name: Vishkanya Weapon Expertise
summary: Extensive training has granted you an elegant control in the use of vishkanyan weapons.

name: Wandering Heart
prerequisite: Arctic Elf, Cavern Elf, Desert Elf, Woodland Elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment
summary: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.

name: War Conditioning
summary: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.

name: Warren Digger
summary: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth.

name: We March On
summary: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling.

name: Webslinger
summary: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.

name: Wooden Mantle
summary: Your connection to the magic of the Plane of Wood allows you to call upon the power of plants and trees to protect yourself.

name: Absorb Spell
prerequisite: Spellmaster Dedication; spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells
summary: You absorb a spell and store it in your body.

name: Airborne Form
summary: Your eidolon can fly.

name: Allegro
summary: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

name: Alloy Flesh and Steel
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Metal, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Elemental energy replaces every cell of your body with raw metal.

name: Anchoring Aura
summary: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

name: Arcane Shroud
summary: Your spell has a powerful aftereffect, briefly granting you a certain spell depending on the spell you cast.

name: Armored Exercise
prerequisite: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
summary: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.

name: Assume Earth's Mantle
summary: Enormous pieces of rock cluster around your body.

name: Aura of Life
summary: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

name: Aura of Preservation
summary: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

name: Aura of Righteousness
summary: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

name: Aura of Vengeance
summary: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

name: Awesome Blow
summary: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

name: Barrier of Boreal Frost
trait: Cold, Impulse, Kineticist, Manipulate, Overflow, Primal, Water
summary: You form an intricate structure of ice, such as a wall of bricks made of packed snow or a screen of enormous icicles.

name: Bizarre Transformation
summary: The forms you take on defy belief—chimerical sights of twisted antlers or acidic drool.

name: Blast Tackle
summary: You throw yourself at an enemy, bracing your weapon against it and pulling it close before releasing a destructive shot.

name: Body of Air
trait: Air, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Polymorph, Primal
summary: Your gathered air consumes your body, leaving only a cloud of living vapor.

name: Bodysnatcher
summary: Your secret-stealing maggots reveal how to devour more than just the flesh and secrets of a victim; you can ingest and assume their whole physical appearance.

name: Bonded Focus
summary: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

name: Borrow Memories
summary: Knowing how someone thinks makes it much easier to know where they'll be, or even replace them altogether.

name: Channeling Block
summary: You pour divine energy into a desperate block.

name: Come at Me!
summary: You're a legendary duelist, welcoming all challengers, enabling you to challenge many foes even while other challenges are active.

name: Concentrated Assault
summary: You and your spotter combine your efforts to bring down your target.

name: Conscious Spell Specialization
summary: You become more adept with the spells that are always in your mind.

name: Consecrated Aura
summary: Your body radiates positive energy, making your very presence disorienting to undead and encouraging them to move away from you.

name: Consume Spell
summary: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

name: Control Tower
summary: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes.

name: Crimson Oath Devotion
summary: You've made the Crimson Oath a part of yourself; you mumble it in your sleep and recite it under your breath as you march.

name: Curse of the Saumen Kar
summary: You activate the runes on your body to create an icy prison around a Huge or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet.

name: Dance of Thunder
summary: Your steps echo with the thunderous retort of exploding black powder as you dance a dance of death.

name: Death's Door
summary: You continue to fight when others would fall.

name: Deep Roots
summary: Your mind-control spells send burrowing mental roots that tear at your target's mind when they're removed or run their course.

name: Defensive Roll
summary: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

name: Deity's Protection
summary: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

name: Desperate Finisher
summary: You throw everything you have into one last, reckless press.

name: Determination
summary: Your training allows you to shrug off your foes’ spells and conditions when the need is dire.

name: Disruptive Blur
summary: You use cacophonous blasts from your gun or distracting shots from your crossbow to cause momentary diversions, letting you move about the battlefield with impunity.

name: Diverse Armor Expert
prerequisite: Champion Dedication; expert in unarmored defense or one or more types of armor
summary: Your proficiency ranks for armor increase to expert.

name: Divine Reflexes
summary: You can use your champion's reaction more.

name: Dormant Eruption
prerequisite: You've been brought to 0 Hit Points by an enemy that has the fire trait or an enemy's ability that has the fire trait.
summary: A sweltering heat and sparks of flame that take the form of tiny copies of you surround your body.

name: Drain Soul Cage
summary: You make your _soul cage_ into your bonded item, allowing you to harness its abundant magical energy.

name: Dream Logic
summary: You can transmit a sense of dreamy nonchalance.

name: Dual Onslaught
summary: When you lash out with both weapons, you leave no room for the target to escape your attack.

name: Earworm
summary: By endlessly repeating a motif, you implant a memorable song that repeats over and over again in your allies’ heads, preparing them to respond to it later.

name: Ebb and Flow
summary: You can pull forth both vitality and the void simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

name: Effortless Captivation
summary: You maintain your innate enchantments and illusions with hardly a thought.

name: Enshroud Soul Cage
summary: You wreathe your _soul cage_ in an ever-growing collection of obfuscating illusions and protective abjurations to hide it from your enemies.

name: Entities from Afar
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: You can call in aberrations to fight for you or to answer questions.

name: Esoteric Reflexes
prerequisite: an implement that grants a reaction
summary: Your bond to your implements is so strong that you can use their reactive abilities almost by instinct.

name: Execution
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Harsh Judgment; Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: You swing wide, attempting to behead your condemned foe.

name: Explosive Death Drop
summary: You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation.

name: Explosive Maneuver
summary: Thanks to a hidden experimental feature you built into your weapon, your weapon explosively deploys levers, tangling hooks, or similar mechanisms to provide significant assistance when you perform a combat maneuver.

name: Fast Channel
summary: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

name: Flamboyant Leap
summary: You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

name: Forceful Shot
summary: Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies.

name: Forestall Curse
summary: You've learned to forestall the effects of your curse somewhat.

name: Form Lock
summary: Your ability to control your own ki empowers you to pressure other creatures into resuming their true forms.

name: Form Lock (Wrestler)
summary: Your ability to manipulate your enemy's body is potent enough that you can tear and break apart alternate forms.

name: Giant's Lunge
summary: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

name: Glib Mutagen
summary: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

name: Grand Talisman Esoterica
summary: You've completed your journey in studying esoteric talismans, gaining the ability to place multiple talismans on an item.

name: Graveshift
summary: The maggots inhabiting your body impart you with the knowledge to travel from grave to grave, drawing upon the mystical power of the labyrinthine network of magical warrens and tunnels that connect Everglut to the Material Plane.

name: Greater Interpose
summary: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

name: Greater Merciful Elixir
summary: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

name: Guiding Finish
summary: Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

name: Guiding Riposte
summary: By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept
prerequisite: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; master in either Arcana or Nature, expert in the other
summary: You refine your halcyon magic.

name: Hammer Quake
summary: You smash the ground with your weapon, knocking nearby creatures to the ground.

name: Hand of the Lich
summary: Negative energy intensifies your undead form and makes your very touch the antithesis of life.

name: Hasted Assault
summary: You can speed yourself up to move and attack more swiftly.

name: Headshot
summary: You attempt to finish your target with a final, well-placed shot.

name: Impaling Thrust
summary: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

name: Impossible Riposte
summary: Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

name: Improved Hijack Undead
summary: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
summary: Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

name: Incredible Recollection
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76</row>
summary: You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace.

name: Innocent Butterfly
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 78</row>
summary: You know how to alter the perceptions of others.

name: Instant Opening
summary: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

name: Instinctual Interception
summary: You react to movement with hardly a thought, seeming constantly poised to spring.

name: Interweave Dispel
summary: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

name: Iron Lung
summary: Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron.

name: Ironblood Surge
summary: You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

name: It Was Me All Along!
prerequisite: Alter Ego Dedication or Vigilante Dedication
summary: You discard a disguise and dramatically reveal your true identity, catching your foes off guard.

name: Keep up the Good Fight
summary: Your devotion to helping others and doing good keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds.

name: Lasting Armament
summary: When you sanctify a weapon, it remains sanctified for an extended period.

name: Leave An Opening
summary: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

name: Litany of Depravity
summary: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

name: Litany of Righteousness
summary: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

name: Mist Escape
summary: As you fall, your body reacts to defend itself.

name: Mountain Quake
summary: You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you and causing quakes.

name: Murderer's Circle
summary: Circle your foe while you beat on them.

name: Mysterious Repertoire
summary: Your mystery holds unknowable depths of magic not always associated with the divine.

name: Night's Warning
summary: Portents written in the night sky show you how to avoid an attack.

name: Nourishing Gate
summary: You can sustain yourself on a single drop of elemental dew or the slightest spark from the Plane of Fire.

name: Opening Stance (Fighter)
summary: At the first sign of trouble, often before you consciously realize the danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought.

name: Orchard's Endurance
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Plant, Primal, Stance, Wood
summary: Patches of bark appear on the skin of you and your nearby allies.

name: Pact of Eldritch Eyes
summary: You've sworn a pact with an entity beyond mortal comprehension, granting you distant visions and insights.

name: Paragon Companion
summary: Your construct companion has reached the pinnacle of form and function.

name: Paragon Reanimated Companion
summary: You have reached the pinnacle of necromantic science, creating a mechanical zombie unlike any the world has seen before.

name: Path of Iron
