summary: With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them.

name: Patron’s Presence
summary: Your patron can direct its attention through your familiar, and its mere presence becomes an ominous weight on the minds of other beings to distract them and blot out their magic.

name: Peculiar Anatomy
summary: Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood.

name: Perfect Finisher
summary: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

name: Perfect Ki Exemplar
summary: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: _unblinking flame emblem_ for Unblinking Flame, _unbreaking wave barrier_ for Unbreaking Waves, _unfolding wind blitz_ for Unfolding Wind, or _untwisting iron augmentation_ for Untwisting Iron.

name: Phase Bullet
summary: You can aim your bullets not just in three normal dimensions, but in additional dimensions as well, allowing you to fire a magical shot that phases through everything but your target.

name: Pin to the Spot
summary: Strike a foe and restrain them.

name: Pivot Strike
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 75</row>
summary: You Leap and then Strike using your staff.

name: Plot the Future
summary: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

name: Prayer Attack
summary: You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis.

name: Premonition of Clarity
summary: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

name: Preternatural Parry
summary: You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second.

name: Purifying Breeze
summary: You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins.

name: Ranged Disarm
summary: When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands.

name: Rapid Reattunement
summary: You spend 10 minutes realigning your elemental connections in an elemental trance.

name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisite: Untamed Form; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
summary: You transform reflexively when in danger.

name: Reflect Spell
summary: When you successfully use Counterspell to counteract a spell that affects targeted creatures or an area, you can turn that spell’s effect back on its caster.

name: Reset the Past
summary: You manipulate time to recharge one of your temporal techniques—by revising your past so you never used it in the first place.

name: Resilient Shell
summary: Your eidolon is resilient against attacks.

name: Resolute Defender
summary: You hold your shield together with the power of your faith and conviction, refusing to let wood splinter and steel shatter until the day's battles are won.

name: Rites of Transfiguration
summary: You can adapt your patron’s power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims.

name: Sacral Monarch
prerequisite: Sacral Lord; Master in Occultism or Master in Religion
summary: You have come into your full powers and are truly a monarch of your realm, by your own definition at least.

name: Secondary Detonation Array
summary: You divert some of your spell’s energy into an unstable runic array.

name: Seeker Arrow
summary: Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target.

name: Seize
summary: You seize your foe and pull it close.

name: Sense the Unseen
summary: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues, such as their minute movements or the shifting of air currents on your skin.

name: Sepulchral Sublimation
trait: Cleric, Concentrate, Metamagic, Necromancy, Oracle, Uncommon, Wizard
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: You repurpose the negative energy that flows through your minions at a moment's notice.

name: Shadow Power
summary: You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast.

name: Shadow's Web
summary: You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place.

name: Shape of the Cloud Dragon
summary: You've discovered how to transform yourself into a cloud dragon.

name: Shape of the Dragon
summary: You've discovered how to transform yourself into a dragon.

name: Share Eidolon Magic
summary: Your eidolon shares innate spells with you.

name: Shared Prey
summary: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

name: Shatter Space
summary: The sheer power of your magic fractures reality.

name: Shift Spell
summary: You move an active spell's area to a new location.

name: Shifting Terrain
prerequisite: Rough Terrain Stance; Master in Nature
summary: You slam your fist into the ground or twirl your arms about to cause the terrain around you to shift and ripple, potentially throwing others off balance.

name: Showstopper
summary: Your twirling weapons create a grand distraction that's difficult to look away from.

name: Signature Synergy
summary: Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies.

name: Sink and Swim
prerequisite: You've been brought to 0 Hit Points by an enemy that has the water trait or an enemy's ability that has the water trait.
summary: Your body looks like it's made of flowing water, clear and pristine, providing a natural grace to all your movements.

name: Sixth Pillar Mastery
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 223, Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 77</row>
summary: You align your magical and physical potential.

name: Soaring Armor
summary: You've managed to free your innovation from the bonds of gravity!

name: Soothing Ballad
summary: You soothe your allies’ wounds with the power of performance.

name: Sow Spell
summary: You fold your spell into a seed.

name: Specialized Beastmaster Companion
summary: Your nimble and savage animal companions become cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability.

name: Specialized Megafauna Companion
summary: You've trained your mammoth or other megafauna companion to perform in unusual or extreme situations, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind.

name: Specialized Mount
summary: You've trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind.

name: Speedy Rituals
summary: You can perform rituals in only a fraction of the usual time.

name: Spell Shroud
summary: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

name: Spell-Repelling Form
summary: Your eidolon evolves to protect itself from the danger posed by spells.

name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
summary: You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way.

name: Spirit Guide Form
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars pg. 83</row>
summary: You fuse with your spirit guide, becoming a hybrid being with enhanced physical and spiritual power.

name: Starlight Armor
summary: You armor yourself in the light of distant suns, shielding yourself from harm.

name: Stay Down!
summary: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

name: Stealthy Companion
summary: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

name: Stone Communion
summary: You can speak Terran and speak with stones.

name: Strategic Bypass
summary: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow.

name: Sunder Enchantment
summary: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

name: Superior Bond
summary: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

name: Swift Banishment
summary: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

name: Tactical Cadence
summary: Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively.

name: Talismanic Sage
summary: You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known.

name: Tangled Forest Rake
summary: You reposition foes with raking attacks.

name: Target of Opportunity
summary: You capitalize on your ally's attack to create a coordinated barrage.

name: Targeting Shot
summary: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

name: Terrain Shield
summary: You're so attuned to the land that it rises up to protect you from a potentially fatal blow in a seeming coincidence.

name: Terrible Transformation
summary: You let out a mighty roar as part of your transformation.

name: Thwart Evil
summary: You react instinctively when you sense evil forming, thrusting your spiritual energy toward the source to snuff out evil before it fully manifests.

name: Timeless Body
summary: You cease aging.

name: Timeless Nature
summary: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

name: Tongue of Sun and Moon
summary: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

name: Trespass Teleportation
summary: You can hunt your foe to the ends of creation.

name: Triggerbrand Blitz
summary: You dance through your foes, stabbing and shooting.

name: Triumphant Inspiration
summary: With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies.

name: True Debilitating Bomb
summary: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

name: True Hypercognition
summary: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
summary: You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Two-Weapon Flurry
summary: Using the momentum of your prior attack, you lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy.

name: Two-Weapon Fusillade
summary: You attack with both your weapons in a furious barrage.

name: Unending Emptiness
summary: You pool the power of shadow within your eyes, gaining the ability to gather darkness into a turbulent orb of crushing emptiness within your line of sight.

name: Unlimited Ghost Flight
summary: You put your connection to the material world farther behind you.

name: Unstable Redundancies
summary: You've built triple redundancies into your innovation and added all sorts of buffers to protect it from the harm of your unstable experiments.

name: Vengeful Strike
summary: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

name: Verdant Metamorphosis
summary: You have turned into a plant version of yourself, gaining the plant trait and losing traits inappropriate for your new form (typically humanoid).

name: Vigorous Anthem
summary: You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack.

name: Walk Through the Conflagration
trait: Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal, Teleportation
summary: You fall through your own kinetic gate, leaving behind an effigy of flame and reappearing majestically near another fire.

name: Warden's Guidance
summary: You convey your prey’s location to your allies with a series of careful words or gestures.

name: Whirling Blade Stance
summary: You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

name: Whirling Knockdown
summary: You fire your gun while throwing off a target's balance with your melee weapon.

name: Whirlwind Strike
summary: You lash out in a blur of motion, attacking all nearby adversaries.

name: Wild Winds Gust
summary: You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind.

name: Wind-Tossed Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover.

name: Wind-Tossed Spell
summary: You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover.

name: Winter's Kiss
summary: Whether in the heart of a volcanic passageway or the glacial tundras of the Crown of the World, the only temperature you ever personally experience is an oddly comfortable chill.

name: Worm Form
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You take on the form of a purple worm or transform into a humanoid-worm hybrid, retaining your own head but with a worm's body, transforming into a Huge battle form.

name: Wyrmbane Aura
summary: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

name: Cloud Jump
summary: Jump impossible distances

name: Craft Anything
summary: Ignore most requirements for crafting items

name: Divine Guidance
summary: Find guidance in the writings of your faith

name: Legendary Codebreaker
summary: Quickly Decipher Writing using Society

name: Legendary Guide
summary: Increase your party’s travel speed through wilderness terrain

name: Legendary Linguist
summary: Create pidgin languages to communicate with anyone

name: Legendary Medic
summary: Remove disease, blinded, deafened, doomed, or drained

name: Legendary Negotiation
summary: Quickly parley with foes

name: Legendary Performer
summary: Gain renown for your Performance

name: Legendary Professional
summary: Gain renown for your Lore

name: Legendary Sneak
summary: Hide and Sneak without cover or being concealed

name: Legendary Survivalist
summary: Survive extreme conditions

name: Legendary Tattoo Artist
summary: Your craftsmanship at decorating flesh is unparalleled.

name: Legendary Thief
summary: Steal what would normally be impossible to steal

name: Reveal Machinations
summary: You convince a creature that you played a minor but recurring role in its life.

name: Scare to Death
summary: Scare a target so much, they might die

name: Unified Theory
summary: Use Arcana for checks for all magical traditions

name: Adamantine Fists
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown pg. 82</row>
summary: You imbue your unarmed strikes with one of the strongest metals.

name: Advanced Runic Mind-Smithing
summary: Your mind can hold onto more complicated patterns than ever before.

name: Auspicious Mount
summary: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

name: Avalanche Strike
summary: You attack all nearby adversaries.

name: Blank Slate
summary: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful magic that could spy on you.

name: Bolster Soul Cage
summary: Your constant efforts to augment and perfect your _soul cage_ have bolstered its efficiency.

name: Bound in Ice
summary: You become a hybrid of your ancestry and a saumen kar.

name: Breath of Hungry Death
trait: Acid, Archetype, Divine, Incapacitation, Necromancy, Occult, Rare
summary: You have uncovered occult mysteries that allow you to unleash the devastating hunger of Kabriri upon your foes with a single exhalation, releasing a massive cloud of flesh-eating gas that glows with a sickly green light.

name: Chemical Contagion
summary: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

name: Cloud Step
summary: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

name: Cognitive Loophole
summary: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

name: Collateral Thrash
summary: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

name: Constant Levitation
summary: Your power has unbound you from the earth below.

name: Controlled Bullet
summary: You create a direct magical connection with your beast gun, allowing you to guide the beast gun's next shot by taking control of the projectile directly.

name: Converge
summary: Informing your ally of an opening created by your shot, you coordinate to set them up to hit the target at the same time.

name: Courageous Onslaught
summary: You use your performance to orchestrate an onslaught against your enemies.

name: Cross the Threshold
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 79</row>
summary: You can cast ethereal jaunt as an occult innate spell once per day.

name: Deadly Grace
summary: Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

name: Deflecting Cloud
prerequisite: Dragon Disciple Dedication; _dragon wings_ sorcerer bloodline spell
summary: You've mastered a defensive technique unique to the ancient dragons of Bloodsalt: beating your wings to create a billowing cloud of mist.

name: Didactic Strike
summary: When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

name: Disciple's Breath
prerequisite: Dragon Disciple Dedication; _dragon breath_ sorcerer bloodline spell
summary: You unleash your breath weapon without spending focus.

name: Dispelling Slice
summary: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

name: Dispelling Spellstrike
summary: The spell you deliver tries to force out magic affecting your enemy.

name: Diverse Mystery
summary: You have broadened your understanding of the divine and can tap into the wonders of a different mystery.

name: Dominating Gaze
summary: You stare into your target's eyes and enthrall them, shattering their free will.

name: Dragon Transformation
trait: Barbarian, Concentrate, Polymorph, Primal, Rage, Transmutation
summary: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

name: Effortless Concentration
trait: Bard, Druid, Sorcerer, Summoner, Witch, Wizard
summary: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Electric Counter
summary: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.

name: Enlightened Presence
summary: You exude an aura of resolve.

name: Eternal Bane
summary: Your life has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

name: Eternal Blessing
summary: Your deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

name: Eternal Elixir
summary: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

name: Ever-Vigilant Senses
summary: Your eidolon has enhanced senses.

name: Expand Aura
prerequisite: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
summary: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

name: Exploitive Bomb
summary: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

name: Fatal Bullet
summary: You're especially talented at striking your enemies in their most vulnerable areas.

name: Fearsome Fangs
summary: Your claws and jaws are brutally powerful and efficient, even by ursine standards.

name: Felicitous Riposte
summary: You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

name: Fey Life
prerequisite: You helped to save a fey from a terrible fate, and you're not a fey.
summary: There are some fates worse than death–and you worked to save a fey from one such fate.

name: Flinging Blow
summary: You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

name: Focus Ally
summary: You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight.

name: Fulminating Synergy
summary: When you draw upon your spells’ synergy, you create a physical manifestation of their magical resonance and invoke it to harm a foe.

name: Furious Vengeance
summary: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

name: Genius Mutagen
summary: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

name: Giant Slayer
summary: Your well-placed blows can fell mighty giants.

name: Graceful Poise
summary: With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion’s stinger.

name: Greater Distracting Shot
summary: Even a single missile can throw off your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

name: Greater Mental Evolution
summary: Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

name: Greater Snow Step
summary: You can't be impeded by environmental effects that rely on cold or its byproducts.

name: Greater Vital Evolution
summary: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

name: Hair Trigger
prerequisite: initial deed that allows you to Interact to draw a weapon
summary: No one can react faster than you can pull your trigger.

name: Impaling Briars
summary: You can fill an area with devastating briars.

name: Imperious Aura
prerequisite: one or more stance impulses that affect your kinetic aura
summary: Your glowing and majestic kinetic aura marks you as a true child of the elements.

name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
summary: It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

name: Implement's Flight
summary: By weakening your relation to the ground and strengthening your relation to the sky, you've learned to soar through the air, your implement carrying you as surely as any broomstick or pestle.

name: Improved Reflexive Shield
summary: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
summary: At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to perform a Twin Riposte.

name: Instant Return
summary: With a single fluid gesture, you catch a projectile out of the air, load it in your weapon, and shoot it back at the attacker.

name: Instrument of Slaughter
summary: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

name: Instrument of Zeal
summary: Divine energy fills your weapon.

name: Just the Thing!
summary: Need to balance on a razor's edge, force open an iron door, or persuade a dragon to negotiate? Never fear! No matter the situation, you always have just the thing.

name: Lead the Pack
prerequisite: Mature Beastmaster Companion; you have multiple animal companions
summary: You can have up to two animal companions active at once.

name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisite: Legendary in Nature; Master Monster Hunter
summary: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

name: Master Captivator Spellcasting
summary: You master the most powerful spells that enchant and deceive.

name: Master Siege Engineer
summary: What you don't know about artillery isn't worth knowing and your mastery allows you to perform an impossible number of actions as part of a siege weapon's crew.

name: Master Skysage Divination
summary: You unlock the most powerful secrets hidden in the stars above.

name: Master of Many Styles
summary: You move between stances in an unceasing dance.

name: Master of Many Styles
summary: You move fluidly between stances, using your mastery of combat to always adopt the best tactics.

name: Master's Counterspell
prerequisite: Spellmaster Dedication; master in spell attack rolls and spell DCs
summary: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

name: Medusa's Wrath
summary: You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze.

name: Mobile Magical Combat
summary: You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon.

name: Monstrosity Shape
summary: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

name: Multishot Stance
summary: You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

name: One-Millimeter Punch
summary: Your punches have incredible force and control.

name: Opportune Throw
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On pg. 74</row>
summary: Make a ranged attack with a Juggled item against a vulnerable creature.

name: Overwhelming Blow
summary: You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

name: Penetrating Projectile
summary: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

name: Perfect Distraction
summary: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away.

name: Performance Weapon Expert
prerequisite: Provocator Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
summary: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons.

name: Persistent Boost
summary: Your innovation sets foes on fire, covers them in acid, leaves barbed thorns behind, or otherwise deals persistent damage to your foes that sticks around long after you deliver your boosted attack.

name: Persistent Mutagen
summary: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

name: Phase Arrow
summary: You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target.

name: Portentous Spell
summary: Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

name: Purge of Moments
summary: All things eventually end, a truth that you can put into practice by accelerating your passage through time to shake off harmful effects.

name: Quickened Attunement
summary: If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

name: Quivering Palm
summary: Your strikes can kill foes.

name: Rebounding Smite
summary: The energy from your smite persists for a moment, allowing you to pass it to a new target.

name: Reconstruct The Scene
summary: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

name: Remediate
summary: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

name: Resounding Cascade
summary: When you enter your Arcane Cascade, you disperse the magical reinforcement to nearby allies.

name: Resounding Finale
summary: You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds.

name: Resurrectionist
summary: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

name: Resuscitate
summary: You can use Medicine to resuscitate the dead.

name: Ricochet Master
summary: You have an eye for angles and can find shots that others believe are impossible.

name: Scintillating Spell
summary: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

name: Seven-Part Link
summary: Many traditions hold the number seven as significant.

name: Sever Magic
summary: You apply a frayed thread, a pinch of fulu ash, or a similar undone charm to your weapon, and swing to break a spell.

name: Shared Dream
summary: You've learned to create a shared dreamscape to communicate with others.

name: Shattering Blows
summary: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
summary: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike.

name: Shield of Grace
summary: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

name: Siphon Power
summary: You draw upon the reservoir of your patron’s magic that resides within your familiar.

name: Song of Grace and Speed
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 79</row>
summary: You instill great swiftness into your allies.

name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
summary: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Spell Gem
summary: Inspired by the degenerate demiliches your kind sometimes devolves into, you've embedded a gem into your brow, fusing it to your necrotic flesh.

name: Spell Tinker
summary: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

name: Steal Spell
summary: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

name: Stone Body
summary: Emulating the great defenders throughout dwarven history, you close your mind to the sensation of pain, becoming as resolute as stone itself.

name: Studious Capacity
summary: Your continued study of occult magic has increased your magical capacity, allowing you to cast spells even when it seems impossible.

name: Stunning Appearance
summary: Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond.

name: Swift Elusion
summary: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe’s Reflex DC.

name: Target of Psychic Ire
summary: Your magic saturates your surroundings with hateful psychic energy.

name: Terraforming Spell
summary: You capture transformative fragments of magic and slam them into the ground, creating a shock wave that alters your surroundings.

name: Touch Focus
source: <row gap="tiny">Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover pg. 223, Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight! pg. 77</row>
summary: You can redirect a spell's power through you to deliver it within striking distance.

name: Trample
summary: Your eidolon Strides up to double its Speed and can move through the spaces of creatures at least one size smaller, Trampling each creature whose space it enters.

name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
summary: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Ubiquitous Snares
summary: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

name: Unwind Death
summary: Combining necromancy with the mysterious temporal powers of clockwork, you wind a creature backward from the moment of its death.

name: Uplifting Winds
summary: The winds are eager to keep you aloft.

name: Vessel's Form
summary: You symbiotically combine your form with that of the entity within you, taking a powerful hybrid form to temporarily boost your abilities in combat while maintaining control.

name: Walk on the Wind
prerequisite: You've been brought to 0 Hit Points by an enemy that has the air trait or an enemy's ability that has the air trait.
summary: A flighty breeze follows you wherever you go, granting a dramatic flair to everything you do.

name: Wandering Thoughts
summary: When your Psyche is Unleashed, each burst of magic you cast also folds space around you, and you travel through one of those folds.

name: Ward Mind
summary: To protect the knowledge within your mind from intrusion or erasure, you ward yourself against a mental attack.

name: Warden’s Reload
summary: Your mastery of magic and weapons like the crossbow allow you to wield both with equal ease.

name: Wave the Flag
trait: Archetype, Emotion, Flourish, Mental, Uncommon, Visual
summary: You wave your banner, inspiring allies to throw off the shackles of fear.

name: Withstand Death
summary: Through repeated exposure, you've trained to resist the damage wrought by undead.

name: You Failed to Account for… This!
summary: When your foes try to attack you, you always seem to have some outlandish invention you can pull out at the last second to protect you from whatever attack they throw at you.

name: Animal Shape
summary: You have full control over your shape and can transform into your inherent animal.

name: Animal Swiftness
summary: You move like an animal.

name: Axial Recall
summary: You have reconfigured the magical resonance of your core to attune to the planar energies of Axis.

name: Azaersi's Roads
summary: Azaersi has granted you limited access to the Stone Roads, attuning you to the tiniest sliver of the _Onyx Key_.

name: Bend Space
summary: Not even space itself is a match for the unleashed power of your mind.

name: Blazing Aura
summary: You explode in flame.

name: Bone Rider
summary: Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes.

name: Bone Swarm
summary: You scatter your body and transform into a whirling storm of bones for up to 1 minute or until you spend a single action to return to your normal shape.

name: Boneyard's Call
summary: You have a powerful connection to the Boneyard and its courts, granting you the ability to travel to and from the Boneyard.

name: Breath of Calamity
summary: Your roar shakes the earth and splits the heavens.

name: Cantorian Restoration
summary: The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times.

name: Celestial Word
summary: You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes.

name: Ceremony of Sun's Gift
summary: Your connection to the sun has become an unbreakable bond.

name: Channel the Godmind
summary: You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings.

name: Cleansing Light
summary: A burst of light from your horn cleanses your allies of ailments and sends your foes reeling.

name: Core Cannon
summary: Your body transforms into a powerful magical cannon.

name: Crone's Cruelty
summary: Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you.

name: Divine Declaration
summary: You can call forth a holy or unholy word from the realms beyond to punish your foes.

name: Dominion Aura
summary: For a short time, you fully manifest the expectations of the god destroyer within you.

name: Elude Trouble
summary: You slip through your foe's opening.

name: Eternal Wings
summary: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)
summary: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
summary: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

name: Favor of Heaven
summary: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side.

name: Fey Transcendence
summary: You become a powerful fey creature, gaining strengths tied to the First World but also some of the weakness against which all fey must contend.

name: Fiendish Word
summary: You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.

name: Final Form
trait: Concentrate, Divine, Evocation, Morph, Tiefling, Transmutation
summary: You embrace your monstrous blood and make it your own, screaming out to the heavens and hells alike in rage, pain, and defiance.

name: Flourish and Ruin
summary: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes.

name: Forge-Blessed Shot
summary: You intone a prayer to the dwarven deities Torag or Angradd, willing a higher power to guide your aim in the heat of battle.

name: Fountain of Secrets
summary: You constantly remember details about the world.

name: Ghoran's Wrath
summary: You have such a strong connection to the natural world that you can inspire it to attack at those who threaten you.

name: Great Tengu Form
summary: You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

name: Greater Augmentation
summary: You've greatly improved your abilities and your core can support further augmentations.

name: Greater Enhance Venom
summary: You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with Envenom to greater vishkanyan venom.

name: Hero's Wings
summary: You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential.

name: Heroic Presence
summary: The blood of heroes courses through your veins, and you inspire your allies to dig deep and find a new level of resolve.

name: Homeward Bound
summary: The connection between you and the First World resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between the Universe and the First World.

name: Hurricane Swing
summary: Choose either _lightning bolt_ or _gust of wind_.

name: Magic Rider
summary: Your people used powerful magic to travel between distant worlds in the distant past, and the remnants of that magic make such transportation easier for you.

name: Metallic Skin
summary: You fortify your natural resistances with elemental metal, covering your skin with thick metal.

name: Necromantic Heir
summary: Your affinity for negative energy spills outward and grants you a refilling well of necromantic essence.

name: Olethros's Decree
summary: You have a connection to olethroses, the enigmatic psychopomps who successfully swayed the yamaraj to permit the creation of the first duskwalkers.

name: Pierce the Light
summary: You tear the veil between the Material Plane and its shadow.

name: Prismatic Scales
summary: You can cause your scales to glow with scintillating, many-hued colors, protecting you from energy while dazzling foes.

name: Radiate Glory
summary: Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

name: Rallying Cry
summary: You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat.

name: Rampaging Ferocity
summary: You lash out viciously even as you fend off death.

name: Rampaging Form
prerequisite: Change Shape with a fox alternate form
summary: Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level _animal form_ and 7th-level _fiery body_ for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

name: Ratfolk Growth
summary: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle.

name: Reckless Abandon
summary: Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions.

name: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
summary: Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions.

name: Reflect Foe
summary: You create a copy of a foe by calling them forth from a nearby reflection, clonally growing them in an instant from one of your hairs or otherwise creating them in a way that matches your own nature as a reflection.

name: Regrowth
summary: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds.

name: Relentless Wings
summary: Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology.

name: Reliable Luck
summary: You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity.

name: Restitch
summary: You've learned how to sew even the most terrible tears and wounds together.

name: Scion Transformation
summary: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis.

name: Shadow Self
summary: You slip from your adversaries' notice and appear to be somewhere else.

name: Soaring Form
summary: Your wings grow stronger.

name: Soaring Poppet
summary: Your construction has flaps of cloth or wicker that can keep you aloft.

name: Stone Form
summary: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental.

name: Stonegate
summary: Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress.

name: Stonewall
summary: The strength of stone overcomes you so strongly that it replaces your stout body.

name: Storm Form
summary: You can transform into an elemental.

name: Stormy Heart
summary: The elemental power in your blood is a raging storm.

name: Symphony of Blood
summary: You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor.

name: Ten Lives
summary: When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check.

name: Tidal Shield
summary: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

name: Trickster Tengu
summary: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure.

name: True Gaze
summary: When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones.

name: Twist Healing
summary: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims.

name: Underwater Volcano
summary: You can cast _volcanic eruption_ as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

name: Unfettering Prankster
summary: You can uplift all around you with your pranks, causing you and your allies to receive divine guidance in all your movements to effortlessly avoid environmental hindrances.

name: Vicious Venom
summary: The venom you produce is exceptionally potent and difficult to overcome.

name: Wood Ward
summary: With a sweep of your hand, vines and roots burst from the ground along the edge of your space between you and the attacker, creating a natural lattice of wood that grants standard cover.

name: Wyrmling Flight
summary: Your draconic wings have grown large and strong enough for flight.

name: Yamaraj's Grandeur
summary: You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all.

name: All Shall End in Flames
trait: Death, Fire, Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Primal
summary: White-hot fire consumes everything in a cataclysmic sphere of death.

name: All in my Head
summary: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

name: All in your Head
summary: Flames scouring at your body, venom coursing through your veins—you refuse to believe they exist, and nothing can affect you if you don't believe in it.

name: Arrow of Death
summary: You modify an arrow or bolt to bring death to your target in a single potent hit.

name: Beasts of Slumbering Steel
summary: You conjure metal elemental mounts made of interlocking metal pieces.

name: Black Powder Embodiment
summary: You infuse your entire being into a single shot, merging your body into the blast and enabling you to travel the same path as your bolt or bullet.

name: Blaze of Revelation
summary: Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

name: Bloodline Wellspring
summary: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

name: Brutal Critical
summary: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

name: Call the Worm
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #194: Cult of the Cave Worm pg. 81</row>
summary: You gain _summon animal_, heightened to 9th level, as an innate primal spell that you can cast once per day, but can only summon a purple worm.

name: Celestial Form
summary: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

name: Conflux Wellspring
summary: You've achieved perfect magical and physical balance, allowing magic to flow into and through you more easily.

name: Cranial Detonation
summary: As your overwhelming psyche fells a creature, you use its flickering consciousness to detonate psychic energy from the creature's head.

name: Crowned in Tempest's Fury
trait: Air, Electricity, Impulse, Kineticist, Primal, Stance
summary: You become one with a devastating thunderstorm from the Plane of Air, placing a crown of lightning upon your brow.

name: Deep Lore
summary: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

name: Deepest Wellspring
summary: You've glimpsed the furthest recesses of your mind.

name: Devastating Weaponry
summary: You release a volley of projectiles from your weapon, or power it to fly in every direction across the battlefield and Strike multiple creatures.

name: Diamond Fists
summary: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

name: Discordant Voice
summary: Your courageous anthem lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies’ attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

name: Divine Apex
summary: You can pour divine power into an item, letting the wearer exceed their limits.

name: Divine Effusion
summary: The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

name: Domain Wellspring
summary: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

name: Echoing Channel
summary: When you pull forth vitality or void energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

name: Echoing Spell
summary: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

name: Effortless Reach
summary: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic.

name: Elemental Apotheosis
summary: You take on an elemental countenance, appearing like a type of elemental of your element.

name: Empty Body
summary: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

name: Engine of Destruction
summary: Your construct unleashes a broad swath of devastation by separating its limbs, deploying hidden armaments, or using a similar technique to wreak havoc.

name: Eternal Composition
summary: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

name: Ever Dreaming
summary: You draw no distinction between the sleeping and waking worlds.

name: Fiendish Form
summary: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

name: Final Shot
summary: You jam a triple charge of black powder into your weapon to unleash a devastating but risky and inaccurate attack.

name: Frightful Aura
summary: You're surrounded by a palpable sense of menace and power that's terrifying to behold.

name: Grand Scroll Esoterica
summary: You've completed the third and final step in your assimilation of scroll esoterica, granting you daily scrolls of incredible power.

name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
summary: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
prerequisite: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept; legendary in either Arcana or Nature, master in the other
summary: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched.

name: Hell of 1,000,000 Needles
summary: The landscape fills with monumental filaments of metal.

name: Hex Wellspring
summary: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

name: Ignite the Sun
summary: The fires of creation become yours to control.

name: Implausible Infiltration
summary: You find tiny imperfections and somehow fit yourself through them, possibly moving directly through the wall or floor.

name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
summary: You can use Prescient Planner even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can Interact to draw the item as a single action instead of a 2-action activity.

name: Implement's Assault
summary: Your implement supercharges your weapon to shoot an impossible volley or carve through your foes.

name: Impossible Flurry
summary: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

name: Impossible Polymath
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, or Trained in Religion; Esoteric Polymath
summary: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions that other bards don’t understand.

name: Impossible Volley
summary: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

name: Improbable Elixirs
summary: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

name: Improved Swift Banishment
summary: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

name: Incredible Luck
summary: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

name: Infinite Expanse of Bluest Heaven
trait: Air, Illusion, Impulse, Kineticist, Mental, Overflow, Primal, Visual
summary: An illusion of a limitless expanse with an impossibly blue sky makes all within feel the sensation of falling...

name: Infinite Possibilities
summary: You can prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

name: Intense Implement
summary: You have an exceptional link to your third implement.

name: Inviolable
summary: Your deity punishes creatures that harm you.

name: Invoke Disaster
summary: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

name: Ki Center
prerequisite: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
summary: You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power.

name: Ki Form
summary: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air.

name: Lead Investigator
summary: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

name: Lethal Finisher
summary: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

name: Link Wellspring
summary: Your bond replenishes your focus.

name: Look Again
summary: If your illusions or enchantments fail to ensnare the minds of others, you can cast them again.

name: Magical Master
summary: Your eidolon gains a bevy of lower-level spells.

name: Manifold Edge
summary: You’ve learned to leverage every possible edge.

name: Master Bard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Bard Spellcasting; Legendary in Occultism
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Beast Gunner Spellcasting
summary: You've learned the final truth of beast guns, making you a master in the magic they grant you.

name: Master Cathartic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Cleric Spellcasting; Legendary in Religion
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Druid Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Druid Spellcasting; Legendary in Nature
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Magus Spellcasting
summary: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Oracle Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Oracle Spellcasting; Legendary in Religion
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Psychic Spellcasting
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Scroll Cache
summary: Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster.

name: Master Snowcasting
summary: You have unlocked the deeper magic of your _gelid shard_, gaining access to new levels of spells.

name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Master Spellcasting
summary: You gain the master spellcasting archetype benefits.

name: Master Summoner Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Summoner Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
summary: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Witch Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Witch Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisite: Expert Wizard Spellcasting; Legendary in Arcana
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Masterful Companion
summary: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

name: Meditative Wellspring
summary: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

name: Mighty Bear
summary: The power of the bear within you can expand your physical presence even further.

name: Mighty Dragon Shape
summary: You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often.

name: Mighty Wings
prerequisite: Dragon Disciple Dedication; _dragon wings_ sorcerer bloodline spell
summary: Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

name: Mindblank Mutagen
summary: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

name: Miracle Worker
summary: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

name: Miraculous Flight
summary: With superior engineering and magical application, you have freed your signature vehicle from the bonds of gravity, allowing it to soar through the sky like a dragon.

name: Miraculous Possibility
summary: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

name: Negate Damage
summary: Your armor innovation activates various devices you prepared ahead of time, and you use one of them to reduce the damage you would take by 15.

name: Parry and Riposte
summary: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

name: Patron’s Claim
summary: Your patron partially manifests itself through your familiar to claim a foe’s power for its own.

name: Perfect Clarity
summary: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

name: Perfect Debilitation
summary: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

name: Perfect Form Control
summary: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate shapes indefinitely.

name: Perfect Ki Grandmaster
prerequisite: Perfect Ki Expert or Perfect Ki Exemplar
summary: You gain an appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: _unblinking flame ignition_ for Unblinking Flame, _unbreaking wave containment_ for Unbreaking Waves, _unfolding wind crash_ for Unfolding Wind, or _untwisting iron pillar_ for Untwisting Iron.

name: Perfect Shot
summary: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

name: Piercing Critical
summary: Your attacks with your preferred weapons deal especially devastating wounds.

name: Powerful Sneak
summary: You’ve learned to exploit your enemies’ openings.

name: Primal Aegis
summary: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

name: Primal Wellspring
summary: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

name: Reach for the Stars
summary: The sky's the limit, as long as you've got enough black powder.

name: Rebirth in Living Stone
trait: Earth, Impulse, Kineticist, Polymorph, Primal, Stance
summary: Rock overflows from within you to consume your form before cracking open to reveal your body transformed into living stone.

name: Rejuvenating Touch
summary: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

name: Reprepare Spell
summary: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

name: Retain Absorbed Spell
summary: When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly—potentially for a greater period of time.

name: Ride the Tsunami
summary: Booming, crashing walls of water, enough to fill a harbor, smash out ahead of you, overwhelming all in their path.

name: Rouse the Forest's Fury
trait: Impulse, Kineticist, Overflow, Plant, Primal, Wood
summary: Terrifying trees attack your enemies.

name: Savage Critical
summary: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

name: School Spell Redirection
summary: When you Counterspell a spell with a school matching your specialization, if you critically succeed at your counteract check, or if you succeed while using a spell of a higher level than the spell you countered, you can redirect the spell you countered.

name: Second Thoughts
summary: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

name: Shadow Hunter
summary: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

name: Shadow Master
summary: The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

name: Shared Clarity
summary: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

name: Smash from the Air
summary: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

name: Soaring Dynamo
summary: You've built clockwork wings or jets into your dynamo, allowing you to use your prosthesis to fly.

name: Specialized Companion
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God pg. 76</row>
summary: Your animal companion gains a specialization.

name: Split Hex
summary: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

name: Stave Off Catastrophe
summary: You fully protect your allies from the worst blows.

name: Swift River
summary: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

name: Terrifying Countenance
source: <row gap="tiny">Night of the Gray Death pg. 65</row>
prerequisite: Vigilante Dedication; member of the Gray Gardeners
summary: You can erect a magical cowl that terrorizes your enemies.

name: The Shattered Mountain Weeps
summary: A massive sphere of rock explodes, unleashing a cataclysm of falling debris and deadly shrapnel.

name: Timeline-Splitting Spell
summary: You invest in two futures, then choose the one to make a reality.

name: Triangle Shot
summary: You string three arrows to your bow and fire them all at once.

name: Trickster's Ace
summary: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

name: True Transmogrification
summary: You transmogrify your eidolon each day.

name: Turn the Wheel of Seasons
summary: The seasons shift rapidly.

name: Ultimate Mercy
summary: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

name: Unerring Shot
summary: Your senses are finely tuned to the slightest variations in the air, so much that you can place your shot exactly where you intend to aim it from any range possible with your weapon.

name: Usurp the Lunar Reins
summary: The moon has always been connected to the tides, and now you can grasp that connection.

name: Versatile Spellstrike
summary: You can channel the entire realm of possibilities of your spellbook into an attack.

name: Vicious Evisceration
summary: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

name: Warden's Wellspring
summary: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

name: True Perception
summary: Gain constant effects of _true seeing_.

name: Accurate Flurry
summary: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

name: All the Time in the World
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

name: Annihilating Swing
summary: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

name: Apex Companion
summary: Gain the _apex companion_ focus spell.

name: Archwizard's Might
summary: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

name: Astonishing Explosion
summary: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
summary: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

name: Avatar's Audience
summary: Your extensive service affords you certain divine privileges.

name: Avatar's Protection
summary: In moments of danger, you can call upon your god’s form in an instant.

name: Banishing Blow
summary: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

name: Become Thought
summary: You shed some of your material form, becoming a being of pure thought.

name: Bloodline Conduit
summary: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
summary: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

name: Bloodline Mutation
prerequisite: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
summary: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

name: Bloodline Perfection
summary: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

name: Boundless Reprisals
summary: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

name: Celestial Mount
summary: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

name: Contagious Rage
summary: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
summary: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

name: Cross the Final Horizon
summary: You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy.

name: Cunning Trickster Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Your mask carries the legacy of Verdant Spider, the Speaker of Needs, allowing you to deceive and outwit your foes.

name: Dance of Intercession
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

name: Deadly Strikes
summary: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus.

name: Demon's Hair
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

name: Denier of Destruction
summary: You can manipulate the same energies that the _aeon orbs_ use to sustain life.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
summary: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

name: Emancipator's Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Your mask grants you the abilities of Whistling Kite, the Vigilant Seer, who emancipated thousands.

name: Emblazon Divinity
summary: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

name: Empyreal Aura
summary: As an ultimate foe of evil and protector of the innocent, your very presence is a ward against evil.

name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
summary: Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment.

name: Enduring Debilitation
summary: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

name: Enduring Quickness
summary: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

name: Eternal Boost
summary: Your link with your eidolon is so intense that you continuously reinforce its abilities.

name: Everdistant Defense
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

name: Everyone's a Suspect
summary: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

name: Extradimensional Stash
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

name: Fatal Aria
summary: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion, potentially striking them dead on the spot.

name: Fiendish Mount
summary: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

name: Full Automation
summary: You become so entwined with your innovations that you can use them without a second thought.

name: Fuse Stance
summary: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

name: Golden Body
summary: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

name: Grand Medic's Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Your mask is infused with restorative magic associated with Ibex, the Flourishing Field, so it constantly repairs itself.

name: Head of the Night Parade
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 75</row>
summary: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display.

name: Heart of the Kaiju
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

name: Hex Master
summary: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

name: Hidden Paragon
summary: When you slip out of sight, you disappear.

name: Hierophant's Power
summary: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

name: Icy Apotheosis
summary: You are as much a creature of cold as whatever ancestry you were born to.

name: Immortal Bear
summary: Your body thrums with the primal vitality of the greatest of the ursine beasts.

name: Impossible Snares
summary: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

name: Impossible Striker
summary: Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming.

name: Impossible Technique
summary: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.

name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
summary: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

name: Just the Facts
summary: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

name: Kinetic Pinnacle
summary: No one can match the pace at which elements flow from you.

name: Legendary Rider
summary: You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals.

name: Legendary Shot
summary: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would affect your ranged attack.

name: Legendary Summoner
summary: Your ability to summon extends past your other spellcasting.

name: Ley Line Conduit
summary: You can draw magic from the ley lines of the world.

name: Maker of Miracles
summary: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

name: Mega Bomb
summary: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

name: Mimic Protections
summary: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

name: Mind over Matter
summary: Your mind's limits are only what you imagine them to be.

name: Mystery Conduit
summary: The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

name: Omnikinesis
summary: You can realign your kinetic gate with a thought.

name: Oracular Providence
summary: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power.

name: Panache Paragon
summary: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

name: Paradoxical Mystery
summary: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom.

name: Patron's Truth
summary: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron’s magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

name: Perfect Encore
summary: You develop another incredible creation.

name: Perfect Mutagen
summary: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

name: Perfect Readiness
summary: You prepare to fire with an instinctive speed and muscle memory that go beyond your conscious thoughts.

name: Pied Piping
summary: You learn the pied piping composition spell (page 371), which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

name: Plum Deluge
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

name: Protective Spirit Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Your mask carries the protective instincts of White Bull, the Horn Forger, and no one will hurt your allies while you have anything to say about it.

name: Quaking Stomp
summary: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

name: Radiant Blade Master
summary: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

name: Reactive Distraction
summary: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

name: Reclaim Spell
summary: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

name: Reflecting Riposte
prerequisite: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
summary: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

name: Ricochet Legend
summary: The more obstacles between you and your target, the deadlier your shots become, as you ricochet off multiple surfaces to hit them.

name: Ringmaster's Introduction
summary: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

name: Ruby Resurrection
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes.

name: Sacred Defender
summary: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 76</row>
summary: You've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse.

name: Sever Space
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

name: Shield Paragon
summary: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

name: Sky Master Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Your mask holds the legacy of Black Heron, the Wings of Knowledge, who united the aeromancers of the Shory Empire.

name: Slinger's Reflexes
summary: Your ability to react to unexpected circumstances is preternaturally sharp.

name: Song of the Fallen
summary: Gain the _song of the fallen_ focus spell.

name: Spell Combination
summary: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

name: Spell Mastery
summary: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven’t prepared them in advance.

name: Spellshape Channel
summary: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the energy of life and death.

name: Spellshape Mastery
summary: Your mastery of magic ensures that you can alter your spells just as easily as you can cast them normally.

name: Stalking Feline Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 78</row>
summary: Like Azure Leopard, the Patient Warden, your mask makes you most at home in the night and teaches you how to use the darkness to hunt.

name: Steal Essence
prerequisite: legendary in Thievery or master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
summary: Being in the presence of the _aeon orbs_ as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

name: Storyteller's Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 79</row>
summary: Your mask remembers the stories of Shifting Frog, Storyteller of the Past and Future.

name: Superior Sight
summary: Increase your visual acuity.

name: Supreme Spellstrike
summary: You've made it almost effortless to combine spells and attacks.

name: Symphony of the Muse
summary: You have learned how to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony with multitudinous effects.

name: Synergistic Spell
prerequisite: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; Fulminating Synergy; Legendary in Arcana; Legendary in Nature
summary: You combine your synergy and spells into a fantastic web of magic, allowing you to cast two spells at once.

name: Tenacious Blood Magic
summary: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

name: The Tyrant Falls!
prerequisite: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Invoke the Crimson Oath
summary: You've reached the apex of the Crimson Oath's power.

name: Thick Hide Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 79</row>
summary: Your mask grants you the toughness of Elephant, the Conjured Chronicle.

name: Time Dilation Cascade
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

name: Tireless Guide's Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 79</row>
summary: Your mask hosts the legacy of Golden Snake, the Tireless Guide, allowing you to guide others with ease.

name: To the Ends of the Earth
summary: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

name: Tower Shield Mastery
summary: You've learned how to maximize the defensive abilities of your tower shield.

name: Triple Threat
summary: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

name: True Shapeshifter
summary: You transcend the limitations of form.

name: Twin Eidolon
summary: You can transform to match your eidolon.

name: Twin Psyche
summary: You've segmented your psyche so it can operate in tandem.

name: Ubiquitous Overdrive
summary: You prepare a variety of incredible gizmos on each of your allies, linking them together through careful modification to enable you to power them up all at once.

name: Ubiquitous Weakness
summary: You've nurtured your bonds with your comrades, allowing you to share the benefits of your esoterica.

name: Ultimate Flexibility
summary: Your experience keeps you on your toes, helping you adopt complex strategies on the fly and face the most dangerous challenges.

name: Ultimate Polymath
summary: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

name: Ultimate Skirmisher
summary: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

name: Unlimited Demesne
summary: You can move your demesne here and there, bringing it wherever your journey takes you.

name: Unlimited Potential
summary: The laws of magic can limit your mind only if you think you need them, and you've grown past the need for such limits.

name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
source: <row gap="tiny">Advanced Player's Guide pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup>, Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 76</row>
summary: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

name: Verdant Presence
summary: The life-giving properties of the _aeon orbs_ flourish within you.

name: Vigilant Mask
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 79</row>
summary: Your mask grants the extraordinary magical senses of Carmine Jaws, the Hyena who Looks Between.

name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points.

name: Vivacious Afterimage
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.

name: Weapon Supremacy
summary: Your skill with weapons bends the laws of reality, allowing you to continuously attack with speed that would normally require magical assistance.

name: Whirlwind Spell
summary: You combine the might of a multitarget spell with a whirling flurry of attacks.

name: Whirlwind Toss
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.

name: Wish Alchemy
summary: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

name: Witch's Hut
summary: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.

name: Wonder Worker
prerequisite: Legendary in Arcana, Legendary in Nature, Legendary in Occultism, or Legendary in Religion
summary: The thaumaturge's path culminates with the working of wonders.

name: Worldsphere Gravity
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.

name: Wrath of the First Ghoul
trait: Archetype, Death, Divine, Enchantment, Flourish, Mental, Occult, Rare
summary: The ravenous maggots inside you become capable of exploding forth from your attacks into the wounds of an opponent, whispering telepathic words of destruction that invoke horrific flashbacks of Kabriri's transformation from  <%ANCESTRIES%371%%> elf <%END> to ghoul or psychic images of hundreds of maggots bursting from the victim's flesh all at once.

name: Zombie Horde
summary: You built your reanimated construct companion of modular components from various corpses.
